reviews.content: When booking the Nestling party package for my daughter’s 1st birthday party, I didn’t see a Gracie’s Corner theme but Kama went above and beyond to make it happen! She communicated with me throughout the entire process. I’m at a loss for words at how she pulled all of the decor together and how beautiful everything looked. She understood the assignment! She was so accommodating and her service skills are excellent too! They took care of everything which was a huge weight off of me. The only negative was that their Bluetooth speaker wasn’t connecting to my device to play my playlist. Amirah, who was an excellent host, worked it out though and played my playlist from her phone. She was on point and on top of things! I was also able to play a slideshow for the adults who hung out in the cafe area. My family, friends and their children all had a great time. We will definitely be back for playtime and future events. Thank you Natural Nest Play Cafe!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

We had the absolute best experience hosting my daughter’s 4th birthday party at The Nest! From start to finish, everything was seamless, stress-free, and so thoughtfully done. My daughter and her 14 little friends had an amazing time — she hasn’t stopped talking about it since!

What I loved most as a parent was that we had the entire space to ourselves, which made it feel private, safe, and comfortable for all the kids and their families. The play area is clean, spacious, and filled with fun, age-appropriate toys and activities that kept the kids happily entertained for the entire party. No one was bored for even a second!

The party room was beautifully decorated with our chosen theme — princesses! There were colorful balloons, themed table settings, and cute little touches everywhere that made the space feel magical. The Nest team truly went above and beyond with the setup. They even took care of the goodie bags and organizing the food, which was such a huge help. I literally just had to show up with the cake!

The staff was incredibly friendly, organized, and attentive throughout the event. They made sure everything ran smoothly and that both the kids and adults were having a great time. It was honestly one of the easiest and most enjoyable birthday parties we’ve ever hosted.

If you’re looking for a fun, safe, and stress-free party venue for young children, I highly recommend The Nest. We’ll definitely be coming back for future celebrations!

I really love the atmosphere here. My two kids really enjoy it. We haven't been able to go due to distance and pricing. Hoping maybe it will go back onto the FunFull app so making the drive would be more worth it! <3
Great play cafe. Cleaned frequently, Great condition quality toys and very kind staff. Have done numerous classes and play visits. Definitely reccomened!!
We love coming to the Play Cafe.. we have gone there for open play, dance class and the Pizza with Bluey event and each time it was a wonderful experience and we will continue to come back

My 15 month old had a great time at Movers & Shakers, and really enjoyed the play area and toys. This is a great spot for littles and parents 💕 safe, comfortable, and fun. We will definitely be back! …
We love coming here! My daughter can play for hours and never get bored! We've attended events and classes and have a great time at it all!
We had a fun time. They have different areas for different ages. We came with our 10 month old and he had a blast. Fun enough for us to make the 45 minute drive every other week
Very nice place to bring your small children. The only thing I would like to see more colors.

We recently hosted our son’s 3rd birthday party at The Nest Play Café, and it was an absolutely wonderful experience from start to finish! The space was perfect for little ones—clean, safe, and full of engaging activities that kept the kids entertained the entire time. The play area is thoughtfully designed, allowing kids to explore freely while parents can relax and enjoy the celebration.

The staff was incredibly accommodating and attentive, making sure everything ran smoothly. They helped with setup, checked in throughout the party, and made sure we had everything we needed. It was so nice to be able to enjoy the moment without stressing over the little details! Overall, we couldn’t have asked for a better experience! Our son had the best time, and all of our guests raved about how fun and stress-free the party was. We highly recommend The Nest Play Café for any toddler or preschooler’s birthday celebration! We’ll definitely be back.

Cute place. .. but lacks the total package. One would think if you see “cafe” that it would have coffee or something of the sorts for the moms while the kids play. But there’s just keurig and water cooler for hot water for tea. They could do way better.
The other issue is the lack of music…. We went and my kids were the only ones, along with the workers child playing. We could hear the daycare next door with screaming children and it was odd with no music.
It’s a cute setup, but my 4 year old was bored before the 2 hrs were even up. I think they do more to make it entertaining.
Great place to bring little kids to play with a clean safe environment. Very relaxing and great staff.

We visited the play cafe for the first time recently & had an amazing time! the staff members were all so warm & welcoming. the play room was very clean & all toys were high quality. my daughter loved it there, we’ll definitely be visiting again soon
We really enjoy the variety of activities. Always clean and everyone is very friendly. Highly recommend

Hi Carl.  We appreciate the review.  Would you please be able to provide some feedback for us to improve on the 3 star rating.  Im the new licensee owner as of 11/1/24 and working to do my best to give everyone an incredible experience.

Great little place. I highly recommend it. It is clean and very fun. Each of my kids have found fun things to play with in their various age stages from infant, toddler and up. The staff are wonderful and so very kind and responsive. We also did a class that was perfect for my child and well planned. We will keep coming back.
Clean. Friendly staff. Child had fun.

This place is absolutely adorable! There is a little cafe with tables right when you walk in; a little half wall separates the play area from the Cafe area. Parents can work or just relax while watching their children play. I visited this morning with my 3yo & 1yo. They played non stop for almost 2 full hours. I liked the openess of the play area and that I didn't have to search for my child every two seconds. The toys and play equipment were super engaging and top tier quality. It made my preschool teacher heart happy lol.  I will absolutely be back with my littles!

I hate to write a negative review, but I have tried to reach the owner twice by leaving voicemails & have not received a call back. I took my son there for the first time recently where he was hurt. We were the ONLY people in there & my son started screaming crying, I was consoling him as best I could & not once did the young woman who was working turn around to see if everything was okay. My son IMMEDIATELY ended up with a huge knot on his head so I asked the woman if she had ice for me (to help the swelling) & I asked for a paper towel (to wipe his nose & tears) & she moved as slow as molasses. I had to politely ask her if she could please hurry with the paper towels & she then asked “yeah, oh did something happen to him?” -__- & I told her yes… I’m not sure how she did not catch on to that, again as we are the ONLY people in there, it’s a small and quiet place. After moving very slowly with no sense of urgency, she finallt gave me some ice wrapped in a paper towel (guess they didn’t have ice packs?) & some paper towels. I finally got my son to settle down & decided to leave to care for him further. As we are leaving, I said goodbye to her & she just says goodbye have a good day…no “is he okay, how did it happen, do you need anything else?” NOTHING… I am very disappointed, especially as a children’s establishment that they had such lack of care & concern. We will not be coming back here.

We celebrated our little one’s first birthday here! We had the peacock party package and it was absolutely worth it. The theme was on point and handled with care, down to the last detail. It was absolutely a wonderful and fun time for all! I would highly recommended this place for your next party! We also love coming for “public play.” The premise of this play place is so perfect, there really aren’t that many places for getting out of the house with your little one. We love the Nest!
I went today for the first time. It was very clean. The young lady (Janiyah) working was very friendly. My son is 4 and he really enjoyed it. Will come again!

This place was awesome! My child had a blast! Awesome indoor Playground for toddlers I would say! Especially with these hot summer days! $22 for a 2 hour session with 2 adults and 1 child. I'm sorry, but that's cheap for a nice cool day in the summer with a child! I'm so happy I found this place on Google Maps and will be a happy return customer! Great first experience no issues.

This space is terrible do not take your children here. The employees was very rude they was extremely late decorating. It was leftover trash and food from the people before us very unsanitary. The owner was very rude when I spoke to her about all this. Don’t waste your money or time even going to this place. I wish I could’ve gave this place zero ⭐️

I’ve now had two birthday parties here-and I probably will continue to have all future birthday parties here! I drive all the way from Dover since this location is bigger (although I haven’t seen the new upgrade!), and it is well worth it.

The space is wonderful, extremely clean and everything is sanitized, and staff have been wonderful. You can’t beat the Sunday Birthday party price and I hope it never changes, so affordable!

The second birthday party I held for my 2 year old-back in April, I arrived and staff were still cleaning up from a previous event. I was stressed and panicking since we only have 30 minutes to set up-but the staff members were so kind and apologetic. One of the younger girls even asked if there was anything she could do to help, unforeseen circumstances happen and they handled it perfect.

I do wish the child limit for the parties was a tad bigger, but that’s only because I always invite too many kids 😂. Hey,  more kids and families that attend, that’s essentially more free advertising through experience 🤷🏼‍♀️😂.

I applaud this business. The owner is so kind that she was even able to sponsor a local family in the community who is struggling. Can’t wait to visit again and have more great experiences here!
We had an amazing experience here with our family! We are new to the area and it was nice to find a clean and safe space for the kids! We 100% recommend!

I attended my newphews birthday here 6/2024 this past weekend. The staff was very unprofessional. They were still decorating  room as guests arrived  it was extremely unacceptable And had their children assisting them who were not dressed appropriately! Another staff member had a crying baby in the play area upon our arrival.

It was evident that this party was not important to them as it was a rushed job. The decorations started to fall down. The inflatable animals kept deflating when they could have easily went to a party store or walmart to replace it. A custom sign that was purchased was no where to be found, There was no evidence of a themed activity. The staff was incompetent in orchestrating a party game and gathering the children together. This was the worst experience we have ever had and I would not recommend this business. The owner stated that they were understaffed and if so they should have arrived 2 or more hours ahead to ensure that it was taken care of when people have paid for a party! They did not make our experience enjoyable at all and did not make an effort to make sure that this party was up to standard.
They need to take time to properly train staff, replace inflatables when they are no longer working properly, buy decorations, and make sure the rugs  and play items are clean before guest arrive. Nest is a nice place but they have to get organized and invest in the things that matter! Please think twice before booking with this business

Nest play Cafe is the perfect place to bring your little ones. Most of the toys are Montessori toys and the whole space is very safe. There was a lot for my little one to do and they were wiped out after just a 2 hour play session. We will definitely visit again!

I recently visited Natural Nest Cafe during its advertised hours of operation on Thursdays and Fridays, from 8 AM to 4 PM. However, upon arriving at 1:45 PM, I found the store dark, doors locked, and no visible activity inside. Despite attempting to call several times, there was no answer.

Having managed businesses for family members, I understand that unforeseen circumstances can lead to closures or early closure for various reasons. However, upon checking their social media pages for any communication about an early closure, I found none.

In an attempt to gather more information, I called their Dover location, where the person who answered provided minimal information. They mentioned that if there were no reservations past 2 PM, they may close early, despite my arrival at 1:45 PM.

This experience highlights a lack of respect for both the company's stated hours of operation and its customers. Their website clearly states: 'Reservations are encouraged but not required for our 2-hour blocks of open play.' and 'We offer Open Play, Classes and Event reservations online to ensure you have a spot to play as we have limited play capacity. Drop in is offered on an as available basis only. Please call ahead.' Their website clearly states that reservations are encouraged but not required for open play, and drop-ins are accepted based on availability.

After reading other reviews mentioning other inconsistencies, and considering the significant distance I traveled (nearly 30 minutes) to visit their party space, I'm disappointed and unwilling to invest further time in visiting this establishment. It's worth noting that I solely intended to see the party space before blindly booking online and had no interest of play time during this visit. I could only imagine the further disappointment if I had children eager to play with me.

Such a cute place for littles to play and explore! This was our first time here and my children, ages 2, 7, and 9 loved it! It was the perfect rainy morning activity. The older two just came to play with their little brother but they still had a good time. The reservation process was seamless and easy and the environment is laid back. It looks like they took someone’s suggestion and added some music for the background ambience so that was a nice touch. We will definitely be back!
Thank you for your 5-star rating, Jacob! We appreciate your support and look forward to welcoming you back to Natural Nest Play Cafe soon!

Terrible business practices.  My granddaughters 2 year old birthday party was double booked.  We have emails stating the time.  Instead of having us share space they made us leave.  We had to reroute 15 adults and 6 two year olds to another place.  So disappointing and very emotional to say the least.  We paid $200 and they would not reimburse our funds.  Party planners move on!
Great place to take your little ones for a party or just to play! Great staff. Very accommodating.
Thank you for your 5-star rating, Mary! We appreciate your support and look forward to welcoming you back to Natural Nest Play Cafe soon!
Great place with useful resources- highly recommend for new and experienced moms alike

Took my 4 year old today, and she had so much fun. Had lots of little activities for kids to do. I must add this is a very quiet environment, which is good for my daughter as she thrives in these types of environments where not too much commotion is going on. Just a suggestion, having soft meditation/ nature/ or kid music playing in the background can make the experience even better.

We had the opportunity to go to this location a few weeks ago and it was simply incredible!
I loved how safe the space was and that they had a separate “zone” for infants and early walkers.
You can tell the owners have spared no expense to offer amazing Montessori inspired toys.
There are so many features about this facility that I loved…the air cannon, the build your own fort, the indoor playground, the magnetic wall, the healthy food choices and co-working option.
But my favorite part, is that it’s not an overly stimulating environment.
I highly recommend this facility to anyone looking for a fun and reasonably priced place to take your infant or child.

Great place to let your kiddos burn some steam.  It's clean and cozy. Don't expect to get a lot of work done if it's just you and your kids but if there are other children around,  then they might play together and you get a break.

While the experience at this location was pretty good, the overall company does not abide by their promises. I do not support this company.

We got to check out The Nest Play Cafe during soft launch today and it was an absolute blast. You can reserve a play time online or do a drop in play, however, to guarantee your spot, I recommend booking a slot online. Each slot is a 2 hour period. There is tons for kids of multiple ages to explore and play with and since it’s in soft launch, the arrangement of the room will most likely change. There is plenty of seating around the room for caregivers and well as a whole cafe to parents of independent kids to work on their laptop or grab a coffee. There are shoe cubbies for shoes and socks are required in the play area. If you forget socks, they do sell them at the front desk. There is a whole book area for older kids to sit and read while the younger kids play. There is a family bathroom for use and there is a changing table as well as a small portable potty for kids. They even had spare diapers and pads! We can’t wait to visit again and are looking into their membership option.

The only recommendations I would have would be a locked area for people to put purses and/diaper bags and having the play period include 2 adults and 1 child instead of charging for additional adults, to mirror similar local play places.

While the place was fun for my two kids it was absolutely freezing. I wanted to find somewhere inside for them to play so we wouldn't be cold and instead my toes were quite cold the whole time. My children's hands were also cold even though they were moving all around.

I hosted my daughter's 3 year old birthday party at the Natural Nest Play Cafe - Middletown. It was such a fun space! We had 9 kids ages 5 and under who loved every minute of play time. The princess themed decorations were gorgeous. Everything was well organized and Ashley did a great job of communicating up to the event. It was a huge relief for this momma to have some support planning a birthday bash around the holidays. 10/10 would book a party again and we plan to schedule another play date there soon!

My almost 2 year old had the greatest time meeting Bluey at The Nest Play Cafe! He tried out a lot of new and different toys for the very first time!

We will absolutely be back, especially on rainy days!
Thank you to this staff! You guys rock!

I absolutely love this space for my little ones! The space is exceptionally clean. The toys and activities are age appropriate and modern! The staff is friendly and attentive! Perfect for an afternoon outing to get us out of the house! Keep up the great work!
This place was amazing! It was clean, the girl at the front was so kind and helpful, and there was a great selection of play toys. We will be back next time we drive through the area!
Love the natural feel and snacks!

Great place for younger children.
I like that the children area was separated from where the parents can sit and keep an eye on them or take off their shoes to participate with the children. Very friendly staff and the facility was clean.

We had a birthday party here over the weekend and it was great! The kids enjoyed themselves and two hours was plenty of time to play and open presents/cake . The two young girls who were working could have been a little more welcoming, however, they did look pretty young so maybe just shy? I’m not sure, but either way, we had a great time!
Absolutely amazing and beautiful space! I love the natural wood play area and organic healthy snack options for my kiddo. Thank you for hosting out event. and We’ll be back soon!

I was one of the moms that attended the Bluey event Dec 3rd.  This was my first time at this establishment and it is mainly for children up to 3 years of age even though an 6 year old would just adapt to the environment. This was a Christmas event and I must say there was nothing that I saw that stood out to be Christmas at all. My daughter was the only child wearing a Christmas hat for the Christmas theme.  I thought that Bluey would have had on a Christmas hat like shown on the website. Where was the Christmas tree? Why weren’t the owners dressed in Christmas gear as the organizers of the event because I certainly was dressed for the cause as an adult.  The activities were vague and some of the children and parents didn’t even know some activities were happening because it was unannounced and unorganized.  For the price, I thought the activities were going to be more structured according to the events that were listed.  We didn’t know that our children could make gingerbread houses until we were leaving because there was no announcement of this activity. We saw little children in the corner which prompted our children to join in which made us stay an extra 15-20 min to do this activity. There is nowhere on the website that you need grip socks to play.  It just said socks! Most people sign waivers when they get to an establishment so this should have been clear online when you check out. The children who needed socks were charged $5 for non-grip socks.  Why don’t they sell the socks that are required?  We asked for a refund only when we learned that some of our children didn’t have the proper socks to play and they were going to be denied play time with Bluey. I have been to hundreds of events and have paid high and low for my child to experience fun, however, this was not what I expected. This review is not to deter you from visiting this small business but for this business to gracefully understand and respect the review and experience of their customers in hopes to do better. The idea was there, it was just poorly executed.
Nest Cafe is a breath of fresh air. Service is great. The establishment is well organized, clean, and very kid friendly.
Thank you for the review!
I'm just hoping they expand to New Castle county. Great concept, well maintained and most importantly my baby had fun.

My 10 month old LOVES The Nest! She’s been playing here since she was 6 months and it’s amazing to see her enjoy more of the play area as she grows. It’s a favorite spot for us to visit when we drive to NJ to visit family. We can’t wait to visit the Dover location soon.

This vendor is nothing but a scam. I ordered a Gathre block set item listed as "in stock," only to have it removed from their website right after I paid. When I asked about availability, they made me wait days for a response from their distributor. It was clear they were stalling.

Realizing the item was sold out everywhere, I requested a cancellation. They not only charged me 10% for this, they also cancelled the order and charged the fee, despite my willingness to keep the order.

This vendor tried to make $38 off me, knowing the item wasn't in stock. I've involved my bank to get my money back. Don't make the same mistake. Buy from the official Gathre site. If it's "out of stock," it truly is.

In short, this vendor's deceitful actions show they're a complete scam. Don't fall for it.
Amazing concept and fantastic play cafe. Everything was clean and safe. All the kiddos had fun.

First time visiting today and we’ll definitely be back! Muted colors, wooden toys, soft instrumental music. Organic snacks and juices. Plenty of comfy spots to sit in and out of the play area, lots of charging stations. Two hour play time was perfect

What a great concept! Our children (1 and 5 years old) loved this alternative indoor playground. Staff was super friendly and welcoming. A little more explanation would be good (f.e. „Help yourself to the coffee over there“). The concept is very close to Maria Montessori’s theory’s of learning. Everything is made of wood or organic material, non-toxic and in sober colors. It was equally attracting our baby and our 5 year old. We loved the relaxing music! Everything was extremely clean. Some suggested improvements: a step stool for toddlers would be great in the restroom. And a little further training in coffee making skills. 😊

Highly recommend! I took my 18MO here for a reserved open play 2-hour session and we had such a great time. It’s bright and clean and there’s plenty of things for your little ones to get into. I drove over an hour specifically to come here and I was not disappointed. I even met the owner Ashley who was the sweetest (and so are her kids). I hope to make it back again soon with my 3YO as well.

Really recommend this place! It's so perfect for little ones, especially age 0-5. My 3 year old had a blast and cried when we left because he wanted to stay. They have plenty of spots for parents to sit and watch their little ones play. It was really nice and a great addition! They have snacks for Littles and adults, plus free coffee and water! Great and fun atmosphere. Highly recommend. I wish they let parents come for free or did a deal like buy one parent ticket get the other free because I would love to bring my husband next time. Overall amazing experience!! Deff try it out on a hot or rainy day when you need your kids to burn off energy!

data.address: 7 W Baltimore Ave, Media, PA 19063, United States
data.title: Harmony Kids Playhouse
data.workhours: Saturday, Closed, Copy open hours; Sunday, Closed, Copy open hours; Monday, Closed, Copy open hours; Tuesday, Closed, Copy open hours; Wednesday, Closed, Copy open hours; Thursday, 10 am to 4 pm, Copy open hours; Friday, 9 am to 4 pm, Copy open hours;

reviews.content:
⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ A Sensory-Rich Indoor & Outdoor Play Space for Infants & Toddlers – Harmony Playhouse, Media PA

Harmony Playhouse in Media, PA is a standout destination for families seeking a clean, creative, and safe indoor play space for infants, toddlers, and young children. With a perfect mix of sensory play, imaginative zones, and outdoor freedom, it’s one of the most thoughtfully designed early childhood spaces in Delaware County.

The indoor area is filled with bright natural light, colorful toys, and developmentally appropriate activities—including a pretend kitchen, climbing structures, reading nooks, and a cozy ball pit. Designed especially for infants and toddlers, the playhouse supports gross motor skills, fine motor play, and early sensory exploration in a clean, padded, and inviting environment.

One of Harmony’s most unique features is its fenced-in outdoor play area, offering a safe place for little ones to enjoy fresh air and nature play in a fully enclosed space. It’s the perfect option for families looking for both indoor sensory experiences and outdoor active play.

Parents will love the relaxing, organized layout, soft flooring, and the welcoming atmosphere. Whether you’re attending an open play session, booking a private visit, or hosting a birthday party, the staff ensures a seamless and enjoyable experience every time.

📍 Located conveniently in downtown Media, it’s a top choice for families across the Main Line, Chester County, and greater Philadelphia searching for:
•	Sensory play for infants and toddlers
•	Indoor playground with outdoor access
•	Birthday party venues for young kids
•	Safe and clean toddler play spaces near me

Harmony Playhouse is more than just a play area—it’s a developmentally enriching, beautifully designed haven for early childhood play and exploration. A true gem in Media!

We just had my son's 1st birthday at Harmony Kids Playhouse and it could not have been better!  All the party attendees loved the space and the fun, unique and engaging activities.  Ms. Tai was absolutely fabulous in helping us get set up, making sure the party was running smoothly and then cleaning up.  We had mostly young children but even my 10 year old son was totally entertained by the toys and activities.  This was our first time visiting the Playhouse and I can't recommend it enough for a party or an open play session.  My only complaint is that I was worried that I was forgetting something because Ms. Tai made everything so easy and relaxing for us parents! LOL.  Don't miss this clean, joyful, and engaging space for your little ones!
This is such a joyful, beautiful place for kids to play! Highly recommend!
N/A
The spot chosen for a 2 year old's birthday that was a smash hit for all! The toys and items available were enjoyed by all (this party was ages 1-7!), and the host was awesome with everything!

We are obsessed with HKP! My toddler loves going to “Miss Tai’s house”

You can tell that Tai truly loves the community she has put together at HKP. Every inch of the space is so thoughtfully put together for the kids. Everything is always clean and Tai is constantly going around tidying up and sanitizing the toys. Our open play membership has saved us this winter! Thank you Miss Tai!
Great place for kids to play safely 💯 …
We took my son here for the first time and he absolutely loved it. The teacher is amazing with kids, can sing, and the playhouse is so cute.

We had the best time at Harmony Kids Playhouse today!  My 4.5 year old loved it just as much as my 19 month old.  I was nervous she would be too old, but I was wrong.  Miss Tai very warmly welcomed both of them and they were very comfortable engaging with her.  Everything is so thoughtfully curated and perfect for fostering developmental skills of all ages and stages.  I can’t say enough about how nice it was and we cant wait to go back!

We’ve enjoyed open play sessions, special events with outside vendors, and now finally a birthday party at Harmony Kids, and it’s wonderful every time. We first met Tai when she was teaching Zumbini classes out of different locations, and have stuck with her ever since! She’s so warm, friendly, silly and fun in the best ways that really engage the kids and she’s made the space inside Harmony kids just the same. It’s super clean and laid out with so many thoughtful little areas with different toys and activities for the kids. My kids rave about going there and always ask when the next time we can go back will be.

We just hosted my son’s fifth birthday party there and Tai made it so much easier on me by offering a decorations and food package so we didn’t even have to provide those in advance. As a full time working mom of three (ages 5 and under) that kind of help was crucial for the success of our party. We also chose to include a music session during the party, which was perfect and had the kids all dancing and playing along. 15/10, we love Harmony Kids Playhouse!
It was very nice there. It’s small but still so much to do and not as overstimulating as the big kid zone play spots.

We had our daughter’s 4th birthday here and everybody had an awesome time. We added on the music experience, and the kids really loved it. Tai took care of everything for us, and herded the kids as needed. This was a huge help to us parents. I would highly recommend HKP for a birthday party.
Clean, safe, good vibes. What more can you ask for. Our 3 year old and 10 month old both had fun and the owner and group of parents that were there were all very cool.

Went for the first time today. Such a nice space, large enough kids aren’t on top of each other but small enough you can easily keep track of the kids. Really well thought out and interactive space. Impressively clean. Will return soon
Ms. Tai is animated. Travy lives her!

My boys love Miss Tai so much. They literally look at her with stars in their eyes. She has a way of making every person feel like the most special person in the room. It really is a gift. Her classes have everyone smiling ear to ear. The play place is absolutely stunning. Everything is so well thought out. The colors, the toys, the books, just the whole sensory experience. We truly needed a place like this where parents can meet similar aged children and form friendships and just get some adult interaction while the kids play. Highlight of our week. Highly recommend.

We hosted a family Christmas party at HKP and couldn't be more impressed! We had kids from 4 months - 9 years and there was something for everyone. The space is set up in a way that invites kids to play together and fosters collaboration. The party planning process was really simple, and Miss Tai made set up and clean up easy too. I'd definitely book again, and recommend it to everyone!

Had a really nice experience today with my son, Jack. The space is smaller, but, plenty to do within the 90 minute time frame. My son has SPD and really enjoyed the variety of items and activities for an enriching sensory experience. The owner is very friendly and accommodating. You can tell how much she has poured her heart into this space! We had a great time and will definitely be back.

Welcoming dream house play space for young children.  Clean, bright, safe climbing & sensory toys. Nooks for creative learning.
This grandparent loved this adventure.   Oh and there is another room we haven’t  explored!!
Went for the first time today and my boys had so much fun! The space is very cute, clean, and perfect for 0-4 as advertised. We attended a reptile event and had a blast! Highly recommend!
Absolutely love this place, it is incredible.  Perfect for my 14 month old granddaughter.

Harmony Kids Playhouse is a fun, and engaging space designed to introduce children to music in a creative and interactive way. The environment is colorful, easy to navigate, and filled with child-friendly features. With a variety of activities, including a ball pit, climbing loft, slide, and lots of soft play toys it helps foster early musical development and play. Parents will appreciate the safe, educational experience, while kids will love the playful design and entertaining content. Ms. Tai is AMAZING, and we love HKP!

We absolutely loveeee Harmony Kids Playhouse! It’s always clean, never overcrowded, and both of our kids have such a fun time there every time. The classes are super engaging and the perfect amount of time to hold their attention. The open play is great too! You can tell every element of the space was designed to develop their little minds!!

On 5/24/25 I had a 1st  birthday party for my son upon my departure I  realizedI left his white Air Force sneakers in the bin  at your premises, I immediately contacted your staff, who assured me that the items would be safely stored until I could return to retrieve them. However, when I came back, I was informed that the items had been taken—presumably stolen—despite your staff’s assurance that they would be kept secure!
This situation is extremely upsetting and has caused me both inconvenience. I trusted your staff to act responsibly, especially after being given a direct assurance that my belongings would be protected. It is unacceptable that this promise was not honored, and that no adequate measures were taken to prevent this from happening. I am requesting an explanation of how this occurred, what steps you are taking to investigate the matter, and what actions you will take to prevent similar incidents in the future. Furthermore, I expect appropriate compensation or support in resolving this loss, including a review of any available security footage and staff accounts.

It was a mess from the minute I walked in there. They really do need to have more staff that helps to watch the kids when it’s that busy. I will only go during the calm, quiet weekdays.

I arrived on a Friday, just before 4 pm, with my 7 year old daughter and my 7 month old son in a stroller, which was holding all of our belongings as you can imagine. We entered the building and we spoke with a young lady at the desk, who was being guided by this man, presumably the manager. She explained that we needed to purchase socks in addition to the entry ticket, so we purchased the one pair of socks for my daughter to play. Precisely upon completing the purchase, the man informed me that I would not be able to bring my stroller into the play area. Total deal breaker. I’m sure they’re aware that once they inform a guest that they can’t bring the stroller with them, most patrons would turn away. So they’re waiting until the purchase is complete to inform you that the stroller can’t come with you. Either change the policy or tell people before they purchase. So the play area itself had a few parts that either weren’t working, or none of the kids could figure out how to make it work. None of the workers stepped in to show a demonstration or explain. My daughter did enjoy herself, but I did not enjoy needing to carry all of my belongings around with us on top of my 22 pound baby in a car seat.

Back in February we brought our daughter to check this place out. We decided to book her birthday party for April. Fast forward 3 days before the party I call to confirm the party. The teenager working tells me they don’t have record of the party. I ask to speak with a manager. She puts me on hold then another teenager proceeds to get on the phone and is NO help, telling me there is no manager and I’ll have to call back tomorrow. Five minutes later I get a call from them with the phone number for the party manager. I call this number twice, no answer. I texted it and finally got a reply. After some back and forth the person informs me that whoever booked the party never confirmed it and they don’t have any spots available for Saturday. I booked this party 2 MONTHS in advance and I never heard from them at all after booking. I was so disappointed because we had to scramble to find something else to do from my daughter’s birthday. I am very lucky I called because we would have been extremely screwed if we showed up there on the day of the party. Honestly, they need to do better and have more adults who can assist rather than leaving it all up to teenagers.

reviews.content: We had a great time at a Bluey themed event. The space was big enough that all our kids had something to do but was contained so moms could chat. The staff was also very friendly. We will be back!
Great place for a toddler birthday party - they have just about everything you’d need!
Wonderful experience. The owners are very friendly and the staff is very helpful. Very nice place to go if you have you get children. Will definitely be back.
N/A

It’s nice to enjoy my coffee and get some studying done while the kiddos run wild. They did great with having a variety activities for the amount of space they’re working with. The girls are all so nice at helping clean up and don’t make me feel like I have to rush over and reset the play section. The owner is also a big sweetheart! Love this place and so do my kids.
N/A

The Beach House play center is fantastic! My 2 year old loved it since we first visited and we can't get enough. They have seasonal events, coffee and refeshments for parents and a cute little gift shop. The staff is very friendly, warm welcoming environment, lots of fun toys for littles to play independently or cooperatively. I highly recommend to plan your next visit asap!

We love visiting this indoor playground—it's truly a gem for families with young kids! Every time we walk through the doors, it feels like a fresh experience. Emily and Rebecca are always so kind and welcoming, and you can tell how much time and passion Emily pours into making the space special.

The variety of toys and activities keeps my child engaged every time we come. I love that the furniture and play areas are frequently rearranged—it keeps things exciting and new, even for regular visitors like us. They also host fun, events throughout the year. We recently attended an Easter egg hunt, and I really appreciated how thoughtfully it was set up so little ones weren’t overwhelmed. It was my daughter’s first time meeting the Easter Bunny and I am thrilled she had a positive experience.

Sometimes there’s even a themed sensory bin or fun surprise—like the day we came in and there were balloons on the wall, which my child noticed right away. There’s a cozy, clean area for nursing mothers, complimentary coffee for parents, and a snack area with child-sized tables and chairs—such a thoughtful touch. I also love the no-shoes policy, which helps keep the space clean and comfy for the kids.

It’s such a welcoming environment, and we always look forward to our visits. I recommend this place to any family looking for a safe, engaging, and thoughtfully designed indoor play space!
They have such great safe space for kids to explore and play. They also rotate toys so there’s something new and different to explore the next time you come!
My granddaughter loves the Beach House Play center! She is 22 months and it so fun to see her learn and explore!

What a wonderful place for young children! I was hoping something like this would come close to our home. We went to a similar style place in York in the past but it was not nearly as nice - the beach house play center is so clean, organized, and well thought out. The toys are all high quality and promote lots of learning and fun! Shoes need to be removed which is a rule we have in our house and really appreciate. We will definitely be returning, hopefully many times!
Super cute!
My daughter loved this place. The toys were clean and entertaining. The special event with Bluey was perfect. She had plenty of time to interact with the character.
Thank you!

I attended a special event with my 2 year old this week; this was our second visit to the Beach House. The event was very well run. Attendees were limited and allowed for the children to play and participate in activities without being directly on top of one another. Included in the 1.5 hour event was play, snack, a craft, and character appearance; I felt that event was well priced for these inclusions. The space was very clean and well maintained. I appreciate that toys and activities are rotated for seasons, holidays, etc. I would highly recommend open play sessions or special events to those who have kiddos 1.5 to 3 years old- this gem of a business is perfect for them and we are so lucky to have it in our community!

Hey Everyone!

(Yes it says I’m from NJ - I was visiting family and this was their party)

We came to The Beach House for my nephew’s birthday party. My sister in law was telling me all about it when they opened, I wasn’t sure what to expect, and to my surprise this was like no place I’ve ever taken my 4 year old! As soon as you walk in, it’s very bright atmosphere, smells great and VERY CLEAN!  Everyone took their shoes off prior to entering the play area where they have multiple interaction sections for each creative child and all their desires.  Also the fact that there were 10 toddlers in the same room and the volume was at a 4 out of 10 I was highly impressed that something like that was even possible lol. They were so extremely engaged that everyone played so nice and quiet at each stations. Also if any of the toys are some how soiled (ie, child places fake veggie in the mouth) there is a dirty bin where you place all toys to be sanitized!! Trust me , Emily did not miss a single detail! These are things I highly value as a parent.

There was an area in the back with flooring as an area to eat and have snacks off the carpet play area.

In the back hall there was a lovely breastfeeding room with a cozy chair and privacy curtains and fully loaded diaper changing station!!

This place was a dream come true for a mom (or any guardian for that matter)
And even to this day my toddler keeps asking to go back!

I had to stop in and support our local businesses that build such beautiful space  that keeps our community connected!!

Wow! EXCELLENT PLACE I Will Definitely Go A Thousand Times More My Baby Was A Free Soul We Lived Many Fantasies in The Place. Place where you can share with family and get closer to your baby, helping to experience new things and make new friends.

Wow! Excellent place I will definitely go a thousand times more my baby was a free soul we lived many fantasies in the place. Place where you can share with your family and get closer to your baby, helping them experience new things and make new friends.

Such a wonderful place, I highly recommend checking it out! I went today with my autistic 5 year old twins and their nurses and I was worried it wasn't going to go well since they have issues in social settings and are often judged for being different than the other kids. We did not experience this at all and felt very welcomed. Lots of things to do to keep the kids busy. There is even a room in the back that can be used as a calming room which is a huge plus for us since the boys get overstimulated easily. We will definitely be coming back again. I wish great success for this small business.
Thank you!

We went to the play center for the first time today. I took my 3 and 1 year olds. They had such an amazing time! There's so many things to see and do, even though there were quite a few children and adults there, everyone seemed to have plenty to play with. The free coffee is always appreciated but the complimentary diapers and wipes were absolutely amazing!  We also made use of the calming area for some milk and snuggles.  Wonderful set up. Great toys and atmosphere. Can't wait to come back!

What a great place and great location! We were very happy with the cleanliness. A clean environment is always super important to our family. Pricing was very reasonable. Staff were friendly and happy to accommodate the guests. We will be returning soon to play!
A clean, wonderful, play space. My daughter always has the best time!
We attended a private grinch event and it couldn’t have been more perfect! Such a great place - will definitely be back again.
Great play area for small children. Clean, organized and nice staff. Will definitely return.
Thank you for your review. Come back to see us soon!

We absolutely loved our visit to the beach house play center. The kids had so much fun and it was a nice atmosphere. The owner is extremely nice and was on top of everything making sure everything was picked up, cleaned up and has a special little bin for toys, the children put in their mouth so they can be sanitized, the place is extremely clean. Free coffee in the back, nursing area to have some privacy and free diapers and wipes are even offered. For the price and with anything included it’s such a great deal. We will definitely be back whenever we get the chance ❤️

We really enjoyed our play date at the Beach House Play Center. There were a variety of fun stations for my little ones to really explore their imagination. Clean play area & clean bathrooms with a full service diaper changing station! We will definitely be back!

Such a cute and fun place for the kids! My son had a blast and can't wait to go back! As mom I appreciated how CLEAN the place is!! I'm so excited to have a place like this close by!!! Owners really went above and beyond to think of everything for the kids and parents!! 5 stars all around!
My kids loved the place! It is cute and clean with lots of different kinds of toys. It is the best place in York to take toddlers and little kids. My boys did not want to leave! 💙 …

We visited the beach house play center for the first time and our kids absolutely loved it! They are ages four and six but this is a great place to take children of any young age! It is an extremely clean, quiet, fun, and safe environment. There is a wide variety of play structures such as a beauty salon, grocery store, garage, indoor playground, and many more to allow for all different types of imaginary play. The owner was extremely warm, polite, and welcoming which added to the wonderful experience. I highly recommend for anyone with children under the age of 10!}

And as for the  manager Yaya whom Completely lacks customer service to start with she wasn’t allowing Guest due to the fact that we paid before their arrival, we wasnt not notified  about our guest & took 5minutes for her to understand that we’re willing to pay for the xtra children, and unfortunately, she’s telling my guess it’s a $21 fee perchild yet told me right in front of them that it was a $17 fee.  the way miss yaya sat outside the party room staring through the window at 7:10 pushing for is to leave At 7:15 is when we was suppose to clean up. Remind you where the last party of the day at that point, the only party of there. We basically got treated like we were unwanted and thieves for having a birthday party. I didn’t get the assitant managers name, but she has been nothing but outstanding customer service and understanding should be the main one managing!!
I really wish I would’ve took pictures, but I was trying to enjoy my child party & like i said I would  recommend location birthday parties unless you want completely surcharged for lack of Communication & a headache.

reviews.content: Women running it told me to leave a 5 star review.  It’s not 5 star review worthy.
Rip off told that the place I was actually looking for didn’t even exist in the mall just to find out that it was on the second floor. Waste of time and money my kid didn’t even enjoy her time
Definitely not worth the money...the lady at the front desk also wasn't particularly friendly or engaging 🙄 …

If I could give 0 stars, I would. They told me the cost was $35. The lady at the front took my card and tapped it on another phone on a square reader. Not sure why she had two phones to do a transaction. Never gave me a receipt, I didn’t sign. Just gave me tokens and two wristbands. Once I got home I checked my bank and saw the place charged me $75. When I called to ask them about it, they gave me the run around and made me talk to several people then told me I needed proof I was there and charged that amount because they have no transaction in their system for the time frame I was there, for the amount I was charged or the correct amount. However, I have pictures and videos of being there at the time frame mentioned and we were the only family there the entire time. It seems like they have some sort of scam going on. I do not recommend at all! Please pay attention and get a receipt!
Way overpriced for what they have to offer. I won't be back. Also, there was a bunch of open electrical outlets and cords running everywhere.

I brought my granddaughter, who's almost 3. It kept her interest for about 20 minutes.  I was wondering why on the Saturday there was no one else there when we arrived. The cost was $25 to jump on the 2 bounce houses, basketball game and another few arcade games ( It was the hockey puc game and I believe one more) and also to drive around on their remote dinosaurs Which she did really like. She took a dinosaur ride and then went back in for a few minutes and then wanted to ride on another dino. When we asked, we were told that we would have to pay again to ride on the other dinosaur.  Decided To leave shortly after that. In my opinion it wasn't worth the $25. It was the first play place that hasn't captured her interest for a long period of time. At other play places she would play for 2 hours or more. It would have been nice if they had a little ball pit for some of the younger kids to play in. We won't be returning.

They didn’t want to shop anymore so I took them and let my sister do what she needed. The lady there helped me so much! She helped take rides on the little power pets around the front of the store! Played the games with the kids so I could tend to the other one, etc. I would have been sweating, and running between all 3 kids and she made it a breeze! She went Above and beyond!! Plus it’s super affordable and just an awesome vibe for toddlers! She asked if the music was too loud for my sleeping baby, she was super attentive and I will be returning!!

reviews.content: I had my son’s 4th birthday here and it was a blast! Everything was just perfect, the staff was so accommodating, attentive and friendly. They literally took care of everything for us, including decorating! Everything looked adorable with a huge balloon arch and little kid table table settings. I would highly recommend!
Thank you for your 5-star review! We're thrilled to hear you had a great experience with us. Your support means a lot, and we look forward to serving you again soon.

Thank you for your 4-star rating, Eddy! We appreciate your support and look forward to serving you again. If you have any feedback or suggestions, please feel free to share. Your experience is important to us.

Thank you for your 4-star review! We appreciate your feedback and are glad to know you had a positive experience. If there’s anything specific you’d like to share or if there are areas for improvement, please feel free to let us know. We look forward to serving you again!
Great spot lots of seating for parents and big enough spaces to play with the kids
We had a great time!!!!

My first visit to the Star Park was for my classes “graduation” field trip. It was such a wonderful experience for the children, parents, and teachers. We played nonstop and the children never got bored! The party room for our lunch was set beautifully for the graduation lunch. The Star Park is a clean and welcoming environment and I would recommend it to any parent or teacher in the area!
Clean and fun play place! Lot of different areas for the kids to explore. The owners are so kind!
Such an incredible place for kids to play safely.  Lots of different activities to do . They have a cute party room as well! Definitely will come back here .
Such a cute little place for the kids to run free. Very nice.

It is a place where you can have a very fun time for  parents and children. My son loves this place very much. We spend 2 quality hours with ball pools and other toys. There are many things that can attract children's attention. We would also like to thank the smiling Starpark family.

We had my son’s second birthday party here. We were greeted by Haven, who was very energetic and nice. A lot of the guests for our party arrived late and the employees were mindful of this and allowed us to have our pizza/cake time after our designated time. We appreciated them extending that kindness. Our room was decorated nicely and I appreciated not having to add much to their standard decor. The overall play space is decent, albeit, it’s definitely on the smaller side. Our party room was meant for 10 children and 10 adults, but it was very tight and several of the adults didn’t feel comfortable coming in as it felt too cramped. For the price they charge, they should definitely allow kids to continue to play after the 2 hour party slot. They expect another $22 per child after  your $500 2-hr party… on top of that, the area remains open to the public and it gets way too crowded, especially when you have little ones. It costs about 2k to reserve the entire space. We were fortunate that it wasn’t too busy at the time we had our party but I wouldn’t bank on that being  typical experience for this place. All in all, the staff was friendly and helpful, the space was fun for small children, but definitely way too small and priced high.

I had my son’s fifth birthday party here and from the get go I was impressed by this place. They have a pamphlet with all the party options. With the party they decorate the room- and the basic decorations they supply are absolutely stunning. I got the basic birthday package and the ballon’s and decor were amazing. They even gave us invitations with a QR code to the waiver. The park itself is a blast, very clean, and meticulously maintained. The customer service was out of this world. Anything we needed they were there at a moments notice. When they saw my son’s cake was Mario themed they surprised us with Mario coming to the party. The kids were so excited. This was a party my son will never forget and I won’t either because the customer service and entire experience was out of this world. 10/10 cannot recommend enough.
friendly clean and accomodating

reviews.content: Amazing place! My son always has the best time at open play.The place is always very clean and the staff are always so friendly. They continue to update the play areas with new toys, can’t recommend this place enough. :)

A great place to bring your kids! We had a lot of fun and I highly recommend this place for its clean and vibrant atmosphere!

We had our daughter’s 3rd birthday party at Jungle Land and everyone had the best time. The space is clean, easy to find your kiddos, and perfect for toddlers. The staff was helpful and everything ran smoothly. Everyone had a blast and it made hosting really easy. Highly recommend for a birthday party.

Yesterday was our first experience at Jungleland and my son had an absolute blast!  There were so many things that caught his attention and after not being able to go outside for a couple of days it really helped him get his pent up energy out!  His favorite things were the twisty slide and the little tyke raceway!
My granddaughter had a wonderful time at Jungle Land! She loved the slides and jumping in the ball areas!
Jungle Land was the cleanest indoor playground I've been to! The owner was so friendly and helpful! We will definitely be back!!

We had such a great experience! I originally booked an open play session in March, but unfortunately, my whole household got sick and we had to cancel. I reached out to the email listed on the website to ask about a refund or rescheduling, and I received an immediate response. The owner was incredibly responsive and flexible, which I really appreciated.

We finally made it yesterday and had so much fun! The space was clean, not too crowded, and offered a variety of activities for little ones. My daughter had an amazing time. We’re already planning to come back soon! Thank you for creating such a wonderful space for families.

My 3 year old daughter and I love going to Jungle Land. We go at 11:30  am and she plays the entire time and with everything. It’s a smaller common space but spread out enough and has great play equipment for kiddos. I highly recommend! Also had my daughter 3rds Birthday Party and everything was perfect. Was worth every penny!

We had a great time with my 18-month old. They have a little bit of everything for different types of play, a separate area just for little ones (and another for even little littles), and you can easily see every inch of the play area. It felt safe and welcoming. We will definitely be back!
Perfect for little ones! Lots of things to do and love how clean everything is!

Jungle Land was amazing! The facility was clean, had plenty for the kids to do, and I loved that they had an entire dining area for families. The bathrooms were clean and even had toiletries for women.  I will definitely be visiting again!
Great place. My 5 y/os love it. Very clean! Perfect place for kids to play!

It was awesome. They also have a sensory room and everything was safe. My children ages 5 and 7 loved the birthday party they attended and had so much fun with the ball pit. Has swings and even an area for the little ones to eat.
Experience went very well. Staff is super friendly and very accommodating. My Daughter had so much fun. Very clean and very friendly and social crowd.

We love playing here! My kids are 3 and 6, and this place is perfect for them. I can bring my laptop and get a little work done too at the high tops. This is our go-to to get the sillies out and burn off energy when the weather isn’t great.

This place is perfect for my 19-month-old! The space is incredibly clean, which gives me peace of mind knowing that my child is playing in a safe and hygienic environment. The staff is attentive and ensures that everything is well-maintained throughout the day.

Extremely friendly staff. Very clean facility. We were on vacation and found this little place, they let us bring in outside food and drink and have a nice eating area. They also have snack (and coffee) options available which is awesome!
We'll come here every time we're in the area!

Jungle land is a very good place for kids, I have been here couple of times and my kids enjoyed alot.
However,
It is my sons birthday today which is on a monday and as they don’t offer birthday parties on Monday, I booked play for my 2 sons and 6 of his friends.

I called Jungle Land 1 time before booking and 1 time prior to coming on Monday for confirmation about few things, I asked them
if we can cut a cake, they told cake cutting is not allowed if it’s not booked for a party, which is understandable.
I also asked if I can get a balloon and click pics, the staff told yes I can.
I also asked if I can bring food and snacks
They told yes “any” food except for nuts.
I also checked website, it tells the same about food, “Please feel free to bring any food and drinks that you would like except nut products”.

I reached the venue without a cake as told by them
I got a number 3 balloon.,which they refused me to take inside, I agreed and kept back the balloon in my car.
I got pizza and noodles.
They told noodles are not allowed only pizza can be eaten, I agreed and kept back.
I agreed peacefully because I didn’t want my sons birthday to end on a bad note.

I just want Jungle Land to be more clear about the rules on there website and requests all the staff to be on the same page.
If they were clear about the rules, I would have only done what they expect, and it would have been the best experience.
It was so much fun! My kids loved it. The place is very clean and the staff is very sweet. We loved it.

reviews.content: I’ve visited many indoor playgrounds, but Kids Jungle World is one of my favorites! It's exceptionally clean and has a calm, welcoming atmosphere. It's a perfect place for toddlers to play, especially when the weather isn’t great outside. The colorful theme and variety of rides make it fun for both little ones and older kids. Everyone can enjoy at their own pace. I really like this place!
Nice small place for infants, toddlers and kids. Friendly staff. Affordable
Very cool and laid back place for the kiddos my girls loved it.

First time taking my child here, very cool place and parents can go on most of the equipment too! Staff was friendly and atmosphere was fun. I’d recommend cleaning the ball pits a bit more if possible but everything else was great!
So glad you had fun!!

A nice “play place” as my grandchildren call it. We’ve been a few times now and it’s always clean. The staff is very nice.
Some of the equipment could be updated.
We hope you had fun, let us know what we can improve upon to make your visit better.
So glad you had a good time, what could we do to earn that last star?
So glad you had fun, come back and see us soon!
Sorry that you did not have a great experience.  Please contact us and let us know what we can improve upon. (443)405-3747 Thank you!
I liked it, overall, frankly, and my boys boys have a lot of fun.
Great place for kids to enjoy!
So sorry you did not have a great experience with us, let us know how we can make your next visit better.

We visited Kidz Jungle World on Christmas Eve, and it was an absolute delight! Despite being a busy holiday, the staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, which made the experience even better. The play equipment was impressively clean, showing the care and effort put into maintaining the facility.

One of the standout features for us was the high weight limit on the equipment, allowing parents to join in the fun without worry. It’s also fantastic that parents enter for free – a thoughtful touch that sets this soft play centre apart from others.

The entrance fee being a whole-day pass is excellent value, and we appreciated the flexibility it gave us. Our two-year-old absolutely loved exploring all the different areas, and we would have stayed even longer if we didn’t have other commitments.

Overall, we had a wonderful time and would highly recommend Kidz Jungle World to anyone looking for a fun, family-friendly outing. It’s a perfect spot for kids to play, laugh, and burn off energy while parents can relax or join in. A solid 5/5 experience!

The tree swing was gone and the metal Zipline that my son lives was also broken. The floors felt sticky. I feel like this place is on the decline. I hope they get it together. Additionally, she went out of her way to show the kids how to fill the foam ball blower so that the balls cascaded everywhere to the delight of the children. The largest play structure has a variety of passages, but all of the entrances and exits are condensed toward the front for easy viewing from the two smaller play areas where parents would accompany younger children allowing them to also keep and eye on their older ones. We can't wait to go again in the future!

Fun place for the kids. Go early to avoid the crowd

This place is epic! Picture some of the coolest places Blippi goes to and then some! Multiple slides- one with cool lights and another that you go on a tube, trampolines, basketball on the trampolines, two jungle gym areas, rock climbing, big blocks, ball pit with a digital game, a tiny town, multiple spinning structures, arcade, wall games and probably more I am forgetting. This place truly has it all! There is ample seating for parents, free WiFi and they were cleaning the place non stop (spotless). The staff were so friendly too. Great mid week pricing specials if you can get there during the week. We can’t wait to go back!
Brought my 3 year old here for a mommy and son date for his birthday and he loved it. Cant wait to come back with his cousins
Everyone had a great time. Staff was friendly and the place was clean and well kept.

Attended a birthday party here. It was great. Small enough that the kids can play without parents hovering. And a great variety of fun activities for the children to engage in. Love the bright colors. I would have given 5 stars, however there’s a door to nowhere next to the trampolines that many kids were confused about. And right next to that are cubbies that are not attached to the floor or anything; that, when leaned on topple over. This is a major safety hazard, especially with all of the kids running back and forth. They should take the purple cubbies next to the dirt to nowhere and block that door, which would give the cubby stability and the kids no longer have a dead end when trying to find the entrance to the trampolines. Some signs on that side saying, “this way/that way” for the entrance to the trampolines might help as well. We got trampled, bumped into or had awkward looks given by so many sweet babies who were confused as to how to get to the trampolines.
