Junior Playland!
Located In Newton Square PA.
About 25 Minutes From Claymont DE.
A Space Themed Indoor Play Area!
My 6 year old loves space, so
We Decided To Give It A Shot …
Here is the REAL review!
This play area is THE BEST toddler play area we have been to recently.
TODDLER play area being the key word.
The have plenty of things to do for your little ones!
My 2.5 year old and my 6 year old LOVED it.
My 12 year old was not impressed at all.
They should make the age limit 10 honestly.
Because it’s not much for 12 year olds to do here.
They have a small trampoline area.
Trampoline area has 2 basketball hoops.
The soft play area is very interactive and fun.
They have multiple rock climbing walls!
The arcade is very lack luster.
Clearly that wasn’t the focus for this play area.
Birthday rooms on the second floor to accommodate birthday parties.
Overall Very fairly priced!
Very clean.
Staff was walking around wiping things down while we were in the building.
Staff were friendly.
Some of them looked miserable but who wouldn’t be getting paid next to nothing to listen to kids scream all day lol.
They do 2 hour time slots so it doesn’t get overcrowded.
This was the pricing for the weekend,
$16.99 ages 1-2
$21.99 ages 3-12
$9.99 6 -11 months
but free with a paying sibling
1 adult is  free per family.
$6.99 for each additional  adult. no in and out
2 hour open play Time slot are :  9am/11am/1pm/3pm/5pm
They do offer cheaper pricing on week days and all day passes on Fridays.
The bathrooms were clean!
They offered crocs to slip on at the bathroom and I thought that was very convenient.
They even had a toddler potty to help the little ones!
They do have refreshments.
They offer pizza and wings but do not have a kitchen they bring it in from a local business.
We had 3 slices of pizza, 3 juices, 2 star buck coffees in the glass bottle, and one can soda for $25. Very fair.
In total for tickets, food, drinks, and a few games we spent $100!
All in all it was fun and my younger kids had a blast!
We will definitely bring them back!
If you’re in the area or looking to try something new, give Junior play land a chance!
N/A
N/A

WOW! What a fabulous place. By chance, I saw the sign and stopped in to check it out. Couldn't fill out the waiver fast enough to my grandson's (4 yrs.) liking. We were not disappointed. So many things to do, extremely clean, friendly staff. Music playlist was well chosen and at perfect volume---enough to hear, if listening, but not intrusive if occupied in play. No shoes for all (including adults), and slip ons available at the bathroom entrances were impressive. We happened to stop by on a Friday. ALL-day play till 8:00 at a great price. We stayed 3. If not happy with the menu, you can leave and come back. Broad hours of operation (9-8:00-except Sunday till 6:00) make it convenient for most families.

I've only written 2 reviews online (including this one). If I could have given both higher stars, I would have. I went to their website when I returned home and was surprised to see the overall rating, UNTIL I read the reviews. Look people, Junior Playland just opened in November. They're still working out the kinks---to be expected. Refreshing to see management respond to some reviews. If you are going (by choice or necessity) on a Saturday (especially) or Sunday, of course, the place is going to be more crowded. Also, my opinion--be fair---1 bad/good review per group, then just don't go back, if not happy. Otherwise, it doesn't give an accurate overall rating. Let's face it---stuff happens. Management seemed fair in how they handled those situations. One last thing---it's the adult's responsibility to monitor their child's play. Remove them from a situation, if you don't feel comfortable. Needless to say, we'll be back often in spite of the hour ride to get there.

Love bringing my daughter here. Such a clean environment with so much to do, we have a membership and come almost daily and definitely get our moneys worth and more. The employees are so sweet and are always cleaning and sanitizing throughout the day which makes me and my wife feel comfortable having our kid play here. Thank you to the entire staff!!

Love this place! My 15 month old had fun and there was a lot for her to do. Love that there's lot of activities for her age as well as older kids. Love that the bathrooms were super clean and staff was frequently in there making sure everything was in order. Staff was also friendly. Of Course It was very crowded on the weekend due to birthdays but I was still able to have fun
Amazing day with the kids! My son is 9 and my daughter is 3 and they both loved it. Staff was great, even though it was busy. Very clean. A lot to do! Will definitely be back. Kids loved the pizza.

Amazing playspace in the PA/ Greater Philly area. My kids absolutely love going here, and we try to make it a weekly activity. From the rock climbing, slides, trampolines, merry go round, mini kids village, extensive seating for adults, food and drinks available, this place has it all!! Their staff is great, so helpful, attentive and fun. They also keep up with sanitation and cleaning. Socks only place, and they keep community crocs in restrooms so you don’t have to go in with socks. Genius idea! Love having this incredible, fun and friendly play space, a longtime void in this area!
Kids had so much fun. There are plenty of rides, jungle gym, and much more. The kids didn't want to leave. Great place for a party.

EDIT IN RESPONSE TO OWNER REPLY:

We tried to address it but you have been unresponsive to my email outreach and no phone call has been returned. You seem to only respond on Google reviews vs. actual outreaches. On the day of the party there was not a staff member on hand above high school age to assist or address our concerns. And the following day when I stopped by to discuss, you were again not available.

I don’t know who Ann is, but I’m sorry to hear she had a similar poor experience.

Having your friends post fake reviews to counter actual reviews from people who had poor experiences to try and stay above a 4 star rating is a questionable business practice.

ORIGINAL REVIEW:

Don’t recommend them for birthdays. They jam as much possible business into 1 hour room windows which robs people of set up time for their parties and also has new parties going into unsanitized rooms. The whole process is very chaotic and disorganized and if you aren’t actively policing the time yourself, they will not be helping you. There doesn’t appear to be an actual process they follow to support birthday parties.

They also do not have any process for crowd control. They sell two hour windows for play/parties, but they do not enforce a policy to actually ensure people leave after their window ends. This makes it unreasonably overcrowded, especially as the day goes on. Most places close for a period of time to ensure integrity of the play windows and allow parties the ability to get set up and not worry about encroaching on or being encroached on by other parties.

Other play places in the area are better positioned for these parties, and I would recommend choosing them for your sanity and to not waste $700 on a free for all setup.

This place is disaster! Disorganized and overly crowded. Upon checking in for a party, they didn’t even take our name or name of the party and just gave us a wristband. Dont know the capacity here but it was well over 200. No control here.
N/A

We hosted a birthday party at Juniors Playland for our 4 year old and it was so great! The staff was so helpful and so kind. They did an excellent job of assisting with set up and hosting the party. They also provided decorations and pretty much everything needed to have a great experience. The play space itself is vast and has tons to do for all ages. Would highly recommend all around for either a fun play date or to host a birthday party!
Kids loved it, it was very clean. Like any indoor play place, you have to go during off hours. Yes you do have to watch your own kids, which is terrifying for some I’m sure.
Overcrowded to a point of safety concerns…

Absolutely terrible experience having my toddler’s birthday party here.

First thing we walked in and it was absolutely packed and way over capacity. People were not even getting checked in nor were time slots being verified. It was absolute chaos all over the play areas

When it was time for our party room there was zero coordination. I had to find our room myself and get all our guests into the room (they told me the wrong room number) AND THEY LOST ALL OUR FOOD AND CAKE. An employee literally walked me from party room to party room looking to see if other parties were being served and eating our food! Finally they took me down to the area behind the desk where they all proceeded to just stand there yelling at each other with no one knowing where our stuff was. Eventually I walked past the arguing employees and went to look for it myself and found it was tucked in the back of the storage area.

Even though we were within our guest count for the package we purchased there was not enough room in our room, we had guests sitting on the floor eating pizza with their kids. Additionally, our package included juice and utensils, which we never got and had to ask for forks for our cake ourselves.

When we asked to talk to a manager a teenager came over and said “it’s not our fault”

Upon returning back home, we realized that an employee had collected some of the gifts from our guests when they entered but we never received them. So our daughter is now missing some of her birthday gifts.

I was so embarrassed by this entire party and I spent the night apologizing to our guests and sending up follow up apology messages to our attendees. For how much we spent on this I cannot believe this is what we got…

EDIT IN RESPONSE TO OWNER’S RESPONSE:
I disagree with this rebuttal, the owner was not present so I am relaying my experience. I personally was taken from room to room to look for our food while other people were having their parties (as I mentioned earlier). It was not located in five minutes and I was the one who found the food myself and had my husband personally go down to carry the cake up himself in fear of another mishap.

I did not mention the power outage as I understand this was not in anyone’s control and all the concerns I’ve outlined occurred prior to the power outage. However, if the gifts were meant to be delivered to the room as part of set up and the power outage happened after we were in our room, then how did the power outage affect visibility of the gifts in storage? It feels like the power outage is now being used as an excuse for bad services rendered throughout the evening.

For having spent almost $700, this was not the service i was expecting

They allow way too many people in at once putting in profit over safety and experience. Could be a cool place if it wasn’t a zoo. The baby toddler is inundated with too many adults and kids too big for the area instead of allowing the little ones enjoy. My nieces kept getting trampled. The flying ball thing in the center needs to move because you’ll get smacked in the face when walking by.
Always looks and feels like they're over capacity. Will be reporting them to the state & maybe they'll get their stuff together from now on
Went on Presidents Day.  They let way too many people in at the same time.  Seems like it could have potential if proper capacity is managed.

This was my grandchild’s birthday.  Our food was lost.  The child’s mother found it after 6 teenagers were trying to manage a clearly over capacity crowd and they were clearly overwhelmed.  A manager over the age of 18 should be onsite.  The power went out, which was out of everyone’s control but no one offer assistance or flashlights to illuminate very dark party rooms.  All in all a difficult experience, especially for the child.  We are rushed out of the room at the end of the hour with our guests telling us they left the child’s gifts with the front desk at check in.  Too bad the front desk did not deliver the gifts.

Edit in response to owner,
I was one of the last people to leave the place.  No gifts were left on the sidewalk as none of us were given a bag of gifts.  So, how did the gifts get outside on the sidewalk?
N/A
This place is so cool!! My toddler loves it. I appreciate the cleanliness, staff support on hand, and the extra bathroom amenities offered for a more comforting visit. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
It is the best place to enjoy with the little ones in the house. It is a dream place full of lots of fun.

Waiver process was long and convoluted,
Very nice place though, fun and memorable and plenty of space for adults to sit n watch or interact…. Food had to get better but all that may have improved after the temp sit down. I have to go back and see. Looking forward to it

First of all, fantastic price, especially including 2 free adults. We went on a Monday. Second of all, SO clean! Germ wipes everywhere, staff was using their spare time to clean, crocs to use in the bathroom so you don’t get your socks dirty. Third, staff was so happy and nice to us, very helpful! And fourth, GREAT equipment! The kids were in love with this place!! I wish they would open one in NJ where we live!

Amazing for birthday party. Your kids are gonna have lot of fun. I recently celebrated my daughter’s birthday and it was a hit. They have activities for all age groups. The best part was the sack slide and rock climbing. Party rooms are huge. And they give additional play time :)
Very clean and so much fun for both little and bigger kids!

First time going here, and the kids had a great time! I love how sanitize the workers were cleaning every hour wiping and moping , made me feel more safe since kids touch everything lol. But over all was a great experience, and the price was a fair price. Will recommend to all the mamas out there , kids will love it !!

Fun place for kids, definitely do not like that they have a kid police station and a jail cell. Inappropriate for a kid space.

My kids (3 and 10) had a blast but there’s definitely room for improvement. We did the 11-1 session on a Saturday and it was overcrowded. Kids were tripping over each other. Also it didn’t appear the 9-11 session got formally “kicked out” which could account for the overcrowding. It would be nice if they closed for 30 minutes between sessions to clean because nothing was in its right spot (eg. doctor kit in play hospital, food in play store). Also the layout feels tight, there’s a spinning attraction with balls hanging from it and people trying to walk by kept getting whacked. We’d probably go again but it would be nice if these kinks could be ironed out.}

reviews.content: Great place for the kids to play. Clean, well taken care of and the A/C is nice. My granddaughter had a blast. Well worth the money.

My son loves it! It’s a great idea. There are a couple things that need immediate attention like the street theme tiles do not have the film peeled so they’re super slippery which needs to be fixed asap. The outlets aren’t covered that are in reach of the toddlers and some of the corners of the shelves etc should be covered. Also a lottttt of the foam blocks are extremely chewed (inevitable) but should be removed. Maybe try to the blocks that are made of the fake leather instead of foam?

I took my kids today (4 and 6) for the first time and they had a blast. It was definitely worth it to pay for entry and do the waiver from my phone instead of waiting in line for their tablet. It’s absolutely going to be crowded and hectic in a weekend in the afternoon, but the kids did a fine job of working through it.

I would recommend that parents need to back up out of the way. If you’re the kind of parent that needs to stand over your kid while they’re in a space like this, I’d recommend you stay away for a bit. At one point there were so many parent hovering over kids in the ball pit or up in the play spaces, that it was hard for other kids to go down the slides and get around. Just give the kids some space while still keeping an eye on them and it will be fine.

I’d definitely go back.

WOW! Such a cute and fun place. This was my first experience at kidz4fun and I was blown away. My toddler left there kicking and screaming because he did not want to leave after almost 2.5 hours of play time! He fell asleep on the car ride home which means he really played hard. We had so much fun. I can't wait to come back!

We have gone twice now the first time was amazing so much fun the second was a little stressful it’s a smaller space so it gets crowded quicker I also think 12 years old is a bit old for this place as some of the older kids play kinda rough.
My daughter had a great time and didn't want to leave! The play area was clean and really cute. Will be back soon!}

Recently had a birthday party for my 6 year old with 29 kids. The experience was amazing!! The owner and staff were so responsive to all of my questions. They made our event feel stress free so everyone could enjoy the party. Would highly recommend this place!

This is an amazing place for families to enjoy, regardless of the day or weather! The indoor playground is impressively spacious, allowing for a fun experience without feeling overcrowded, even during busy times. There’s something to do for kids of all ages, and the staff are incredibly friendly and welcoming. Plus, the pricing is very reasonable. The only suggestion I have is for a baby changing station in the bathroom.

Wheezone is a nice addition to the indoor playspaces in the area. I recently had a birthday party for my two children ages 6 and 8 on a Saturday afternoon in February. We had 30 kids attend and Wheezone did a wonderful job handling all my party needs. Everyone had a great time, kids aged 2-12 for a great price!

All the staff I interacted with were friendly and very accommodating, starting with the owner. I had two party hosts, who took care of setting up the decorations and goody bags that I brought, passing out pizza and cutting the cake. All communication with the owner leading up to the day was handled seamlessly and quickly via email or via phone call, which I greatly appreciated.

I was set up in the back due to my larger party size, which was very spacious for kids to sit and eat and adults to sit while the kids played.

The food was delicious. I ordered Alfredo pasta, Chicken fingers, veggie pizza, meat lovers pizza, and cheese pizza. The icecream cake was enjoyed by all.

I highly recommend Wheezone for your kids party. You won't be disappointed!!!

Update: recently returned with my kids being 3,6&8 all had a great time again! I just want to say a LOT of children were climbing up slides creating a very dangerous situation for themselves and the children using them properly. My six year old did hurt her ankle because a child crossed over her slide climbing up while she was sliding down properly and she went into him very hard. The staff was making announcements to stop, however the same children repeatedly were not listening. They need to specifically go to these children’s parents and possibly remove the kids causing hazards if they can not listen. This should be a safe space for all kids and this was pretty disappointing it wasn’t handled better.

This was so fun! I have kids aged 2,5&7 and there’s was something for all of them. The toddler area kept my two year old super entertained. He had a blast. The bigger area kept my older two interested for a long time. They all want to return and really really had fun! Good pricing too, not expensive at all!

My family (kids ages 7, 4, and 3) absolutely loves Wheezone! We got a membership for the winter months, and it has been fantastic. The kids have a blast on the slides and in the ball pit, while I appreciate the single entrance for safety, the ability to wear our own grippy socks, and the reasonable pricing. Highly recommend!
Good place but needs a cleaning badly
Nice and clean indoor playground. My 2.5 year old loved the slides and the ball pit. The restrooms need proper maintenance

My daughter loves coming here, a monthly membership pays for itself in 3 visits. You can spend unlimited time here as long as you don’t leave and come back in the same day. Parents should wear socks even if you’re just going to sit at the tables bc to enter the play space beyond the lobby, you need to remove your shoes. Kids need grippy socks (available for 4.50).  It’s a shared space during birthday parties which can get busy and overwhelming.

Please remind your kids they’re not supposed to climb up the slides and not to aim air soft guns at people’s heads/faces. These are fun available attractions but are negative experiences when there are unsupervised rambunctious kids.

Wheezone offers snacks and drinks for purchase and asks patrons not to bring their own food in (but they’ve always let us bring our own water in). I think the menu also offers pizza, too.

Highly recommend Whee Zone! We just went for the first time recently, the facility is clean and fun for kids. No extra arcades, etc to have your kids ask you to pay for. You just need to bring (or buy from them) gripper socks, like they have for trampoline parks.
Whee Zone hosted my grandson's birthday party. The kids all had a great time! The hostesses were awesome! Be aware, there is a 10% service fee i overlooked when booking the party that was $71.
Great indoor play park for kids of all ages.  Wish there was a ball pit for the big kids, but amazing nonetheless.  You can’t beat $20 per kid for all day play!

Exellent fun place for kids. I went to birthday party with 3 yr & 8 yrs old. They both had blast. Playing area is very well maintained & very safe for kids. Very less crowded & clean premise. This is so far best playing zone among I have visited.

The owner told me I was going to “write a review anyways” so here I am, making him a man of his word lol

Use extreme caution when booking parties here.
We were given misinformation from a new employee (not her fault, and we understood that)
But the owner instead of taking accountability kept blaming his staff instead of admitting it being a management issue. We called a week before the party to confirm we get a private room so we could do an extensive set up. The girl took our info down and said yes I’ll have the owner send some pics so you can see how to do the setup.
Owner calls two days before the party to tell us he can’t accommodate us, gives a million excuses, blames his new staff when he should have gotten back to us well before 2 nights before our party. He made it very clear they were over booked and you could hear in his tone how stressed he was.
No more stressed then we were after he cancelled our party and we had 24 hours to find a replacement place.

You can tell this is a new business owner and I get how stressful that can be, but he was incredibly rude and didn’t offer solutions. It was take it or leave it! We don’t usually write reviews, but this was really just a bad experience all around.
Hoping he does better in the future when issues arise.

*Reply to the owners response*

First and foremost, your reviews appear to be mainly from one group of people, I’ll let the consensus decide if they are there based on truth or as a favor to you from friends/family. It is widely known that reviews are an important factor for businesses, and oftentimes owners will go to lengths of fabricating reviews to make their business appear to be something it is not. And I have a tiny suspicion that more honest, and real reviews will likely be coming through soon. Just a hunch!

And yes while it is true that I did book the party 5 days before the date we wanted, something you were so adamant in saying multiple times during one conversation, somehow implying that it was our fault for planning last minute. But certainly we don’t expect someone who is not able to take account for his actions to mention or admit it. Everything I said was factual, and yet you made no comments on those facts. But you admitted your employee spoke with you and you were supposed to return my call but you failed to do so until the day before our party. Had you reached out to us in a timely manner this would have never been an issue. Attached below is the log of when we called in to go over the extensive details for our party, to which we were told to go ahead and book, to which we did, at 11pm at night as you say. And we didn’t hear from you until right before our party. Shame on you for not taking accountability. And I don’t know a professional who would offer “prayers” in this type of situation. But, it does help establish some of your character. “Take it or leave it, or I’ll offer you prayers to portray myself as victim.” We sincerely hope you do better moving forward.

It was a great experience booking my son's birthday at Whee Zone. It was fairly easy to book the party online. A few days before the party, someone from Whee Zone called to confirm head count and to finalize any details. The day went smooth, everyone was super helpful, and they even deducted some things from the bill since we didn't end up using them. Thank you for helping us host a fun and memorable birthday!
Very nice place, new and clean. Except bathroom. Dear Managment, you have such nice place please fix the bathroom.

My son had his 4th birthday here. He loves this place and we have a monthly membership. It was so nice to have his party at a place where he feels comfortable and is able to navigate by himself. My guests were impressed as well and said their children had a blast! The owner was very helpful and worked hard to ensure we had a good experience.

The place was not busy at all for a rainy Saturday. It was clean and all the play area structures were well maintained and not worn out like other places I've been. The baby area is small but the whole place is great for toddlers. I have a 2 and 5 yr old and they had a blast. They have multiple slides, toddler ninja warrior obstacle, small ball pit and many different ways to climb up. Tables surround the play area if you don't want to chase them. Only wish they had a gate of some sort preventing kids from going to front lobby area/front door.

This place is great! Big enough for the kids but small enough for the parents so we can keep an eye on them if needed. Just remember to bring a pair of socks as they don’t allow anyone to wear shoes past the entry area. They also do not accept cash as payment.

My family came to celebrate my daughters 3rd birthday and we had a wonderful experience… it was a HUGE play structure with tons to do in it… I feel like I didn’t even see the whole thing following the kids around for a little bit inside… Annel the employee working was spectacular… she was extremely friendly and literally doing everything from checking people in, the snack bar, monitoring what was happening in the play area making sure kids were following rules while cleaning the place  and having nice conversations with the customers… she should receive high recognition for being a great employee … my only recommendation for the place is to install some high sanitizer stations around the seating areas
Fun place ....clean ....nice people...

We hosted our daughter’s birthday party at Whee Zone yesterday. It was an incredible experience from start to finish and we couldn’t have been happier with the outcome. Great play space for kids! Perfect for kids ages 4-10 who have aged out of toddler focused play spaces, but safer than dealing with older kids at the bounce/trampoline places. We recently celebrated our daughter's birthday party here. We had close to 22 kids + 25 adults. The kids had an amazing time. We chose the 10am slot in the morning, and that worked out perfectly as we had the place to ourselves. It was amazing to see the parents join the fun with their kids. Everyone who came had praised the cleanliness in the kids' area. I'm sure that some of them will come back with their kids as it's a great place for kids in South Brunswick & Franklin Park neighborhood. All the parents had a place to sit while their kids had fun. Layla (hope I got the name right)was an amazing host. Layla made sure that we focused on the guests. The food (that we ordered for the adults)was amazing as well.
One suggestion to the owner: we felt Layla could've used 2 more ppl (for the no. of guests that we had) to help as needed.
N/A

It's a really fun place for the entire family, obviously for kids! The play area is pretty big and fits well for kids of various ages. My 2.5-year-old kid had no trouble with the obstacles and had so much fun! I would really recommend it.
Great place for kids! The location is super clean which is nice. Owner is very friendly and accommodating.

Whee Zone has been a huge blessing for all of us living in Franklin and Kendall Park! My kids are fully enjoying their monthly membership since we are visiting on a regular basis. Every time is a new adventure for them. The owner and staff are all extremely friendly, patient, and easy to talk to. We have shared some suggestions for their facility and they have been very welcoming every time we come! It's a clean, kid friendly and safe environment. I highly recommend this place!

Whee Zone is exactly what our town needed! Clean, fun and spacious play center with plenty to do to keep your kids busy! The staff were extremely accommodating, and made our experience even better. My kids cannot wait to go back!

My son had a blast,  he loved this place.
Nice n clean.

Just hosted my daughter’s 5th birthday party and I had to write a review. The owner was incredibly patient and extraordinarily responsive - he made the last minute planning so easy. The play area is huge and it is great for kids of all ages, even parents were joining in the fun!! The space is clean and well lit, the owner made all of the accommodations for my large party of 30 kids plus parents. The food was amazing! Which is rare for kids parties. Everything was incredible, and I am so appreciative of the support - THANK YOU THANK YOU!!

It is great to see a playspace for kids in the greater Princeton area. My kids love this place. We arrived early, and at first, there weren't many kids. Soon, the playspace was bustling with at least 40 or more children (possibly due to a party being hosted). Despite the crowd, the space is very spacious and doesn’t feel crowded at all. After exploring for more than 2 hours, my kids ate better than usual.

A tip for parents: bring a pair of anti-slip socks. When young kids run fast, they may fall around the corners.

Some advice for the owner: consider offering a punchcard in addition to the monthly membership fee. More business options for parents are always good.

It's nice having an indoor playground in the neighborhood and the playground is fun.  My toddler had a great time and we will definitely go there more often.  Only one thing - it would be great if the place enforces socks policy, we saw some parents walking around with their barefoot, it made us a bit uncomfortable.
Awesome fun place for kids and everyone!

We just went for the first time with my 9 and 6 year old! They both had such an amazing time! There is so much to do. Very spacious and clean! And staff was super helpful and nice! Great place for kids to have some fun!
Amazing location and very clean!! The location is spacious and is a great entertainment value for the kids. The owner is very friendly and takes care of his guests!!

I just had the pleasure of visiting the newly opened "Whee Zone" Indoor Kids Play Area in South Brunswick, and it truly exceeded my expectations. As the first indoor play area in this region, it has set a high standard for fun and entertainment for children.

One of the most impressive aspects of Whee Zone is the unlimited play time. Unlike other indoor play locations that impose time restrictions, Whee Zone allows kids to play to their heart's content. This is a significant advantage for parents and caregivers who want to give their children ample time to explore and enjoy.

The play area itself is fantastic, offering a wide variety of activities and equipment that cater to different age groups. From climbing structures and slides to ball pits and interactive games, there is something for every child to enjoy. The environment is clean, well-maintained, and designed with safety in mind, providing peace of mind for parents.

The staff at Whee Zone are friendly and attentive, ensuring that the play area is supervised and that children are safe while having fun. They also offer water for purchase at the front desk, which is convenient. However, the only downside we experienced was the non-functional drinking water fountain. This might be due to the fact that the facility is still new, and I hope it will be operational soon to provide free water access for visitors.

Overall, Whee Zone is an amazing addition to South Brunswick. It offers a fantastic play experience with the unique benefit of unlimited play time, making it a go-to destination for families. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a fun, safe, and engaging indoor play area for their kids.

My wife and I took our two year old to Whee Zone today (just opened a day or so ago) and we had a blast. The Toddler area was really nice and the ball pit was a hit with all the kids I saw playing in it. The three level structure was really cool and had great ways to climb up that were safe (there were no unexpected drops in the floor that I've seen in other indoor play parks). You go so fast in the slide in the center, I was really surprised but stopped easily and safely at the bottom from the mat on the floor.

Overall, very impressed. I also like that this location is only minutes from my house. I spoke a little bit with the owner who gave me some background on Whee Zone. He was very nice and asked for any feedback we could give. Here's some feedback, we will definitely be back!

Grand opening of a local play place.

Pros: Location is awesome! Much needed in this area. Spacious and fair amount of seating for individuals not playing. Very cool air guns to shoot foam balls, overhead basket which can be filled with foam balls and dumped out causing a rain shower of balls that delight the kiddos.  Many areas to climb, jump, tuck away! Good visibility to caregivers below to see within the various areas.

Discount fair for the grand opening was cool too.

Cons: The theme fell short for me. Wild West theme with numerous images of guns blaring, cigarette smoking outlaws! There is a punching bag designed to look like beer.  An indigenous person floor standing punching bag for the kids to jump on and knock over, kick around, etc. So many children themes to choose from (animals, aquatic, cars, construction) but beer and guns. The children didn't seem to notice but I did.

This can be remedied with a few swaps for cactus, tumble weeks, art work for wagons, dessert animals. Even outlaws without cigarettes & guns.

Came here today on their opening day. Place is very clean and good size. So much for the kids to do. Staff is super nice and friendly. They have a seating area with tables as well. Definitely recommend coming here!}

reviews.content: Our experience was exceptional. The staff was so polite and helpful. The food was excellent and everything was clean.I'd recommend this place
Great place to take the kids !!!

No words to explain how awesome this place is. My 20 month old loves it so much. Sometimes as a mom you can lose yourself to being just a mom, but chasing my little one through the jungle gym really brought back my childhood and the child in me. Reminded me of the 90's when you had parties at a pizza place and you could run off and play or do arcades. It's very organized and clean. The staff are friendly and it's very safe. I would recommend this place to anyone, especially a mom that needs to get out and socialize. Food is delicious!

I love Cabin Fever and every thing the bring to the community. They took the stress out of the entire party, and all of the kids had a great time.  I cant recommend them enough.

We had my daughters Birthday Party there and Richard and Malachi greated us, offered a cart  helped bring in everything for the party.  We had dropped off decorations and the team had the party room all set.  They did a great job.  They played out how they suggested the event played out (play first, food, Birthday then game room).  We had 13 kids of different re at ages and they all loved the different areas in the play room.  The sensory quiet room was a big hit as well.  My kids came full of energy and left tired.  Win win!!!

When they made an announcement the the food was ready, the team swept in and quickly got the kids food, we sang and the team was able to distribute cake in an orderly fashioned in no time.

It was a smooth transition to the game room. They passed them out right before tidying up the room.    They recently got some new games for all kids ( and myself) of all ages.

Clean up was a breeze all we had to do was get the leftovers and gifts to the car.  Easy Peasy and the kids had a blast.  5 start great place for a kids to have fun and get out some excess energy.

I cant thank the entire team at Cabin Fever for a great experience.  Thank you so much!!!

very clean facility & you can tell the employees love the children as well!
my son had a blast today! definitely will be going back!

This was a great spot to take the kids to for a break while on vacation.

They had multiple climbing things and an arcade.  The place was clean and the staff was very nice.  They also had a place to purchase food, snacks, and drinks.

Our granddaughter was visiting from out of town and of course it was hot and so humid; so we needed to find a place we could take a two year old to enjoy playing.
Well, we hit the jackpot with Cabin Fever Play Center.  It is perfect for children of many ages.  They have a toddler area where younger ones can play, climb, build, and interact together.  The main play area is incredible! It has two slides that I noticed.  One right in the center and a spiraling tube slide towards the back.  There were swings within the gym the children could swing on, a "bug mat" to jump on the moving bugs, and stationary air guns that shot out nerf balls.  The stationary air guns ended up being one of my granddaughter's favorites.
There was also an arcade area in the back with a cafeteria area too.  The pizza was amazing!!!  We loved the seasoning on the crust ♡
There are massage chairs for parents or grandparents to utilize, too.  There was a room where the children could make their own stuffed animal friend.
What a wonderful place for children to be children and play together.  The facility was very clean, and everyone working there was so incredibly kind.
We will definitely be back again when my granddaughter is back in town.  Thank you for this amazing place for children to come play and enjoy themselves.  There needs to be more of these around different cities for the children.
N/A
The best!!! Such a great place to take the grandkids... Plus they have wine and massage chairs. Their pretzels didn't suck at all... Highly recommend!!!!!!

Extremely kid friendly environment! I took my kids on a week day when it wasn't so busy. My 3 children were able to run about the play area and do their own separate activities and I was still able to keep up with where each of my children were. There were a few of the local regulars there when I took my children and they were very respectful young adults, they were great with children, and I honestly thought these you g adults worked at Cabin Fever judging by the way these young adults conducted themselves. It was very comforting to me, considering anytime I take my children somewhere I am the only adult present to keep up with all 3 of my children. The lady that ran the place was very helpful with getting us checked in and went above and beyond by helping me setup my first time funful membership. The place was clean, well set up, and the layout was safe... There is only 1 way in or out of the building and no blind spot areas. A parent can sit at the tables and see every part of the children's play area. The combination of safety, cleanliness, and service of Cabin Fever really impressed me and I will be taking my children back often! Businesses like this one really do stand out and make a huge difference in the community!

I held my daughters 3rd birthday here today. Me and my family have been here one other time, and were completely SOLD. Today just sealed the deal! Everyone was so sweet and considerate from the very beginning! They made sure they went above and beyond to make sure everything was clean and prepared! They had the complete itinerary planned, but always confirmed with me prior to calling the announcements. Everything has gone absolutely smooth as a whistle this entire experience, from the first visit until now. The pizza was delicious and my party loved it. I have never had a smoother child's birthday party!  We all really liked it especially since  the parents got to stay and play too! We got card credits for the arcade so the bigger kids (and husbands) got to have fun more their age! They even had an alcohol menu which was great for the parents! They even had their version of a build-a-bear, that wasn't there the last time we went, so it was a super great surprise!! And the kids loved it! Everyone that got the bear got a discount too! reviews.content: We had our daughter’s birthday party here and it was a great experience, the owner was extremely kind and very helpful.  Mia the party helper was very patient and kind with all the kids. I highly recommend having a party here it will not disappoint.
Exceptionally clean and well maintained play place for kids! We love we rock the spectrum! The owners are so sweet and kind. So many different things for kids to do they never get bored.

So much here to engage children! There truly is something here for everyone up to about 8 yrs old. Socks are required, a good thing. I didn't like that perhaps the playroom wasn't as clean as it has been in the past as clumps of hair was always clinging to our socks, despite pulling it off numerous times. I would recommend that socks be removed when kids climb on any of the apparatuses that have round, smooth rungs. Too much of a slipping hazard!
Had a blast celebrating our son’s birthday this past weekend! We rock the spectrum is such a great place to celebrate and let your little ones play and explore :)

We’re so happy we found We Rock the Spectrum!

We recently celebrated our daughter’s birthday at Spectrum Playground, and it was absolutely AMAZING! From start to finish, everything exceeded our expectations. The venue is perfect for kids and adults alike, with plenty of fun activities to keep everyone entertained.

The staff was incredible—so friendly, professional, and helpful! They assisted us with decorations and organizing the event, making the whole experience stress-free and enjoyable. They truly went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfect.

All of our guests were blown away by the atmosphere and how smoothly everything ran. The kids had an absolute blast exploring the playground, while the adults could relax and enjoy the festivities.

If you’re looking for a fun, family-friendly venue for a birthday party or any celebration, I highly recommend Spectrum Playground! It was an unforgettable experience, and we can’t wait to come back!

The environment is warm and welcoming, and you can tell the staff truly cares about creating a safe and inclusive space for families. It’s such a wonderful resource for the community. We’re already looking forward to our next visit—highly recommend checking it out!

We rock the spectrum is an amazing place to bring your kids with no judgement. The owners Nikki and Trey, truly put their whole heart and soul into their business. It’s always super clean and my kids have a great time. Thanks we rock for providing such an amazing space for all kids to play!

I attended a 5 year old’s birthday party with my 3 children, one of whom is 11 months old and requires a high chair. I asked the front desk if they had any high chairs, to which they told the party host it would be another $12.99 “add-on”. Considering they had already paid almost $500 to rent the space plus $200 in pizza, I didn’t want to burden them with another unreasonable fee. Literally every restaurant in the world has high chairs available for free, so charging a “rental fee” is unreasonable.

The website for We Rock The Spectrum says that you get 2 hours, but in reality you only get 1 hour of play time plus 1 hour for pizza/cake. In reality, this was a late afternoon party and most of the kids were done eating fairly quickly (or had already had lunch and weren’t hungry) and could’ve continued playing, but the staff did not hesitate to corral us into the small party room and tell the kids they wouldn’t be returning to the play area.

Overall this place is very disappointing if you’re attending or hosting a birthday party.

We had my son’s birthday party at Rock the Spectrum in Forest Hill. I cannot say better things about our experience there! They made things so easy for us. It was the perfect amount of time, the owners were super helpful, communicative, organized and most of all the kids had a blast. I highly recommend! We will be having future parties here.
Clean, fun place for kids
Thank you for taking the time to review us! Hope you will come again soon.
Thank you for your review!
Fun place. Great way to spend time with my grandkids. Place is clean and well maintained. Staff is friendly.
Thank you for your five-star review!
Thank you for your five-star review!
Thank you for your five-star review! Hope to see you guys again soon!
Thank you for your five-star review!
Kid didn’t die 10/10

Lots of fun for our little one, with a variety of equipment.  Watch carefully when approaching the building; the sign is easy to miss.  We Rock the Spectrum is on the ground floor floor of a housing development between Kohl's and APGFCU.
Very clean and wonderful staff

Just left there, where we had a great birthday party for our 5yr old granddaughter. Workers were absolutely amazing and accommodating. Plenty of different activities for all different ages (we had kids from 1-7yrs of age). Definitely give them a try!

Such a fantastic place to take kids. The staff are amazing, so kind and attentive. My boys have such a wonderful time playing and always manage to make a new friend. The love the zip line! The facility is clean and very well maintained. We have been here for a group party and open plays. An awesome place ran by awesome people.
Amazing place for kiddos to play. Price was great, staff were warm, friendly, and interacted beautifully with all the kiddos who were there to play today. We will definetly be returning!
Alot of sensory activities but fun for everyone
Excellent.Run by husband and wife. Very pleasant. Very helpful. Great place to take the kids !

Wonderful establishment! Family run business by some of the kindest people- Nikki, Trey and their children. We have come for open play, private play, and other programs such as storytime and preschool prep. We love the special events they put on in addition to the fun play and explore environment. Lots to do and a great way to get your children active through a variety of play options- swings, toys, creative play, jumping, climbing, zip line, and more.

My 4 yo says “I love everything” and “I love the outside of the gym (it means I love the colors!).”
Thank you for your five-star review!
Thank you for taking the time to review us! Come again soon.
Thank you for taking the time to review us! Come again soon!
Great place for any kid to learn grow and play. More open play based but they do have scheduled times that are class based. Drop off times and party based times also!

My family was just there and we absolutely love it. My special needs son was very much at home and my kids and their friend had a blast. I will be adding this to our weekly summer plans.

I would love to add that we just had my son's birthday party there and we couldn't be happier with the staff and how much fun the children have here. I highly highly suggest you have a party there.
Thank you for your five-star review!
Thank you for your five-star review!

reviews.content: My son and mi daughter enjoy to much is good place for kids
N/A

We have been regulars at Totsville for some time now and it is a great place to take the kids! The price is cost effective and you get your money’s worth with the amount of time you can spend and the experience for your little ones. The place is clean and often workers are walking around vacuuming which is nice to see! The sand pit is a super plus and keeps the children entertained for hours. The play structure is also engaging and inviting for the children. There is a separate space for younger children which is nice to have for the little ones. It is never overly crowded and is the perfect way to engage in play!
Had a great time! Staff are great! Especially Annie! She was so sweet and kind! We will be coming back!
Love the place
N/A
N/A
Kids had a blast!! Great service.
N/A
Employees were friendly and helpful. Play ground has lots of activities for the little ones. My daughter had an absolute blast and always wants to come back!
N/A

I frequently visit that place and have never had any problems, but the cashier did a terrible job. I don't want to think it's because of my Hispanic race, but I didn't receive the same treatment as other people. I recommend the place, however, she is very rude. You can check her cameras if you want, she knows it.
My almost 2 yr old son and niece had fun. This place is actually really clean. My 10 month old niece was able to crawl around with no problem. We will be going back.

My almost 2 year old loved it! There was so much for him to do and it was VERY clean. I was pleasantly surprised.

Annie at the front desk was super welcoming. We will definitely be back!

Thank you totsville!
Nice place for the kids my son loved it. Will be coming again.

Needed something to do on a rainy day with my 12-month-old, and this was perfect! Had plenty of things to do that were his size and safe, and I liked that it was only for kids under 7 so he was with other little ones. Was totally worth $9!
N/A
Workers were kind, plenty of other children, facilities were clean.
Facility is clean. Workers are friendly and helpful! Would come again!

Thank you for the great review! We’re glad you had a positive experience and that our team and clean facilities stood out. We work hard to make Totsville a fun and welcoming place for families, and we appreciate you noticing. Hope to see you again soon!

Best,
Nalini
Manager, Totsville Playground

My 2.5-year-old loved it. It was large enough for him to navigate independently while remaining visible to me during play. Like most play gyms, it smells like a gym, and the bathrooms weren’t as inviting as they could have been. However, overall, the play fixtures and sandbox were a hit with my little one. We’ll be back.

Great and friendly environment.  My 1-year-old had a great time. What I love is you're allowed to join your child in going down the slides if they need assistance,  not many places allow that. I will be returning weekly with my son.
Love taking my kids here.

Clean, tidy, and friendly staff! Everyone was in such good spirits. I thought my toddler might be too wild for an indoor playground, nope we fit right in!

Apparently I was wrong I am amending my previous review. Upon our most recent visit, there is now the playground police at Totsville. "Don't touch this, don't touch that." If you don't want children touching something maybe don't put it at an indoor playground. An employee grabbed a toy from my toddler but did absolutely nothing when another larger child hit my 18 month old. I don't think we will be returning, no matter how clean the facility is.

This is the perfect indoor playground for kids 7 and under. They have a ball pit, slides, jungle gym and a huge sand pit which is our favorite!  The staff is very friendly, helpful and engaging. It is also very clean.

This is a very nice place for kids to play safely and wonder everywhere. There is a ball pool, lots of slides and giant sand box with lots of toys. Everything looks very clean. I spent 2 hours there and I've never done that before in any other playground.
My kids and I had a amazing time they asked the next day are we going back to the playhouse lol. The staff was very friendly and alert to all the kids  I really appreciate it  amazing time thank you
Totsville was amazing! My nephew loved each section to play in. The facility was clean and welcoming.
The kids love the sandbox. The staff are friendly.

I have always struggled to find a place where my daughter can play throughout the entire area. Many of the places are geared towards older children. TotsVille is set up for younger children. My 2 year old was able to play in the entire place. There were multiple areas where she could play in and 3 slides! What I really loved was that the staff was cleaning while we were there. You could see how clean everything was! I enjoyed taking my daughter and she absolutely LOVED it!
Great for kids 5 and under. My 20 month old and 3 yr old had a blast. Everything felt clean and safe.
Great

My daughter loves this place!
They keep it clean and the sandbox is fun & cool!

Concerned that a celebrating Birthday group of 8 yr olds would find TOTSville too baby-fied, I soon found out otherwise. They ABSOLUTELY LOVED IT !!! and, they are all STILL talking about the FUN TIMES they had that day !  It rained that morning ... An outside party would've been a disaster. No worries being inside, as I watched it raining ! The Staff made sure everyone was having a great time, too ! Megan and Elvin explained everything so well to me, when the arrangements were being made - answering all 100 questions I had ! An A+ to everybody at TotsVille ! ⭐👍🥇
This place is spacious and clean. There are plenty of things to do. My son loved the sand pit. He also enjoyed the bubble party.

My one year old and I had so much fun! There are a great range of age appropriate toys and plenty of room for him to crawl around safely. He loved rolling into the ball pit and I really appreciated there being a toddler area for him! Management is very friendly, kind and goes above and behind for families. Great first impression :)!

Thank you so much for the great review! We’re thrilled to hear your little ones had a blast and that you felt the space was clean and safe—that’s exactly what we strive for. We hope to see you and your family back at Totsville soon!

Warmly,
Nalini
Manager, Totsville Playground

Exceptional experience! I have a little under 2 years old , and the play space was so welcoming for her to explore and try new things. The play space is clean and tidy , well structured and organized. I loved the atmosphere for my little one. It wasn’t too overwhelming or overstimulating and the staff were very personable and friendly. We will 100% be back. 10/10 Highly recommend!
My daughter had a blast will definitely go back

Thank you so much for the great review! We’re thrilled to hear your little ones had a blast and that you felt the space was clean and safe—that’s exactly what we strive for. We hope to see you and your family back at Totsville soon!

Warmly,
Nalini
Manager, Totsville Playground

We had a fabulous time❤️ The young man working the front was very helpful and kind, even when it came to our 10 year old playing in the small area, he approached dad calm and quietly and expressed the rules and regulations for the tot area and dad relayed the message to baby girl. It was so refreshing because you have so many adults fast to approach a child and he didn't, he approached the parent as needed and was very sweet about it. I seen another young lady vacuuming keeping the area clean for the little ones. It was really fun and we didn't want to leave. We will definitely be back💗💖 Thank you totsville.

Just left there and We had a blast. They did an amazing job with time management and getting all the activities done with the kids plus the decoration was 👌🏿. The the kids got Pizza wasted. Today was a Great Day. Thnx again 10/10. …
Safe clean place for kids to play

Thank you so much for the great review! We’re thrilled to hear your little ones had a blast and that you felt the space was clean and safe—that’s exactly what we strive for. We hope to see you and your family back at Totsville soon!

My 2 year old had a great time here! An indoor sand pit is such a great idea, kept my daughter entertained for hours! Friendly staff, and there's also coffee available for parents
Great place to take the kids. Reasonably priced, staff was very friendly. Will definitely return.
Super clean, very friendly staff, great equipment!
The sandbox was too sandy

Took my granddaughter here for a play day. Had a ball. Its not a large place but the place is very clean, staff are super friendly and snacks are not over-priced. The sand play area is very unique and a nice touch, different from other places that only have the playground area.

Our grandson had a 3 year old birthday party here.  The experience was great. All of the children enjoyed the play area and the separate sand area.  The place is very well kept. Clean and in order. The staff was wonderful.  They were always around making sure everything was OK or if we needed anything.  The separate food / party room was well maintained and clean. The pizza that was a part of the party package was very good.
Have your party here or just bring your children here for a great day out of playtime.

Thank you so much for the great review! We’re thrilled to hear your little ones had a blast and that you felt the space was clean and safe—that’s exactly what we strive for. We hope to see you and your family back at Totsville soon!

Warmly,
Nalini
Manager, Totsville Playground
The play areas were very clean and the children had lots to play with, lots of choices.
Clean space with good equipment. Our 2.5 year old loved it.

This place is awesome, my daughter is 1.5 years old & always has a blast. She loves the sand pit with all the toys and kids of all ages. This place is great for kids 1 & up. With them being open later than other places is an added bonus.
The staff are so sweet and it's so clean!
Very clean and the young lady who worked there was very helpful and pleasant.
It was great but they don't monitor the kids at all.

Thank you so much for the great review! We’re thrilled to hear your little ones had a blast and that you felt the space was clean and safe—that’s exactly what we strive for. We hope to see you and your family back at Totsville soon!

We've always loved coming here with our son. We just had his 3rd Birthday Party at Totsville and it was the best. The staff were so friendly and took care of virtually everything so we could just relax and enjoy. They went all out on the decorations for the theme we chose to
All the kids had a blast and I would absolutely recommend the party packages to anyone

We were there today with our 3 year old for the first time and open play. All of the staff was absolutely amazing and super friendly. You can tell they loved being there with all the kiddos. We had a great time and bonus: their plushies at the front desk were a bargain! We got ourselves our favorite Llama Llama
My daughter enjoyed her time and seeing Mini was my highlight.
N/A
The owners are wonderful and really care about the babies that come. My granddaughter loves ❤️  coming here. I have fun, too.
I had a great time visiting with my grandchildren on Sunday. There was plenty for them to do and the fun never stopped..
N/A
Very nice people and have great customer service!!! Will be back again!!!

We went with kids ages 1-5 and all of them loved it! It is perfect for younger kids. By capping it at age 8 it keeps older kids from running around, allowing our littlest friends to play. It was amazingly clean. The bathrooms were right off the main play area making bathroom breaks easy. Everything is padded to avoid injuries. My kids had an absolute blast and we will definitely be back.
We had a great time today and everything was clean, however, does the first hour or so, the capacity felt over-sold, and I was stepping over and crashing into parents and kids.
Loved it and Very clean! The Staff is super friendly! Definitely recommend.
N/A
My kid loved it. Had a great time and so much fun!
First time going to the location— but was glad that I went.  The area was easy to access and was easy to enjoy the area without issues. I would recommend if you are looking for something new and fun!

It’s literally best place for toddlers.
The staffs are very helpfull and i like they have the coffee machine and the microwave. !
Best place for kids. My 3 year old played for hours.

Our first time visiting and won’t be the last. It’s a perfect size for plenty of activities for kids to enjoy, but not too big where parents can’t keep a close eye. The owner was very friendly and was actively watching the center to ensure guests were enjoying themselves.

We are happy we made the trip!😊
The staff were so nice. Everything was clean and easily accessible. I’m bringing my kiddo back.
Fun and clean place for toddlers!

Kiddo loved the big sandbox and all the toys in it! She's 2, so particularly I liked the *idea* of the area by just for smaller kiddos. But the one downside was there was no real enforcement of that, so as the morning went on and more kiddos showed up, there was a group of bigger kids sprinting around, including in that area, as I saw more than one kid (including her) get knocked down by them not paying attention (and unfortunately their grownups didn't seem to be paying much attention, either, to helping direct them to better areas to run around/reminding them to be careful of others).
My son had most fun time here! Will definitely come back and the price is amazing for all the space! I honestly have never seen either of my sons so exhausted :)
N/A
N/A
N/A
Staff was super friendly and helpful, the place felt clean and not overcrowded and both kids (18 months and 2 years) had plenty to keep them busy the whole time!
N/A
First time here. Nice indoor playground. Price was nice for the first time Wacky Wednesday 1/2 off. Our 15 month old grandchild needs a little more experience to get the whole effect. I am exhausted.
N/A
N/A
N/A

Very adequately sized for an indoor playground, The sand box was a nice touch! They did have to close a couple hours for a party, but there is a mall close by we could walk and snack until they opened again. Facilities were clean and the employees were nice, we will definitely be back!
N/A
Great experience. Staff was so Friendly. Lots of cute toys, snacks to purchase. Place was clean and equipment was taken care of. Will be returning!!
Loved this place! My grandson had a wonderful time! Lots to do. Clean friendly place
N/A

We really enjoyed this place. I have an almost 2 year old who loves to climb and let loose. I liked this place because it’s built for kids under 8 only. Its climbing areas are only 1 story tall so it’s easy to spot your child from the ground. They have great slides, ball pits, a giant sandbox and some really cool tubes. One thing I was impressed with was the cleanliness. The floor was spotless. The staff were courteous, there was even a coffee machine, not that we used it. They also had an area where they can climb a wall, build blocks, etc. It was crowded but not so much that he couldn’t enjoy himself and I didn’t lose track of him. They also had a bubble machine which was kind of cool to see go off every once in a while. I think we would definitely go back to this place.
Our kids had an amazing time. The place was clean and the staff very friendly and personable.

Totsville was a hit with both my boys, aged 2 and 7 years old. I love that you can sit at one of the tables provided and see the entire play area. There is a separate area for babies and toddlers, which is really nice. Also, the indoor sandbox is huge, and such a fun feature! The facility was not too crowded, even though we were there on a holiday, and everyone was so kind. They have refreshments and snacks available for a small price, in case you forget to pack your own, and toys and treats available for purchase, as well. Love this little gem, we’ll definitely be back! 💎

My 2 and 4 year old love it here. And I love the friendly customer service. When we arrived, the two employees were so kind. You can tell they work hard to keep the place clean and positive environment. One of the employees notice me and my family waiting in a long bathroom line and offered to lead us to the extra bathroom downstairs. Above and beyond!

Save yourself the time and disgust and keep your children away from Totsville Indoor Playground in Glen Burnie. The entire place completely reeks of urine and you can literally feel the moisture from the grimey carpet on your feet. The equipment was broken and obviously dirty. $30 and we only lasted 20 minutes due to the smell and overall condition of the place. Today was the first time I went in years and it will definitely be my last.}
