reviews.content: I brought my kids here for free play.  I was immediately impressed with the facility: cleanliness, design, functionality, and quality of the equipment.  I decided to have my daughter's 5th birthday there.  It could not have been better.  The room was decorated based on my daughter's preferences.  They handled everything outside of the food.  It allowed me to be more present and available for my kids and guests.  Highly recommended for a day of indoor play or birthday party!

I took my grandson to play on a holiday, so I wasn't sure what to expect. I was pleasantly  surprised.  The entire center was immaculate.  NOTHING IN THE PLAY AREA WAS BROKEN, CHIPPED OR INOPERABLE.  The play areas, bathrooms and seating for adults was clean and well cared for. The staff was friendly. During our  visit, staff were cleaning benches and other seating.  My grandson had an awesome time. We will recommend it to our friends and family. Great Job!
N/A

It is perfect. Seriously, the owners, the staff, and everyone involved really care for the kids and ensure they have fun. There was a minute when the power went out due to a storm and the owner took charge and immediately accounted for every single child and was so wonderful. I cannot recommend this place enough. Designed by an engineer, it is a perfect place for the kids.
Always clean, bright colors. Very friendly, helpful staff. Perfect size, you don't lose track of where your child is. My daughter has fun every time!

This indoor playground is an absolute gem for families! The cleanliness here is unmatched: from the play equipment to the bathrooms, everything is spotless. The staff is constantly on the floor sanitizing, tidying, and making sure the space stays safe and welcoming. They also enforce the right rules, which helps create a fun yet orderly environment that parents can truly appreciate.

We come here regularly when it’s too hot, too cold, or raining, and it’s always a lifesaver. We also recently celebrated our child’s birthday here, and it was amazing and truly memorable.  The party was well-organized, the kids had a blast, and the staff went above and beyond to make it special.

It’s not the cheapest place, but it’s absolutely worth every penny for the peace of mind, quality experience, and happy kids. Plus, we’re always happy to support a local business that does it right.  Highly recommend!
We had our daughter’s birthday here. It was our first time attending recess and it was great. The location is awesome. And the kids had a great time. Their parents enjoyed their experience as well.

Just had my son's birthday party here today, and I can't recommend it enough! Everything was great, I didnt have to worry about anything, and all the kids had a blast! It was especially great because it was last minute and they still came through. The hosts were so amazing and helpful as well!
Great place for the kids to play. Just be warned you do have to buy socks on top of the price shown.
N/A

Took my nephew today for a few hours of play and upon arrival I was assisted and greeted by one of the staff members named RACHEL she was so helpful and sweet/friendly she really added on to the amazing time we had with her wonderful service. Thank you Recess play center for showing us such a great time.
We believe more should be done to ensure the environment is truly safe for the children. Our child has had two accidents, one of which involved bleeding.
The facility is very clean and the employees are friendly. 10/10 experience from checking in at front desk to the variety of activities that awaited me and my child. We will definitely be back!
N/A

I celebrated my son’s birthday at Recess Indoor Playground and had a fantastic experience! The staff were extremely helpful and professional. Despite multiple parties being booked in the same room throughout the day, they handled the transitions so smoothly and efficiently. Everything felt seamless, and we never felt rushed or overlooked. The entire celebration was stress-free and enjoyable. Highly recommend for a fun and well-organized party!
N/A

Wow. All I can say this is the upgraded version of the ones you knew, no offense to the rest but this was hands down the best experience. It is adult size as well which grabbed my attention because I cannot keep bending over walk to see where my child is haha. Very well kept too. Will be coming again for sure.
Great for kids 5 and under, expected to be bigger but great for the little ones
N/A
We love this place. It’s so clean and organized, my kid always has a blast in the ball pit, and there’s so more much to do! I can also see him no matter where I sit which is great.

Wow, third time here in 2 months and the staff is so great, the facility is so clean, and the kids had a great time. Were major fans and are contemplating a monthly pass because our experiences has been so positive!
N/A
N/A
Very clean and nice. My kids had an amazing time.
N/A
N/A

We visit Recess about three times a month, and my children absolutely love it. But yesterday was extra special—we hosted an intimate birthday party for my 2-year-old in the Green Room, and the experience was amazing. From the moment we arrived, the staff took care of everything. We were told to relax and not worry about setup, and they truly went above and beyond. Our expectations were exceeded, and our guests had nothing but wonderful things to say about Recess. Thank you for providing such a safe, fun, and welcoming environment for children. We’ll definitely be back!
N/A

My three kids (7, 5 and 3) all had a blast here! We spent 2 hours here and could have spent longer!
My 6 foot 2, 300 lb husband was able to fit and safely play on all the equipment with my kids!
Lots of kid play places claim to be clean- but this is actually really clean!! I especially enjoyed the clogs by the restrooms.

We love coming here.
It is always clean and my kids have a blast.
There is something for every age, and the kids love the jungle theme.
My daughter had her birthday party there too, and it is consistently clean and friendly staff.

Recess Play Center is an amazing indoor playground for children. Walk ins only. Booking a party on the other hand is kinda not where I would go. The reason I say this is because the standard package we book states each additional adult is $5 more. I had over 10 adults. Upon arrival at Recess, ask the attendee at the front desk. I am going to have over 10 possible kids and 10 adults as included with my set package. I specifically ask can teenage kids who are not gonna play, who are just observers. Can they be charged as an adult? I was told by the wife owner and other associate that will be fine as long as they are 15 & over. Some how three teenagers were given a payed wristband before the rest of the younger kids came. so upon the younger kids that came later, I was told to pay the full $25 fee when I specifically request to give the payed bands to the younger kids and add the additional $5 observer fee to my remaining balance. We did come up with a resolution after 15 mins of back and forth 😒Another issue I had was the size of the room. I understand that I booked that particular size but if you see that my party has grown, I would expect that they will have moved to another room as we were the only party there on Thursday evening. Most of my guests couldn't even sit down to eat. Also, didn't like we have to wait until the second hour to go in the party room that is explained on the website, but that should be changed.

unfortunately they do not provide any type of food for you so come with your own food or you could pay for some snacks at the concession stand, only snacks like ice cream soda chips Do not except for some chicken, pizza, or any other hot food. LOL. Please note regardless if you not playing or just have to use the restroom. To go to the back you have to remove your shoes. Another thing is I was charger a gratuity fee (that felt mandatory) when it is not stated on the site or during the booking. SMH

Thats why I give it a four star. It was amazing other than the issue we had earlier. I am thankful for the amazing experience the children had and I definitely will take my kids back again, but only as a walk-in, I cannot do a party. LOL

On a good note, the entire playground was clean. It was sanitized. It was much fun. I had fun as a big kid at heart myself.

Celebrating my daughter's birthday at Recess was the best thing I did for myself and everyone who attended. There was ample space for the kids (and adults) to play and run around, having fun. It was a no-stress experience for me. I will recommend this space to anyone looking to celebrate kids parties!!!
FYI, I chose the package that included all decorations, chips & juice.
N/A

I really appreciate the cleanliness of this place however do not expect any help with set up for a party which you would expect for the price you pay. I did have a couple adult guests that the provided socks literally could not fit on their feet (size 14 and size 16 shoes) and they only wanted to go to the party room to see the birthday kid but they were not allowed to participate in the children's party but I still ended up paying for them and every employee was quite rude about it. I love the space but customer service needs some work. Go to play not to party.
Loved Recess, my niece's birthday party was there. My grandson attended, they both ran themselves silly.

We recently had our son's 5th birthday party at Recess and I can't recommend it highly enough.  We worked with Drew for planning the party and he was amazing.  He answered all of our questions and made sure to get all of the decorations and place settings matching the theme our son had picked.  On the day of the party, the staff took care of everything from setting up the room to helping us clean up after the party was over.  All of the kids had an amazing time , especially the birthday boy.  Other parents mentioned how clean and well organized the place was.  Thank you Drew and your entire team for making our son's birthday a huge success!
Very nice place, super safe for any age and very clean, very reasonable price, friendly service and a lot of variety of games

Great place for kids and I really wanted to give it five stars but the discrepancy in prices is why I only gave it three. Monday through Thursday prices 16.95 but with snack pack 20+. I paid the $20 and still had to pay an additional $4 and of course $4.95 for the ice cream.

This is an amazing spot to take energetic kids. We always enjoy ourselves here.  We celebrated our son's 3rd birthday here and loved the experience.  Their team was particularly helpful in picking out and setting up decorations for the party.  And we really appreciated their team's help setting up food, drinks and gifts the day of the party.
Very cool place. Lots of fun and clever activities for kids.

A true gem, it is a super clean, well equipped indoor playground. It is very reasonably priced. Andy at front desk is extremely nice, informative and accommodating. The operation is quite well set up with socks required and supplied as part of admission price. Crocks are supplied to enter bathrooms which is a superb idea.

I highly recommend this facility.

Will never book as a party or as a customer. The place is too small for all the money they want. It’s not worth it at all. The owner drew was disrespectful an aggressive. We asked to rent another room cause we was short on time an then he put us out cause he smelled alcohol. He just wanted a reason to put us out. Nobody in my family drinks at all. I don’t recommend the place. Also you can not get past the gate if you don’t put their socks on that they provide which is crazy. I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.

Dear Recess Play Center Management,

I recently visited your facility in Silver Spring, MD, and unfortunately, my experience was disappointing. While I appreciate the clean and spacious environment, I found the pricing to be unreasonably high compared to similar play centers in the area. Given the cost, I expected a better overall experience.

Additionally, I was surprised to find that no food options were available on-site. Many play centers offer snacks, drinks, or at least a designated area for families to eat, making visits more convenient for parents and children alike. The lack of food services significantly impacted our visit, as we had to leave earlier than planned to find a suitable dining option elsewhere.

I wanted to bring these concerns to your attention in hopes that you might reconsider your pricing structure and improve amenities to better serve families. I would appreciate a response regarding any steps you plan to take to address these issue. I will never go here again.

Amazing 2 hours+ adventures throughout this new 🆕 indoor playground.  Cleanest indoor play experience we have found yet in Prince George County.  1 of only 11 kids playing front m 9-Noon today and our 4 year old went nonstop!!  So many different areas to choose from he just kept switching to a “New” favorite.  We will be back!!!
Highly recommend! Staff was respectful and mature…what a pleasant surprise!  Price was higher than we wanted  but worth this superb experience today.
N/A
N/A

Starting out, everything was fine. Checked in , signed the waiver, helped my child with her socks and waited for my friend to arrive .. upon their arrival we preceded to head to the play area when a young African American boy asked me “ Did I check in, where is your wrist band!?” Me “ Yes. You were standing next to the young lady who checked me in.” And proceeded to show him my wrist band. His response “Oh yes.. I forgot” … that was less than 5 minutes ago with low traffic coming in but okay … then proceeded on with play time. A guy name Dru decided it was best to threaten kicking us out for not wearing their socks. Keep in mind we are sitting the ENTIRE TIME.. but it’s a mandatory to have the socks. Whether you siting , squatting , cartwheeling, a paramedic, NO SOCK NO ENTRY.!… So we went to put the socks on… fine whatever right … SAME GUY DRU … proceed to saying .. “ It’s up to yall , you can stay or leave “ .. we like you clearly see us putting on the socks… At this point no ..It’s way to many if these placesin the area to deal with this side ways behavior…I’ll be posting this on my tik tok later.

Talk to the Owner Mr. Drew. He resolved the situation professionally and promptly even though the ownest was on me.

I appreciate the facility and we have frequent the establishment more than 5 times. Staff is courtesy , professional and cleans on the hour to make sure our 👦🏽 👧🏼 🧒 are safe from viral outbreaks. I recommend and give it a solid rating of 10/10

We held our daughter’s 3rd birthday party here today and it was fantastic! It was easy to book online. The manager called a few days ahead of the party to confirm the details and give us an overview of the day. When we arrived, staff members met us at the side entrance to unload our supplies and set up the party room. The kids had a blast playing, celebrating, and then playing some more. Everything was safe, fun, and clean. Highly recommended!
Great staff, even more fun!!!

Great super clean family owned indoor playground. Love that they give you new clean socks every time you come and have crocs to wear in the bathroom! Have been a few times as a family and once as a birthday guest. Was really impressed by how well organized the birthday party was and the attention to detail when it came to the layout and set up of the party room.

It is a fun place to play. Kids love it. But as parent, I have some concerns. First, some of the slides and área of play are not patted well. So it makes it dangerous for concussion. Also, even though the rule is not to eat or drink in the playground, there is not enough personal to reinforce it. Lastly, it will be nice if the playground games are maintained, cus some of the game are not working properly. Just a little upkeep will make this place our favorite one.
My toddler loves this place, everyone is super friendly. Price is fair compared to competitors.
So many different play activities for the kids! Warm environment. My kids love it.. when it's time to leave it's a hassle to get them away. They will stay here for hours!
N/A
Amazing spot! We love it. Keep it clean dimension on services and we will keep coming

Pretty decent experience. Relatively fair pricing and no time limit.
The entire place is set up nicely, easy to keep an eye on your kid(s), nice snack/beverage selection, friendly staff, clean bathrooms, and easy parking.
Amazing place to take your kids
Good place for our children to enjoy a day.

Pretty cool place for young kids to get their energy out. I would recommend this indoor playground for the younger kids. They sell kud snacks. It's a little smaller than I anticipated, but my kid had a lot of fun. Weekend pricing on holidays. Free jumping socks with entrance fee. There are other businesses here and a big free parking lot.
N/A
Clean and fun!!!
Had a birthday party for my niece. It was fun, it did get busy before we left so it does get crowded on Saturday. Nonetheless we had a good time.
I love this place to take my adventurous toddler.  She truly enjoys it.  The socks are great, they really help her so she does not slip! Highly recommend!

Had my 3 year olds birthday party here and it was perfect! Jenn and Drew (the owners) were so amazing and helpful and FLEXIBLE with us as we navigated this day.
The Room: the covered tables were set up with cups, plates, and napkins. They even INCLUDED cool spidey Balloon decorations to go with our theme. We got to take the balloons home after! The room is equipped with Bluetooth so we could play music. We were allowed to bring food, drinks, and cake and Recess supplied some chips and drinks as well. Jenn came in during the party to help hand out pizza and just in general be helpful.
The playspace:
Omg so we've LOVED the playspace since day one. We are frequent fliers haha. There is so much to do for the kids from bikes, to wall climbing, to exploring the playspace. There's a ball pit (the best part about that for this germ fearing nanny is that they have a ball cleaner! The balls get cleaned on a weekly basis i think). There are 6 different areas (7 if you include the wall with the...idk what to even call that. Remember that toy ((millennials I'm talking to you!)) That you put your hand on and it made the imprint and we would of course put our face in it? Yea they have a huge body size one of those!!). They have an area for your little crawlers with plenty for them to climb and explore. The playspace is big enough for me to get in and climb with my 3 year old. There are 3 slides and a section with a "ball volcano!) They also have ball launchers in the upper area. It's a plenty big space for kids to run around. Oh they also have a cool light color wall! And you can buy snacks from honest juice to some coke products to teddy grams.

I can keep singing this places praises all day! You definitely want to go here for a playdate or a birthday party!! We will.be back friday!
This place was mad expensive. I spent almost $30+ for ONE kid and there wasn't much to do either. My kid left within 30 minutes. Hyper Kidz in Columbia is definitely better.

I had an absolutely fantastic experience! The service was top-notch, and the staff went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfect. My kids had an amazing time and haven’t stopped talking about how much fun they had. They’re already asking when we can come back! The attention to detail, professionalism, and welcoming atmosphere made this a truly memorable experience. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for quality service and a great time for the whole family. We will definitely be returning!

What an amazing place! This large, kid-friendly indoor playground is packed with interactive features that are fun for the entire family. It’s incredibly clean, which we really appreciated. My wife, daughter, and I had a fantastic time, and we brought a friend and his son along—they loved it too! The staff was friendly, and we even got to meet the owner, who was welcoming and kind. Highly recommend this spot for a fun day out with the family!
My  girls had a blast. The staffs was great they kept the place nice and clean. Will be returning soon. Thank You
N/A

My 16 month old daughter and I checked it out for the first time on a very cold Tuesday morning after hearing several families rave about it. We loved it! It was quiet when we arrived around 10am, just a couple other kiddos and their adults, and the gal working at the front desk was one of the owners. She was welcoming and gave us a great rundown of how everything worked. The space was clean, inviting, and oh so fun. I was impressed by the wide variety of things for my enthusiastic and toddling daughter to do - from STEM activities with balls to slides to a giant Light Bright.
It felt safe and secure to leave our coats and shoes in the cubby. The attention to detail was impressive - like guest Crocs by the bathrooms so the gym socks stay clean, the hand sanitizer stations sprinkled throughout the building, clear signs where direction was needed.... it added up to be a very fun, engaging, positive morning.
We are looking forward to going back again!

Stopped here during a longer day trip to MD for my little one to move before returning home. SUPER CLEAN! Lots of different areas for gross & fine motor skills to develop. Snack bar, party rooms, clean fun kids music. If i were a silver spring resident we would be monthly visitors.
Great time today with my kids and our families and friends. The workers were nice and very accomodating i absolutely would reccommend to other people for parties and to just go have fun.

We have really enjoyed this new indoor playground. The staff has been great and responded quickly to any of our needs. Our kids love it (ages 3 and 4.5). They work hard to keep the place clean, tidy, and safe for all. Thanks Recess for serving this need in our community.
This place is great! Only downside is that they don’t have a trampoline like some other local playspaces.
Good size, you can find your child easily. Wifi is great to have if you need to work on your computer. Cleanliness is unmatched. Service is always a plus, very friendly staff!

We had a birthday party here that exceeded all expectations!! We've been having parties for a decade with our two kids and have been to almost every venue in the tri-state area and this place is the best. Our kids had a wonderful time and everyone was awesome!!!!!!!! Thank you!!!!

Have your child’s birthday party here!  It was AMAZING.  We had my son’s fourth birthday here today and the execution was flawless.  I dropped off party supplies 15 minutes before our start time and wasn’t expecting the staff to set everything up so wonderfully.  We walked in the party room when it was our time and it looked spectacular, everything was set up and ready to go!  Drew was wonderful to work with and made the whole experience so easy.  He handled everything from start to finish and went above and beyond to ensure our friends and family had a wonderful day.  This was by far the easiest, nicest party.  We’ve been to other play places that have made parents rush in, set up/decorate in 10 minutes and then clean up and rush out.  Recess does the exact opposite — they set up and clean up.  All you have to do is show up and bring any extras you want to have, they do the rest.  The entire staff was wonderful and so accommodating.  This place is clean, the staff is knowledgeable, friendly and KIND.  I cannot recommend them enough.  All our friends and family were also so impressed.  We’ll be back for birthday number five and to play on a regular basis.
N/A
The place is perfect for kids

We just had private event there . And the place is WOW!!!! Finley play place in silver spring.  That clean and the stuff was so friendly and welcoming.
I difntley will recommend this place to everyone i know . And I will go back with my kids.
Thank you for hosting us today .
The kids loved it .

We had a wonderful time at this spacious playground designed for kids and their adult companions! It’s easy for parents to enter the play area alongside their little ones, and there’s plenty of space for us to stand and join in on the fun. As first-time visitors, we were truly impressed and can't wait to return, even if it’s out of our way. The owner was incredibly friendly and took the time to explain everything about the delightful play area.
Awesome place! Very clean, well maintained and sturdy equipment! It's designed very thoughtfully and there are so many things to engage younger and older kiddos. We will absolutely be back.
Awesome experience very clean an my kids had fun

Sucks sucks sucks a more things of suckkkk
They will give u half information on the rental of the room. It’s really bare minimum to me
Great place for kids to have fun playing and burning all that energy! They also have rooms for parties!

I love this place, but not to throw a birthday party and I don’t recommend you do so if you’re thinking a party over 20 guest. The only thing I can say is 100/10 is that your guest are allowed to play as long as they want to but when I was taking my things to the back for the party host I heard one of them say “oh no she can’t keep bringing things in they won’t fit” just because they didn’t want to continue pushing carts but they demand you tip 10% I get they don’t remain in the room for privacy but you don’t get 1 designated host and they popped up maybe 5 times on me. I asked for napkins and only got 1 tiny pack. I had to keep running around to find a host, front desk had 1 Spanish speaker who was refusing to speak to my guest in Spanish which luckily I stood at the front and helped most of my guest. Also they didn’t help me set up anything besides push like 2 stands in, im grateful I had friends and family who helped. I will definitely be returning as a customer, but definitely not for parties. The employees are young and I understand but lacking respect has nothing to do with their age.

So much to explore and unlimited play time. Went on a Thursday morning and it was just the perfect time. Not too packed or overwhelming. We definitely have to go back because my baby didn’t get to explore everything in the 2 hours we spent there. $17 dollars is a great deal for some quality time with the babies.

I have been to a few indoor playgrounds in the area and this is by far the best one! So clean, great play environment, even has sanitizing and charging stations. Absolutely loved our first visit this evening and will definitely return!
Clean, spacious, reasonably priced and a good amount of seating for parents. Staff are great. Worth every penny of the $22 entry to have my kid run around an obstacle course for 3+ hours.

Couple things you should know before your visit. Adults are charged $5 for entry and $5 for socks regardless if you are participating in play. You must wear the socks that they sell to enter the facility.

They have huge signs that display their unhealthy snacks so your kid will be tempted by this.

Small children can run underneath the locked entry gate making it difficult for parents to retrieve them. There is a separate gate for exiting.

Overall my son had a ok time here but for the price I would do Hyperkidz next time.
My son looooves this place. He could spend all day here, especially with the air toys!
Kids had a good time. Off the beaten path, great parking.

I went here with my 11 month old and she had a BLAST! The owner is very nice and friendly too. It was nice that there were activities for kids of all ages, and very reasonably priced. Will be back again and again.

I celebrated my sons birthday here and I’m disappointed. I choose the second large packet and the staff was not what I expected. When they set the table they only left enough plates and forks for the table even though they charge for everyone. My guest were eating pizza without napkins and plates. They disappeared from the room and obviously locked everything in their closet. When I was settling my tab,  they told me that I must give a minimum of 10% tip.  What is that?
One of the best indoor playgrounds I took my toddler to

I met up with 4 other moms and their kids on a Sunday morning for a 1st visit. ALL the kids - ranging in age 3 to 6 - had a GREAT time! The staff are pleasant, the facility is new and extremely clean. There is lots to do, including some mini areas for babies and toddlers. It’s the perfect size - big enough for little/big kids to be a little independent, but small enough that parents can still keep a watchful eye. We’ll definitely go back!
My 6 year old says, "I like Recess!"
N/A
Immaculately clean. Friendly staff. Fair pricing. Easy for parents to follow their littles. Good parking. There are plenty of things to play with and objects to climb—a great place to take your kid.}

reviews.content: Thank you.

We always have the best time at Kids Klub in Milford! 💛 Even when the booking comes from a customer, the staff is always so kind and welcoming to our Party Pals team. The space is fun, clean, and perfect for celebrations—we love every visit! Thanks for being such great hosts! …
Very rude service and stare from front desk guy once we said NO to the price.

This place is the best place for kids they always have fun the staff is always helping and making sure the place is clean. We can play all day for $20 bucks you can’t get that at any place in Ct this is the best place for kids in Ct!!!!!

Great place for the kids. I love it here and the staff is amazing. The kids be completely tired after playing here for hours, and they require their own sock so the kids are more safe. 10/10 recommend here
This is the best place for kids my kids love it here the staff are friendly and for $40 to play all day is no bad for two kids!!!

I do not recommend this play location. The total for 3 kids was over $70, which is outrageously overpriced. Most places offer free entry for kids 2 years old and under, but here they charge even for 1-year-olds. Additionally, the worker automatically charged me for socks without asking if I brought my own. When I told her I had my own socks, she watched me take them out of my bag like a hawk, only to claim that the socks weren’t from their location because they didn’t have a logo—even though I had purchased them from the trumbull location before they started adding logos to their socks... She still made me buy new socks without any consideration.

Despite my frustration, I paid the overpriced bill because my kids were excited to play. However, the experience didn’t improve. The staff micromanaged how my kids were playing and even complained when my fiancé helped our 1-year-old on the slides. It was uncomfortable and far from a pleasant outing.

This place is way too expensive, the staff are overly strict, and it doesn’t feel family-friendly at all. Save your money and go elsewhere.

I visited today and had a great experience. The facility requires specific socks for indoor play, which is normal for places like this. The socks cost $3 and are reusable. You can pay for all-day access to play, and re-entry is allowed, which is a unique service not offered by nearby facilities. They also have a train available for an additional cost. The kids had a fantastic time, making the visit worthwhile, and I will definitely be returning.
Thank you
Thank you
Thank you

Absolutely horrible behavior and cheap efforts to rip people off. Walked into the store, and the guy who has an attitude problem automatically adds non-slip socks to the bill. When I say my son already has them, he proceeds to say no, they have to be the orange color with the koala on them....I asked him why, what does orange color and a koala have to do with safety, the answer is well the owner tells me to do this so i do. So they are pushing 5 dollar socks to everyone regardless of any reason. I mean, i get if they just raised the price by 5 but of course, then people would not show up to play for 24 bucks when everyone else is 18 (with much better play areas). So we will just go ahead and sell the 50 cents sock with it for 5 and think we are smart...
45 dollars for two kids is insanity. Will not be coming back.

Great place to take kid for a day, not so great for parties. We paid almost $900 for 20 kids, that got us 2 pizzas, one $2.98 and another $.99 smaller Arizona  ice tea and probably like 10 napkins. They refused to give us more. Then they charge you a dollar for those kids size water bottles since you have to buy it.

Maybe if you have <3yr olds.  But I recall (years ago granted) a small trampoline and some separation of sections.  But now it’s a small run of climbing stuff and closed off sections they want extra money for per ride.

Not worth more than a 5 min break for a 5 year old.  Maybe at $10.

They now nickel and dime you at every turn. We went in with 3 kids and four adults. Had we gone in separately we would not have been charged as a group, but because we walked in together they charged us for two adults. We were also paying separately, but had to pay the group fee anyway. The kids enjoy it, but it’s not worth the cost for one hour. Unprofessional and half naked staff as well.

Nice clean small kids play zone, $20.15 for one kid, 2 adults included. The left side has the obstacle course, slides, ball pool. On the right, there’s open play zone. They have small train ride but it costs $4 per ride per rider. There are lots of sitting space, colorful tables and chairs. They have a some sodas and snacks at the counter for sale. My 5 year old played for half an hour and got bored, since there’s not much variety.
For 1-3 year old kids, not too much to do; the train ride or swing are each $4/person/ride
This location is very small. My kids got bored after a short period of time, it's also pricy. It's clean, the custom service could be better.
The place was great ! The staff was nice and friendly
Great place to bring your little once..
Thank you
The kids had a great time. Very clean and the staff are great! Will highly recommend.
Best place ever
Love it here, the staff are friendly
Visited with family after going to the one on Jamaica, just as good. We had an amazing time!
Not worth it at allll!!!!! DONT waste your money. They overcharge for parties. The party plan has nothing special might as well just walk in. Just not worth it waste of money!!!!!

We celebrated my daughters birthday here. The female manager is extremely rude. I took some cups from the back and she started throwing a tantrum in front of my guests. She didn't have the courtesy or manners to pull the host to the side and respectfully suggest that this is extra change and request not to do this again. She lacks basic manners and shouldn't be a part of customer service industry at all. So immature and difficult to deal with.

Great for younger children and well priced with them been able to stay as long as they want for about 18 dollars. There's a couple small rides at 4 dollars each if your kids want to do them but ours seemed happy with the two play areas. Only two toilets and one wasn't working when we were there but wasn't an issue as everyone was polite and allowed the kids priority.
Chris is great we love this place we come everyday !
Thank you

This is the second time in the Milford location that my daughter was being discriminated. My daughter is autistic .  First time she was denied riding a ride with her cousins because of her age. She’s two years older than her cousin but they are about the same size. A female asked my daughter how old are you ? Jade replied 5, the employee said no. I would like to know why? Today my daughter was sitting in the ball pit playing and two different times she was being pelted in the face with the balls . She even said stop to one girl and nothing was done . The girl continued to follow her and hit her hard in the face until I said something . Where were her parents? Where was staff ? Second time today a boy was doing the same . My husband saw his mother, grandmother (I don’t know what she was to the boy)watch the boy hit my daughter 3 times as hard as he could in the face, not saying nothing so My husband spoke up . She went on screaming and yelling at me and my husband cuz we told the boy to stop. Long story short the person in charge his name started with a T (Truman, Terrell, Terrance) it was hard to hear inside,  took me and my husband aside while the lady continued to yell in the background. He made US leave. Not the yelling lady !!  My daughter was taking away from the fun because of what??? She did nothing wrong!! We said nothing wrong!!!

Something needs to be done about this discrimination against different people!
they no longer have the trampoline. false advertisement
Great for 1-12 year olds. My 2 year old had a blast!! ❤️ Definitely will be going back.
Thank you

This is a staple for us. We go here all the time. I'm pretty tall but I can still chase my son through everything.

Special shout out to one of the workers. I did not get his name but he plays awesome Disney music and always wears a beanie lol
Thank you
Thank you
Thank you
Thank you

Found a place for the kid to play but probably not going back here anymore.
We came with another family (just friends) so total 3 kids and 4 adults. 2 extra adults would have to pay $6extra/ each if we pay together. If we  use their own money (or card) to pay separately , 4 adults would be FREE.
It should be based on 1 or 2 adults PER kid, NOT  2 adults per group. And maybe the employee should be more clarify, rather than just saying like  “ it would be $6 extra for each adult if more than 2.” And then raising her eyebrows after hearing my concerns like I’m crazy about extra $6 dollars.
Does it make sense at all?

A regular place for out little one. He enjoys it. The staff are here to do their job! They are nice and oblige!
Thank you guys!
Great place for small kids to play.

The place is nice but the people that works there is clueless about pretty much everything. Today 10/7/23 they were supposed to open at 10 am, they didn’t open till 10:37 am when we called to ask about the opening time even when they had a sign that said open from 10 to 8. Then they couldn’t get the train to work when there were already kids on waiting for it to run. Also we paid $5.50 in the ice cream machine, the machine never gave me the ice cream and they said I have to call my bank when clearly the problem was the machine. My card was charged. Ugh so upsetting.

An honest review…

I went here for the first time this week. (On a Tuesday) Before going, I read the google reviews so I want to address what a lot of them say.

Cleanliness: It was clean in there including the bathrooms. Maybe on busier days it is not as clean - not sure.

“Extra” Rides: My son was upset he didn’t have access to the rides. (I wasn’t going to pay the extra $3 per ride) Many kids were upset - especially when others paid and went on the swing ride.
My suggestion - don’t charge for them OR get rid of them and install more play areas.

Staff: The man working there was very kind and professional. He was able to answer all my questions.

Pricing: I was charged $14.95 on a Tuesday for my son to play for unlimited time. INCLUDING  leaving to get lunch and coming back again. I was not charged as the parent. Nor was my 6 month old baby. Although I did see on the website they charge $5.95 for an adult.

Ages: I would say the best age for this place is 1-5 year olds. Any older kids would prefer Dave and Busters right next door.
Thank you
Great place for your kids to play and enjoy themselves also wonderful safety protocols.
This used to be good. But not anymore. During our last visit noticed adults are also getting charged
1 employee barely paying attention for the number of kids here. Not safe at all. Anyone can walk in unchecked. Upcharge for 2 "rides"  inside. It's not worth $15.

I like this place. My kid loves to go there, but I don’t like the guy who works there closes the door 1 hour before the actual closing time. We were about to come in.  It’s supposed to close at 6 PM on Sunday, but he closed the door for entering at 5 pm. I am going to find somewhere else.
Thank you
Overpriced. Not worth it
Thank you
Thank you
Thank you
Manager is too rude and charged us for 2 adults where it was clearly written two adults free with kid, it’s a worse place at customer service and super rude behavior by Manager

My kids loved it but didn't like how the guy working there turned off the lights and music 15 mins before closing as my children were still playing. He could've kindly told me and the other parent it's closing in 15 instead of scaring my kids. Felt like it was pretty rude & wanted to rush us out.

I use to LOVE bringing my son to KidzKlub here or in Trumbull....I remember the prices were by age and I only use to pay $6-7 for an hour of play. NOT ANYMORE, first of all they added extra "entertainment" for additional costs (rip off) the toddler area is so boring, they removed a bunch of fun things my son use to play with....a 2, 6, and 7yr old cost me $50 !!!!! For a slide and ball bit. No thanks.

Good for 5 and under. My 7 year old was not interested and said it was boring. Also they charge extra for the rides which is a total rip off-- like why? Entrance fee is already really expensive for how small it is.
The kids have a lot of fun...
Thank you

We had my grandson's third birthday party there and there's so much for toddlers to do and children up to around 10 to 12 depending.

The staff was very nice. The facility was very clean and the staff was a very big help and helping us clean up everything at the end and more importantly the kids had a really good time

Fist time i go with my 2 year old girl  and the price its good 19.09 and 3 dollars for the train its fine.
The thing that i didint like is after one ride in the train and after 20 min later went back to pay for the train and a girl said the train was broken i said ok.
but who i was rigth there all the time and my baby was the last kid on the train wen she left 30min later i ask a guy they do you have a time to time that you use the train and he said hooo its because the battery run out we tock the battery out to change and it was barely 2 pm and he said it takes hours so no more train for the entire day.
But i never see no one taken any batterys out i just think the workers dont wanna do more than take 19.09 and thats all the owner loosing money because of the lazzy workers

2 is being modest. Too many fake reviews so unfortunately I have to make other parents aware.
1-No its not clean, its disgusting so just keep that in mind. The mats are black in most areas, but its a socks only policy, hmm.
2-Staff is unhelpful and always late. Many parents come at 10 on the dot to avoid crowds and they are always late.
3-Staff puts music too loud, this isn't a club for adults listening to RnB this is for kids.
4-The facility is smaller then it appears online and in pictures so keep that in mind.
5-The railings and floor by the "eating" area is disgusting.

Try another location you may get lucky.
It's fun, definitely fun. But a lot parents aren't watching their children and not seeing them  bully other people. Just watch your own kids. Other than that, the place was well kept.
It is very fun for children and to spend with the family
Thank you
We had a great time! Place looked extremely clean, staff was okay (not too engaging, but not rude), fire alarm went off during the middle of the party that we were at.. all-in-all a good time

My toddler is ready for American Ninja Warrior. Already. I was in the house losing my mind because she was destroying EVERYTHING. I said she needed to go somewhere she could climb, jump, crawl, and run around. Cue Kidz Klub. What a lifesaver. My 1 year-old had an AWESOME time. It was the perfect pre-nap activity. Some of the equipment needs to be updated for sure, but it doesn’t put a damper on anything. There’s so much to do and it is a great workout for the parents of young children as well (since we have to be with them the whole time)!
Thank you
Thank you
Workers are very nice and place is always clean. My son loves it there, I do too, especially on those hot and humid summer days

Get place for the kids to get out there energy. Usually not packed with people when I go there. It has a good amount of things to keep kids entertained. My kids love this place. They have a small train ride that usually isn't working but is cool when they do decide to have some operate it.

Nice idea, and the pricing is reasonable. However, be prepared to spend a lot extra on carnival-style rides such as motorized swings and kiddie trains. These cost $3 per person and the ride is only a brief couple of minutes. The rides are also pretty noisy; the moment someone pays to use it the clattering sound attracts all the other kids, who start begging or crying to ride, too. There's also a section which has a wide selection of battery operated toys such as ride-on airplanes etc. Too bad none of them had working batteries.
Thank you
Kids had a blast

Had to come online to write my review because Groupon has it blocked some how they only take reviews that support the site n business anyway letting people know they don't honor their discounts on Groupon made me pay 15 for one child when I had two on my voucher then got a  attitude when I asked why not the first time this has happen and they play adult music for the staff convenient

I was already thinking this place was crazy expensive, but after paying almost $30 for two kids for an hour of play, I get further in and see that they have the nerve to charge an additional $3 to use the toy train or swing carousel. What a rip off!
I went there for a birthday party. I want overly impressed. Its rather small. It's okay for 6 and under but there are better places with wider variety for older kids.
Thank you

Great place to have a blast with your little ones. Loved our first visit here. We will definitely come back. It's ideal for kids under 10. Everything seemed clean. And there is enough to keep toddlers busy for hours.
Thank you
Great place for children! Me and my daughter love this place. It’s safe and the employees are great. Always welcoming me and my daughter with open arms❤️
Great Workers. I took my niece there and she and I had a blast. Would definitely recommend to anyone else.
Thank you
Clean and fun place for the kids
First time being there & my toddler had so much fun! Clean, safe & friendly staff. Definitely going to try to go every week. Wonderful experience!
Thank you
Thank you
Excellent but mostly for younger kids. Not ideal for kids 7 and older.
Thank you
Great for small kids.
Thank you
Wonderful experience for the low price
Prices went up,  they wont be able to compete with full trampoline parks at that price
Thank you
So clean and fun!
Space for fun for the little ones. Good alternative for playground outside when weather is not nice.
Great place to bring the kids. My nephew loved it there}

data.address: 143 S Milford Rd, Milford, MI 48381, United States
data.title: Play And Grow

reviews.content: Absolutely perfect place to host my daughter’s 2nd birthday! Staff was welcoming and accommodating, helped set up and clean! Played music of our choice too (Minnie mouse on Spotify ). Could not recommend the place more for your child’s birthday party! We had she’s from 7 months to 5 years and all kids had a blast! Thanks Play & Grow.
Awesome place for parties, babies, and toddlers to place.  It is very clean and the staff is very friendly!
N/A
Went there for the first time today for open play. Took my friend’s 21 month old. We were there for two hours and he had a blast. Clean facilities and friendly staff. Definitely recommend!
N/A
Hosted my daughter’s 1st birthday party here on 12/8. Everything was wonderful! The party attendant was accommodating, kids of all ages had so much fun, and it was a very clean environment.

We held our son’s first birthday party at Play And Grow and it couldn’t have went any better. We had a good age gap of children who attended (6 months - 10 yrs) and ALL age groups had a blast. The employee that was helping with our party was super helpful and great and the venue was super clean and well kept. I can’t recommend Play And Grow enough and I highly suggest you check it out yourself :)
My 15 month old was busy the whole time. I even enjoyed it here myself. We played for 2 hours straight!
My son loves this place. They added a regular evening open play and we can’t wait for Tuesdays now. Super fun, clean, and helps my almost two year old with share play time.
Very friendly staff my child had a great time good prices will be going back
I just brought my son today for the 2nd time & Mel was great with him ❤️

This place was great! Clean, small with a big feel, access to a a variety of toys/equipment, plenty of seating for my grandparents that joined us, tons of thoughtful additions like small potties and extra baby wipes in the bathroom. And thanks for the free coffee!

However, the place trends younger. Maybe age 2 and below? I went with my 1 year old and 3 year old. My youngest loved it but my oldest was barely entertained. I wish there were a few more pieces for older toddler/pre schoolers, 3 and 4 year olds.

We hosted our child’s birthday party here and it was so much fun! We had kids shy of a year old up to 10 years old and everyone had fun! The facility was already sanitized and easy to set up. The kiddos at her party had a blast! Thank you Play & Grow!
N/A

I don’t recommend trying Open Play. I received a text less than two hours of trying to take my two year old grandson for the first time. There’s so much that goes into pumping this age up for activities like this that to only have to take the activity away from them last minute is cruel and hard.

We held my daughter’s 3rd birthday party here this past weekend. There were 13 kids playing in the play area and they had the best time. The location was very clean and well organized. The bathrooms even have the toddler toilet seats (super exciting as we were potty training at the time). Our party attendee wasvery kind and even offered to help set up. The adults even had fun because they could keep a close eye on the kids while being able to sit and chat on the side. I would highly recommend hosting a party at play and Grow! We will absolutely be back!!

Play and Grow is an absolute gem. From the moment you walk through the doors, you are greeted with a warm and welcoming atmosphere that instantly puts both parents and children at ease. The facility is spotless and thoughtfully designed to create an engaging and safe environment for little ones to explore and learn.

The staff at Play and Grow are incredibly dedicated and passionate about their work. They go above and beyond to ensure that each child feels valued and supported. My child has flourished, developing new skills and forming lasting friendships.

Play and Grow truly feels like a second home for our family. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a nurturing, stimulating, and loving environment for their child’s early years.

Wonderful program! Miss Melanie makes it such a creative happy place. Different theme and set up every week. Can't say enough about this
Highly recommend!!
Our daughter loves the toddler class!

Miss. Melanie and Miss. Marissa are so great with the kids! They have Taught my daughter so many things. I love how it's always a clean environment, and it's a safe place for children and families. Highly recommend their classes for all ages and open play is great to get out of the house.
Great place for small events. Lots of stuff for kids to do and a great layout to keep an eye on them and help when needed.
very clean play area, great variety of toys & climbers, staff is always exceptionally polite and kind
N/A

Fantastic "Toddler" resource! Classes offered are awesome & the Open Play days are a great option. My son absolutely loves Play & Grow and the hands-on, STEM based activities are endless. Wonderful staff. The facility is amazingly clean & maintained very well.

Had my daughter’s 3rd birthday party here and it was perfect! The bounce house and gymnastics equipment were a hit with the kiddos!! Love how the bathrooms also have potty training guards on the toilets. Our host, Melanie’s mom, was wonderful. Will definitely be back!

My son has been attending classes at Play and Grow for about a year and it has been such a fun part of our week together. Melanie and her team are wonderful. They are helpful, encouraging, and welcoming. My son loves his mornings at Play and Grow! So happy I found this place.
This was the perfect place for a toddler birthday party! Our host was super helpful and friendly. Highly recommend and will be back.

I had my son's 2nd birthday here and it was so much fun! The place is perfect for the kids to run around and play while the parents can either join or watch from the side. There's plenty of space to move around and hang out. We brought our own food and decor, but they do offer some party decor add-ons if you don't want to do it yourself. Bring sticky socks for the little ones for when they're not in the play area. I plan to check out the classes they offer and I would definitely reserve the space for another kid party.
N/A

We hosted our daughter's 1st birthday here had roughly 15 kids and about 50 adults. It was such a great space we all loved it & the kids were tired after. The staff was so sweet & relatable. The only thing is it didn't seem to have enough seating for that many adults maybe I should had asked about more but the adults didn't care as they were up and down with the children also. Cannot wait to visit again!
N/A

Just went for our first drop-in play time and this place is excellent. Great toys and equipment for our 2-year-old, plenty of options for bigger kids, snack and drinks for purchase, free coffee for the parents, etc. The place was clean and all parents were kind and respectful. We’ll absolutely be back.

Play and Grow is a fantastic place to take your child to play, attend gymnastics classes, or throw a birthday party. The staff is absolutely amazing and we cannot say enough wonderful things about Play and Grow.

Fantastic place to bring young kids to burn off energy. We've taken the tumbling class and done open play several times and love coming here. The instructors and owner are great with kids. Melanie is always super patient and kind to my daughter!
N/A
Had our son’s first birthday here, SO happy with the service and how well everything came together. Super clean, and lots to do for all ages! Definitely would recommend and would go again.
I highly recommend play and grow. Melanie is so sweet and amazing. She genuinely loves these kids and her job. The place is very clean and so much fun the kids absolutely love it there!!!

Mel is such a passionate coach! Kids love it here ;)
Highly recommend!
Awesome place for parties! Melanie provides an amazing experience for the parents and the kids!
Melanie has a great space for kids!

We've loved Play and Grow for many years.  Melanie and her team have helped out LO develop skills and confidence.  We had the pleasure of having a birthday party there recently.  Miss Ashley was a great party host.  She kept the temperature in mind (lots of sweaty littles running around), had a great selection of music, and worked with the kids to get the toys and equipment they wanted.  It was a fantastic party.  We cannot recommend Play and Grow enough to parents and families!

A welcome addition to Milford.  Such a great place for families to enjoy physical activities in a controlled, clean environment.  Staff is always so friendly and welcoming.  Great place for a birthday party or private event.

We have been to play and grow for multiple birthday parties and a few classes. Every time we have been there it has been very clean. My kids have enjoyed their classes. We have enjoyed the birthday parties because they are private and fun for many different ages! We will absolutely be back and I recommend play and grow to anyone who is looking for a party spot or tumbling classes!
Play and Grow is a great place to take kids!! I love the owners, they are the best!!

I can’t say enough great things about this place and the staff (especially the owner, Melanie)!!! Clean, FUN, and educational! I’ve brought my kiddos here several times and they always walk out smiling (and tired!!). Staff is welcoming, knowledgeable, SUPER FRIENDLY, and fun. I would highly recommend this place for any momma (or dad) who needs to let their kid(s) burn off some energy and have tons of fun!
Absolutely love Play and Grow.  The owner is amazing and I have never had a run in with her where she wasn’t smiling and if anyone was made for this business it’s her!

Melanie is one of the most kind, patient, friendly, accommodating and timely people I’ve ever met. She takes pride in her company and ensures the safety and happiness of her clients to ensure they have the best overall experience. One of the absolute best places for classes, parties and any event!! Highly recommend!!
We love Play & Grow, the owner is very sweet, it’s always clean and a blast for our 2 year old. We have done classes here, our son’s 1st birthday and open plays. 10 stars!

Love having this little gem of place in our cute community! Kids need a place to play to get out their pent up energy, especially in Michigan winters, and Play & Grow does not disappoint. Melanie, the owner, is always friendly and accommodating going above and beyond not only for the kids but the parents as well. You can't go wrong bringing your little ones here for simple play time OR rent the space for their birthday party!
Wonderful play place for my toddler. It was very clean, a fun atmosphere and the staff were very helpful and nice!

Melanie is a great coach and runs her business smoothly. My daughter still talks about her experience here. We’ve attended many special events and parties and have always enjoyed ourselves! Highly recommend!

Beautiful, clean facility with an amazingly kind, dedicated, skilled staff. Perfect spot to let the kids/grandkids play, especially babies and toddlers. Always something new! Great place for kids birthday parties too!
We had so much fun here!  Melanie is so kind and patient with the kids and she makes their experience so special.

This place is so cool. My kid had a blast there. And the owner is so sweet and friendly and helpful. You could tell she really takes pride in her business and enjoys what she does. I highly recommend this place.
LOVE play and grow! Our co op does a yearly party here and it’s always fabulous! Clean, fun, and Melanie is the sweetest! Definitely recommend!

We LOVE Play & Grow! Our two toddlers take classes weekly and we recently hosted our 3-year-olds birthday party there. The process was so simple and the kids had a blast! We highly recommend Play & Grow!
Very clean facility, and the kids loved every toy! They all slept so hard that night.

10/10 experience at Play and Grow. My daughters birthday landed on a massive snow storm, and Melanie was more than happy to stay open to host us for the party. We paid extra for the birthday balloon arch and it was adorable - highly recommend. With my little one's winter birthday, we will definitely be back for future parties and open play dates!
Great place to have a birthday party. Staff is helpful and friendly!

Did my son's 2nd birthday party here and it was perfect! We had a wide range of ages and there was plenty for everyone to enjoy. Great prices, very clean, and was able to bring my own food/decorations.

This location is extremly disappointing. We came here a few months ago for a ‘tumbling’ class and the young girl in charge just played some music while I gave my child the directives of what to do on the mats…extremly  confused about the expectations and what is going on here. Also, not a very ‘impressive’ place.

I’ve been taking my son to the open play sessions and the toddler tumbling classes for a while now. I am so thankful for this place! I love the open plays and the variety of toys available. The toddler tumbling classes are a great way to introduce them to the structure of a class. Melanie and her staff are always kind and helpful. Definitely give this place a chance if you’re looking for an indoor play place/tumbling classes!
Oh wow! This place is so cool! I went for a private party and I definitely recommend it for younger kids birthday parties. The adults can hang out and chit chat while watching their kids play.

We had my son’s 4th birthday party at play and grow! He had a great time and so did the guests. I loved the ease of set up and take down and that there was someone there to help. Thank you Play and Grow for all you do for our kids!
We loved play and grow for our 2 years old party!! I highly recommend, everyone had a blast! It’s so perfect for Littles.

This was such an amazing indoor softplay gym! The facility was super clean. Staff was cleaning when we arrived and then  cleaned in-between sessions! Tonight was a special event with our Blue Heeler 💙 we hope to be back soon and play with all the fun equipment. …

Went for open play with a less than one year old. There were about 6 kids total.
My kid loved it. We stayed the entire 2 hours and she was pooped out afterwards. There was a lot for her to try and do. Definitely a great place for the cold rainy days. We will be back.

All the mats and toys are clean. There is a no show policy on the play area. There is a great variety of toys walkers, spinners, bouncers, gymnastics mats, bars, beams, trian table, duplos, and lots of toys to take off the walls and use.

We have attended open play, taken classes with our 1 and 2 year old daughters and hosted a 1st birthday party at Play And Grow. It is an incredibly clean, engaging, accessible and welcoming facility. There is something to do for every child, regardless of interest and ability level.

We celebrated our son’s 2nd birthday and it was great. He was very happy and had a lot of fun. I was looking for a indoor playground that would be just good for his age. Play and Grow was perfect for him and his friends.
I definitely recommend this wonderful place and most probably we’ll come again soon.

We love Play and Grow! We've been coming here since our daughter was 4 months and did the mommy and me workout class! We enrolled her in the 1-2 year old class as a early stage, wobbly couch surfer and left the class with a confident walker. Melanie did a great job helping her build her motor skills.
We love Play & Grow! Classes, open play, birthday parties - all 5 stars ⭐️

Such a cute place for toddlers. I loved the open space and all the times and climbing things. It was perfect for my almost 2 year old. I was surprised as how busy it got. Be prepared for lots of kids around! I didn't realize we could being our own snacks and drinks so that would have been cool to know but they do sell some basic things inside as well. We had a blast and will probably come back. If it was closer we would come back more often but its a 30 minute drive for us. Definitely worth checking out!
We have been for open play and we had a joint birthday for our kids, everyone had a great time! Staff was very friendly and helpful. I would highly recommend going for open play or a party!

We had our daughters first birthday party at Play And Grow and I was not disappointed. All of our guests loved that they could sit down right next to the kids and watch them play. It was nice to have the place to ourselves. We used their tables and chairs for an easy setup. Highly recommend this place.

We had the best time celebrating my daughters birthday here! The staff was wonderful and very helpful! My daughter got sick the day of her original party and they were able to accommodate us with a new date without blinking an eye. Every kid there had a blast and were drilling of sweat from playing so hard! We can’t wait to come back for our other daughters birthday party in the fall!!
N/A
Great place for our active toddler. We go to open play as often as we can. And it was the perfect place for his 2nd birthday party, reasonably priced as well!

We love it here! Our 2 year old son loves coming for open play, and we just celebrated his 2nd birthday here. He had an absolute blast with his friends! Melanie and Nora are awesome! This is the perfect spot for littles. Highly recommend!

Where do I even begin? My neighbor suggested we bring our daughter (age one at the time) to the play and grow for the open plays. We are so happy we took her advice because this has become our daughters favorite place! She gets so excited when we pull up and she sees where we are at. There are so many activities, toys, and obstacles for the kids to enjoy and socialize. The place is so clean!
Our daughter loves this place so much that we decided to have her second birthday party here. I am SO glad we did. The owner is the kindest, very easy to talk to, and flexible. It was the perfect space for our family, friends, and all the little kiddos! The set up was so easy since they provide all the table and chairs. And the staff member who was there during the party was kind, helpful, and attentive. Everyone keeps messaging us saying it was the best birthday bash they have been to! We had such a great experience here!
Cute little indoor play place. Lots of fun toys and tumble equipment. Lots for any little tot to play with
N/A
Great place for kids to play together, sensory toys and everything you could want, great for younger kids!!

We had an amazing experience celebrating our 2 year olds birthday!
The kids had a ton of fun and didn't want to stop playing!

We had a birthday party / private event at Play and Grow for our 4 year olds. It was perfect! Such an awesome place, all of the kids had an absolute BLAST! Can’t say enough great things about Play and Grow!
N/A
Wonderful place for a kids party!

We hosted a first birthday party here. We had kids from ages 10 months to 5 1/2 and they all had a blast. Everything was clean and staff was very friendly ! It was the perfect size for us because we were able to sit down and eat with our friends and family and still keep a close eyes on our kids. I cant recommend play and grow enough !
Great place for kids to come and play especially when the weather isn't great.
N/A
We are so thankful for Play & Grow!! Lots of choices and perfect for kiddos up to 6 years old!
Such an awesome place for my 9 month old to crawl around and explore. Very clean and safe. Staff is so friendly!

Our daughter loves Play and Grow. Coach Melanie is amazing with all the kids. My personal favorite is her ability to read the room and adapt to what kids need, at that moment, to keep class fun and interactive. I highly recommend for class and/or open play.

We absolutely love coming to Play and Grow! Coach Melanie is so great with the kids and always has fun and unique ideas to keep them entertained. The gym is very clean and safe. We really enjoy the tumbling classes as well as open play. Looking forward to continuing to play at this wonderful gym - and so glad we found it!

My son has been attending classes at play and grow for the past year and absolutely loves it. The classes are fun and interactive and provide a great opportunity to build motor skills and socialize with other kids. Would 100% recommend.
Melanie runs really good classes. My son loves the ninja class. The facility is clean, well organized and friendly!
N/A

My daughter loves going to play and grow. Melanie is great and the classes are very interactive. Everything is always clean and organized. My daughter has developed a lot of social and emotional skills from attending classes and open play, like sharing and playing alongside others.

Wonderful place with a great, caring owner. We had a birthday party there and everyone loved the location. It was relaxed enough for the parents with enough space for everyone. The kids had an absolute blast! They all want to come back to Play and Grow. 🙂 …
Wonderful place to host a toddler birthday! Open play is a great experience as well. Staff is friendly and easy to work with.}
