reviews.content: Came on a Tuesday morning, for $15 to beat the heat in a small play place, this was a good deal. However, a lot of the kids had taken all of the props and costumes out of the play houses and no one was collecting them so not as organized as I would’ve hoped. There was also no toilet paper in the bathroom and there were maybe a dozen ppl inside after they had been open for about 30 minutes. The biggest issue was the costume cabinets were not anchored to the wall and my toddler almost pulled one down on top of himself.

I should say that they did not give us wristbands. So I wont recommend this place if you have concerns about kids safety. on the other hand, there are some restaurants over there whenever they are closed out.
I dont like they got closed from 12 to 2 PM.

We had our daughter’s 2nd birthday here, and I just want to say THANK YOU for everything! From the very beginning, the team was amazing with communication. They sent inspo pictures of how the setup would look, made sure everything was exactly how we wanted it, and were incredibly responsive throughout the entire planning process. The communication was truly top tier.

The day of the party, everything was seamless. The space looked beautiful, the kids had a blast, and the staff was so kind and helpful. A huge shoutout to Tasha — she was AMAZING! She kept everything running smoothly and made the whole experience completely stress-free for us. We’re beyond grateful and would absolutely recommend this place to anyone looking for a fun, organized, and memorable party spot!

We had the best experience at Giggles & Fun for my daughter’s 3rd birthday! The facility was clean, well stocked with toys and they had even recently fixed the floor that was messed up when we had been by initially to look at it for a possible party location. The new owners are amazing, and you can really tell that they care and are putting a lot of effort into making it a great place for kids to play and visit. They were even there on the Saturday of our party making sure everything was running smoothly. Our party host was amazing! She had our party room stocked with drinks and helped us decorate and make everything look perfect. Everything exceeded our expectations, and our daughter and her friends had the best time! We were very impressed and would do it all over again!

My 4 year old had a blast celebrating his birthday at Giggles and Fun. A friend recommended the location, and I booked it with ease almost six months in advance. We had a great host, Jamia. She helped unload and made suggestions as we set up. It was our first time hosting outside our home so I was not sure what to expect and likely a bit indecisive about where things should go. Jamia was clearly experienced on this front and moved us along appropriately. The party room had two tables just enough for the kiddos to sit. Parents had to stand around the room because the space was limited.
The play area was perfect for the littles and even 7 and 8 yr olds had fun. For mid-day Saturday, the place was not packed so we had ample room to spread out and be comfortable as we kept an eye on our kids.
I am pleased with the service and would recommend this to others. We await an east Houston location!

Wed may 21 says open at 2. The enployee sitting there with a blanket taking a nap still at 2 20
Edit. Ill give 5 stars because place was fun but employees have to wake then up to purchase anything. DEI hire

We came to this indoor playground for a party and arrived around 4:33 PM. By 4:56 PM—within just 40 minutes—our 5-month-old daughter’s gold anklet had gone missing. She hadn’t played in any of the activity areas; we had only walked in and out of the party room, so we knew it had to have been dropped somewhere along that short path.

We immediately asked staff if they could check the security cameras to see if it had been dropped or picked up. They said only the owner could access the footage, which we understood but we were hoping they’d reach out quickly in case whoever picked it up was still in the building. There was no sense of urgency. They said they’d do a sweep and “keep an eye out,” but it honestly felt like the situation was brushed off. With only one other party going on and a limited timeframe, it’s hard not to feel like this could have been handled better. If this had been a medical emergency or something more serious, we’d hope for a faster response but we’re not even sure that would’ve happened.

We’ve accepted the anklet is gone, but we’re sharing this so other families know if something goes missing, don’t expect much help in recovering it.

Aside from that, the overall cleanliness of the facility was poor. Toys and furniture looked heavily worn and overdue for replacement. Nothing appeared freshly wiped or sanitized, which is concerning in a space full of young kids. The party room was uncomfortably hot, and while there was a party host assigned, they weren’t very involved or helpful compared to hosts we’ve had at other indoor playgrounds. Overall, the experience felt unorganized and underwhelming.

Hopefully the owners take steps to improve both cleanliness and customer care moving forward.
I’ve hosted three parties there now for my kids. This last one was absolutely amazing. Micah went above and beyond to make the party extra special. They thought of everything! 10/10 recommend.
Had a great time with my grandson and wife will return to enjoy

We had a wonderful experience! The unicorn decorations were absolutely magical — everything was exactly as we imagined. My daughter and all the guests loved every detail. It truly brought our dream to life!

I can't say enough great things about Giggles and Fun! We've had two birthday parties there, and both experiences have been absolutely fantastic. The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful, always going the extra mile to ensure everything runs smoothly. We’ve opted for the exclusive parties where they take care of all the decorations, and every single time, they’ve exceeded our expectations. The attention to detail is amazing, and it really makes the event feel special. Plus, the facility is always clean and well-maintained, creating a welcoming environment for all guests. Highly recommend Giggles and Fun – you won't be disappointed!

We hosted my son‘s birthday party there this past weekend and we had an amazing experience in the suite party room. Our hostess was amazing and helped in every way and even went an extra mile and gave us some decor for the theme that we had for our table. The place is a great play place for kids
. it does need a little update with new flooring and other items around the venue. But overall great experience!

Went there today with our daughter and it needs a lot of updating and cleaning. She had fun but compared to other indoor playgrounds we have been to, this is one of the worst ones. The pictures they have posted do not look like what is actually there. The toys they have look very worn out. Also, the restroom. One stall was completely out of toilet paper and all stalls had water or pee on the floor. Kind of sucks when you have to wear socks.

I wish they were open till later on weekdays
Otherwise it is fun  and plenty to do for my 4 yo

Amazing experience ! This was our first experience with giggles and fun and it was a great one. All of our guest were so pleased with how clean and hands on the staff was. Giggles and fun staff were very professional and kind , they truly went above and beyond for my sons birthday and helped with any needs and wants. If you’re looking for a place to have your little ones birthday this is the place! I’ve been to several birthday parties at indoor playgrounds and this was the most hands on staff I have experienced ! They will help with all of the set up for your big day from the napkins to the plates balloons and any extra decor you may need! I will definitely be coming back and have recommended this place to all of mom friends ! Owner was on sight was super informative kind and professional along with his staff. I will add that the playground smelled and looked cleaned when I walked in the building which was super important for me and my little one! Staff was cleaning and preparing everything for the parties as we walked in and were prepared to set up and helped us gather all of our equipment for the party ! If I could give you guys more than five stars I would we will remember our sons first birthday forever and it was a great experience and amazing that we didn’t have a hectic or overwhelming one thank you !

I had my daughter 3rd birthday here! My baby loved it! The host was so sweet and broke the times to help move the party a long! Let me just say the kids did not want to leave LOL!!  Staff is professional and nice! I enjoyed!!

We really hoped that with the change of ownership, Giggles and Fun would improve. We've been members multiple times and found it to be extremely dirty (even though it's "closed for cleaning" between 1-2). My mom took my kids yesterday morning when they opened at 10 a.m. and the place was completely overrun with what should have been a private birthday party and wasn't. The older kids at the birthday party were pelting balls down the slides while my two and four-year-olds were trying to play, and even after bringing it to the staff's attention, the staff only made generic announcements about "no horseplay," but never did anything to stop the rowdy guests.

My mom then asked whether they could return in the afternoon. She was told that they could in theory, but Giggles was closing at 3 p.m. (Sunday, 2/16), but she could return tomorrow since it was within 24 hours. She got there with the boys today at 10 a.m. only to find out that the location is closed on Mondays.

Really disappointed in this location, which has so much potential but is just not worth the price of admission - $30 for two kids and one hour of play.

We celebrated my sons birthday here and what an easy, seamless, amazing experience!  Tajah was so sweet, she did all of the setup and cleaned up the birthday party room.  My son and all of the kids had a blast and didn't want to leave.  Thank you for such a great experience! We will be back for our next kid's birthday!

If the rules and policies were enforced, this place would be great. I went with my 22-month-old on a Sunday. There were two birthday parties who had older siblings. It was chaos. The ladies working the desk kept coming on the lord speaker and telling parents to supervise their kids, the structure in the front was for two and under only, and no climbing on the walls of the structures. Nobody listened. I guided my kid to the less crowded areas and avoided the spots where someone had spilled juice on the floor (especially gross when shoes aren't allowed). My daughter had so much fun, but we had to leave after an hour because I just couldn't take anymore of the screaming and running. Chuck-E-Cheese isn't even this bad.

Management, if you have rules, enforce them. And fix the broken stuff. The suction machine and the ball twirler were not working.

I like the set up, but it was 57 degrees outside with the a/c on blast is a bit frustrating with young children who can easily get sick. The price was fair. The front desk staff had everyone leave around 12:40 to close for 1:00pm. The microphone announcer is on way to loud for such a small place. I did see them put toys back in the proper place around 12:45 but nothing sanitized . Then upon closing I seen an associate using tongs to pick up trash off the floor then picked up several toys with the same tongs. I seen a girl bleeding from a cut on her arm and nobody cleaned it up and she had on pretend clothes from the play area. Upon exiting the associates had their purses on as well as if they we leaving right after us which means no sanitation being done. Other then that my kid enjoyed the space .

The new ownership at Giggles & Fun is phenomenal. We had my 4 year olds birthday party there this past weekend, and Lexi and her team went above and beyond to make it extra special for my little guy. They even put together a last minute balloon garland that pulled the entire room together. Such a great experience all around❤️

Hosted my daughter’s 4th birthday here! We were able to come 30 minutes early for set up & the party host, Micah helped us every step of the way! We were scrambling to get up all of our Bluey decorations, and Micah jumped right in. Thank you so much! Amazing experience, and the kids loved it!!

Party and party helper, Tasha was amazing!!  We love giggles for party’s and rainy or hot day.

All the best!

Hi,
I couldn't find your name in our system, please reach out to us at mgr@gigglesandfun.com to discuss your visit.

Thank you,
Lexie

I loved it. My daughter had a lot of fun with her little friends.
She is 2 and a half years old.
She loved the small spaces where each one is a different establishment.
There was a police station, a vet's office, a supermarket, a kitchen, a boutique with costumes for the children to wear.
A playground with various attractions, a space for you and your little one to have a snack, change diapers, etc.
And spaces reserved for birthdays.
We had so much fun at my 4 year olds party and Tajah went above and beyond helping us get set up!

We had my daughter’s 4th birthday here and loved it! We had Tajah as our helper to set up the party. She met us with a cart as soon as we pulled up to help unload all our items. She was so helpful setting up the room and did most of the work - it was beautifully done and I really appreciated her care. She checked in on us and communicated during the whole party. She also helped tear down and clean up, which was so nice. The parents and kids had a great time. We felt our kids were safe and the kids had SO much to do. I would definitely recommend Giggles and Fun to have your party and ask for the amazing Tajah as your party coordinator!
We had our daughter’s birthday today and we had a great time! Place is clean! and they help us set up and clean up! Very friendly staff! Highly recomend the place

We celebrated our daughter’s birthday at this location. Tajah, our hostess, was great at helping us setting up everything. She went above and beyond to make sure everything was under control. It was really stress free and fun for the kids.

I am so glad that we decided to have our daughters birthday here. Everyone had so much fun! Our host was Micah and man, this girl went above and beyond. Actually, the whole team that works there were all extremely helpful and very sweet and kind. When I arrived to set up, I just gave them my name and they already knew. Micah walked me to the back where the party was going to be and started working! She brought me a lot of extra props for my daughters set up (it was Elmo) I ran out of a few things (napkins, paper plates) and immediately she went to grab some extra ones for me! Very attentive! I'm really glad we had Micah! Thank you for the work you put it! It was very much appreciated and we will definitely be coming back to play but will plan her 3rd birthday party there for 2026!
We had my daughter's birthday party there and had a wonderful experience! Lexie, the owner, and her team were fantastic in creating a fantastic space and making sure all the kids had a great time.

5/5!!! I was hesitant to come here because of some reviews saying it wasnt clean.  But it was!!! It has normal wear and tear, but you can’t be perfectionistic! This place is a gemstone! I LOVE how they have a pretend play, my 3 yo loved it!!! My 6yo loved it too! This place is unique, and affordable!! They don’t charge for adults, only $14.99 per kid for the whole day.
I took my son for his third birthday, and he had a blast!! They are not on top of you where you feel watched all the time, it feels great! Usually i feel awkward as an adult in kids places, but not here! I didn’t feel that there were structures where my kid would get hurt, at all! All of the floors are foam! Even if he fell, which he did, it was on foam!
Best place in town!!
Also, i saw another picture saying that the ball/tube game didn’t work, but it did! I uploaded a video showing it work!!
Please keep this placed open for business! Your kids need it!

This is our 2nd visit to this location. First visit celebrating a friend’s kid’s birthday was great. We decided to have our daughter’s birthday here as well. Booking process easy. Our party host, Taja, was excellent. She helped with everything from setup to breakdown. Even when she was busy working another party, she made sure to check in with us. The place did get a little packed as the day went on. I chalk that up to kids being out for the holiday break so it’s all good. Owners were very pleasant. Definitely recommend this spot for your kids party.

We celebrated my daughter's 2nd birthday here today and she had an absolute blast! There was something for all of her party guests to play on and the place was spotless! All of the little pretend play shops had their corresponding pieces and all of the staff were so friendly. The party room was perfect, our amazing host Tajah did a fantastic job of helping me set up. She made great suggestions and that made it very easy to relax and enjoy the party. She helped cut the cake and made clean up at the end a breeze. It was a great experience for us. We are now lifelong fans of Giggles and Fun and we will most certainly be back!

This place is awesome! Our grandson’s birthday was there and everyone had so much fun. It is clean and well maintained, safe for kids and the staff is great!  Sam, our party coordinator, was awesome and helped us with everything. The new owner is hands on and making sure your experience is the best! Highly recommend!
fantastic management

We had an amazing time celebrating our daughter’s birthday at Giggles and Fun with all her friends! The owners were fantastic—super attentive and made sure we had everything we needed for a stress-free party.

The venue is the perfect size, providing a cozy and safe environment while still offering a wide variety of games and activities that kept the kids entertained the entire time. It’s truly a paradise for small children!

10/10 – Highly recommended! We’ll definitely be coming back for future celebrations.

Edit: they offered to refund us without us asking. We will be trying again soon to play at this location. The front desk worker was very sweet and kind. The new owner stated the changes they are making to the store. It can be so hard to keep these areas clean- I urge parents to do a little to help monitor these areas when your kids are playing.

The toys are a bit broken, and the floor and things are visibly dirty. There was a bloody bandaid stuck to my foot from the large play area. Then I let her keep playing but found another bloody bandaid in the kitchen area. We left after that.
My honey bunny had so much fun here today ! She’s 2 and there was plenty things to keep her occupied .

We just had our 3 year old’s birthday party here. The host assigned to our party was awesome. She set everything up for us, cut the cake, and cleaned everything up for us. The kids loved playing here. The parents loved it too because we could see where the kids were the whole time through the mesh of the play equipment. We will definitely be back to play soon.

My 3yo had a fabulous birthday party this past weekend! The facility was clean, staff was attentive, and our host Tajan was great. She made suggestions, decorated the room, helped with pizza, and got us all set up to go home easily when the party was over. This was our 2nd birthday party at Giggles & Fun, and likely not our last!

Yesterday, we celebrated both of our kids' birthdays parties here. Our kids love the playground, and all their friends had so much fun. Management/Owners went above and beyond to provide all the support needed to make sure our event was successful. At some point there was an accidental miscommunication about the pizza order, but they still managed to deliver on time and to follow up to make sure our celebration was up to our expectations. Thank you!
Elham T / Ricardo A

I’m giving. 5 stars but I do want to bring attention to the fact that there are multiple Locations and when booking the confirmed emails have both addresses small in the corner but no where does it say which one …. So all my guest went to the one I booked at the park row the one I assumed I was booking with  even when creating a Facebook event it Only goes to park row location come to find out it was the opposite one.. but no where does it tell you which one in my confirmation .. I didn’t realize there was two so this is just heads for future customers now  aside from  that My Host was amazing so helpful loved her!! its all about the kids and they had a great time and I appreciate all the staffs help considering the mix up!
The staff were friendly and very helpful! I was helped with ideas on how to set up and helped with the set up! All the the guest enjoyed their time. I would definitely come back!

I have always celebrated my daughter's birthdays here, but this year was different, we had Tajah as our host and her service was above and beyond. She made my daughter have a magical birthday. I hope you congratulate her for her excellent service.
N/A

My twins love coming here! It’s very spacious and has a lot of fun things to do like swings, slides with a ball pit, and various pretend play stations (the kitchen in the review pic is just one example). The new owners did a really great job of updating a lot of the toys and keeping it really clean.

This is the second year we host a party at giggles and fun. The kids had a great time again! Most cried when it was time to leave.
Our party host, Tajah, went above and beyond. She helped with every aspect of the party.

This was my second time booking a party here, and unfortunately, this experience was disappointing.

First, I didn’t receive a confirmation call. When I called the number on the confirmation email, it was for the wrong location. I was told my location would contact me a day or two before the event, but they never did.

On the day of the party, the hostess arrived at the party start time, leaving no time to set up as guests were already arriving. They had double-booked the suite I reserved, so we were given a smaller room with an apology and a discount.

While the setup was done quickly, and the hostess was kind, the additional hour in the playground promised in the contract was not honored.

With 45 minutes still left, announcements were made over the microphone telling “anyone not from X party” to leave, due to another private event. This made our guests uncomfortable, as it felt like we were being rushed out.

We ended up leaving before we paid for.

We celebrated our daughters 2nd birthday party here and the entire experience was fantastic, the staff was amazing, the party rooms and entire facility was clean and organized.

Full turnkey set up, we got there the party rooms were decorated according to the theme's we discussed. Tajah (our party host) was ready to answer any questions and accommodate in any way. We were able to come in and focus on celebrating our daughters birthday and guest.

Overall great experience!

Taja is amazing ,very beautiful , David is a very nice guy.Parents this place is very clean the air is fresh my son had a blast.Its safe I mean I can tell Mr.David works very hard to make the place what it is  and puts his heart into this.My prayer is that God will see him through his visions and goals.
We love coming here the girls up front are so nice and helpful the monthly pass is so worth it every time we come it’s clean and well maintained the kids love coming here
N/A

Giggles and Fun helped me plan my son's 5th birthday party and they did all the decor after we came up with the theme. They executed the party amazingly. The party was amazing. We plan on using them again in the future for another birthday party.
Love this place! My kids have so much fun every time we come.
Giggles and Fun is a GREAT place for kids of all ages!!

This is a fun place playground for kids frol toddler to young child. The place is clean and hygiene with bright lightening. The ball structure is well protected with soft insulation tubes and netting so you can se your child playing. Highly recommend for any visitor or fun playground goer. They can host birthday party and even small family activities day out together. Good job and big kiddo to Lexi and her staffing for an enjoyable environment for our son.

Was practically empty when I came with my 1.5 yr old at 3pm on a Thursday - disappointed- it just gave creepy vibes honestly and was underwhelming. Maybe if there were more kids it would have a different atmosphere- not sure we will come again.

Please clean this place up. Nasty, germs easily spread. The bathrooms were filthy and the smell of the place was horrible. I  couldn't walk put because our 23 month grandson suffers from autism and it would have took him over the edge. He got sick the next day due to unclean equipment and the gravity machine was NOT working. The balls dirty and ripped. Please upgrade and do better for these kids and parents.
N/A

Very fun and my baby seemed to throughly enjoy it. However, there is a space “designated” for 2 and under which wasn’t being enforced. I can understand taking my 10 month old to a playground that there will obviously be big kids, but when there is an area specifically for smaller children, I wish it was enforced. Or that the big kids at least weren’t rough housing around toddlers.

Natacha she was a great agent  her daughter  played with my granddaughter  they had a great time I recommend  everyone  bring there children  here ay Giggles a d Fun it's a great place  for every child I give it five stars.
Affordable place to bring kids during hot summer months especially if you buy a month pass. 4 stars  because it’s starting to get run down in some spots. Also the music is very loud.
I had an amazing time and the ladies at the front desk were very warm and welcoming. My daughter and nephew will be back

I was surprised at this place. It is small, but very nice with lots of little options for kids to play. I was impressed with this place and it isn't as big as some places. Parents can relax and easily keep an eye on their kids without having to worry about them getting lost.
By far one of the best indoor playgrounds for toddlers. We were greeted immediately with smiles from Tayan annd Natacha and felt very welcomed. Very clean place. Would definitely recommend.
Natasha and Tajah were the best. Our grand daughters had so much fun. Giggles and fun was just that!!  And the staff made it so memorable. We will be back!!

Wow the place was sparkling clean! I heard they went under new owners and had a complete deep cleaning! The staff was so friendly and welcoming. My boys had the time of their lives!! Also the swings are adorable

Our first experience with this place was recently when we hosted a toddler birthday party here. All of our guests had a blast, the place overall (including bathrooms) seemed pretty clean. Apparently the place is under new management as of recently so maybe this is a new standard. We highly recommend for hosting a party, there was plenty of different types of sitting area all around for parents/chaperones, from soft sofas, small tables, and a bar height table with bar stools.

Special shoutout to our assigned party host Natasha who was INCREDIBLE and really took our party experience to another level. From volunteering to help put up our decorations (and doing a way better job creatively placing them than we could ever LOL), to helping serve cake, cleaning up, and helping us pack away all our leftover food, supplies and gifts into the car, she really went above and beyond any expectation we had! Another coworker also willingly stepped in to help and she was equally as wonderful. Thank you for a memorable party experience!

This place has been my go-to place to take my kids when it’s rainy. There is new management here and you can definitely tell. Everything seems way cleaner and more organized than it was in the past. Yall are doing great, thanks so much for your hard work!
Amazing place! Spoke with the ladies in front & they were so polite & very helpful . Natacha & tajah. The  place so is clean & has so much to do. Definitely worth going!

This is the best place I could have chosen to be with my children. The atmosphere is incredible, with a cozy and safe environment. My kids have so much fun, and I can relax knowing they are in a safe setting. The staff are friendly and always ready to help. Highly recommended for families looking for a special place to share unforgettable moments.
Fun, cool place to let the children play for hours. They may even meet a new friend. They have plenty for my three year old grand to do.
Lots of different play scenarios.  Safe environment for toddlers.  Staff involvement was minimal during our visit.

Giggles and Fun is normally a great place however they have changed staff and the ladies there were not the best. The place looks run down now. I had a party for my son and the service was horrible. The young lady who was assigned to my sons party was not attentive and all the parents in my party noticed it. They gave my pizza order to the wrong family and had to re order my pizza which delayed my party significantly and all the kids were starving and when the manager told me they would not charge me for the pizzas when they gave me the bill it was on there and I had to tell them to take it off.

The only reason I am giving 2 stars and not zero is because the kids had fun regardless and that’s really all that matters.

There was one lady named Natasha that was great. I hope she continues to do well. All others were disappointing to say the least.

My little had fun at the location. Which I was pleased about but it’s not the cleanest. My little called me over and pointed out a wad of hair in one of play areas. It was the size of a golf ball. It made me cringe so bad. The place needs dusting if you are having hair wadded up like that.

Unfortunately while the design is fun and the idea was "right" the place is dirty and worn out. The staff don't seem to take any pride in the place. Nothing is "reset" or put back where It belongs for the children to enjoy. Many of the play areas of visibly damaged or missing parts.
Whole place needs redone but not before they hire a team that actually cares.

My son absolutely adored this place! It's an incredible haven for open-ended and imaginative play. The warm and friendly front desk ladies were exceptionally welcoming and addressed all of my inquiries.

While my overall experience was fantastic, there are a few areas that could benefit from improvement. For instance, some of the toys could be replaced with newer ones, as a few of them had cracks that could potentially cause injury (like the plastic teeth and faucet in the clinic area). Some of the foam mats are already peeling off. Additionally, it would be great if the place could be cleaned a little more thoroughly especially the riding toys and lounge foams.

Overall, this place is a gem, and with a few tweaks, it could be an even more exceptional experience for everyone.
Unfortunately, I cannot recommend this product given its current price. Many of the toys are outdated, and several of the more interesting ones either do not function properly or appear unsanitary.

Giggles and Fun will forever feel like a second home to us. After giving birth to my second I came here everyday for weeks after picking up my toddler from preschool. The staff is so kind and the only complaints we ever have are from big kids playing in the toddler area😅 The price per month is great and my son loves it here so much. …

Even though they close from 1pm to 2 pm for sanitation, this place was visibly dirty, play areas were missing a lot of pieces/toys so the kids couldn't do much in them plus some stuff needs batteries and others need fixing. The place feels neglected and lacking maintenance efforts

A lot of Fun, my son had a blast there for his first birthday party. it’s a unique place that gives an opportunity for kids to do pretend Play. Kind of like a mini Houston, children’s museum next-door
Photos looked promising but I have been calling for 3 days to book a party with no response.

place is great, but dirty. I went up the structure, there was hair and dust and dirt on  it. the ball throwing machine wasn't working. There are balls everywhere, nobody bothers to put them back in the ball pit every once a while, and throw out the broken balls
its sad that they dont clean it properly, considering a lot of small kids go there.
They say they close everyday  for sanitizing too

Disappointed. Was there no longer than 10 minutes when I decided to leave.  Parents aren’t looking at what their children are doing.  A boy around 8 years of age running in the toddler area and nearly missed my toddler in the ball pit.  He stayed in the toddler areas. Parents were not parenting and employers were not working.  All 3 employees were sitting in the front.  They should be managing the play area as well.  Saw a kid (around 7yrs old) pull on the foam that is surrounding a metal pole and no one said a thing.  I had to tell him to let it go and go play but he was adamant on pulling it off.  The place does need some TLC and better management.  Never going back.  A waste of time and money.

the worker i got was jashleny , i took my 5 year old here and that was the best experience for her ever ! Even though my kid threw up , i went to clean it up but Jashleny stepped in and offered to clean it up with no worries . I wanted to pay her extra but she insisted . Jashleny is a very good worker and i always expect to have her when i come 😊
N/A
N/A
Highly recommend this place for kids entertainment and events. Fantastic and super helpful staff made our experience one of a kind!
A lot of fun for kids

What an amazing staff and venue for a toddler birthday party. As soon as we arrived, we were greeted by our host Trinity. She did everything I could ask for. Which made the day way less stressful. Everything was smooth and a great time. I will definitely throw another party here :)

Today, I decided to have a Mommy and Me day and bring my daughter here for the first time. We drove 40 min to the Houston location. The front staff were nice and the children's music made it a better day. My daughter had a wonderful time, however, the HUGE downfall to this place is the damaged and dirty equipment. The place is closed for one hour, from 1-2 for sanitizing and cleaning, however, it didn't look like anything was cleaned today. There were also toys and balls all over the place.   :(The place also lacked of ac. The unit only comes on occasionally. You would think what the charge for their birthday parties that they would put that money back in to fixing some things in the place. I do not think it was worth the drive coming here. We will not be back.
Best place for my kids birthdays so much fun, would recommend!
N/A

Not a pleasant experience. When we went the play area was very dirty.  I have been to indoor play areas don't allow food inside the gate and now I can see why.  Chips and crumbs were throughout the space, I stepped on a spit out hard candy in the ball pit and there was a used bandaid in the play area too.  Beyond the surface cleanliness nothing was put together, I would have thought periodically staff would be putting toys back in the correct stations and sanitizing as needed
Went back after being informed the ball cannons were removed. Much better experience now for my toddler. Always nice when a business listens to customer feedback
I have visited this place twice for birthday party’s and they have nice indoor playground maintained well and clean. Make sure you carry your socks or pay 3$ at the front desk to buy one

I honestly think this place is perfect! It's small enough that you don't have to hover over your toddler but you can keep an eye on them, it's ac works great, so many different things for your kids to play with, and it's more affordable than a lot of the indoor playgrounds I've been too, including one I worked for! Others commented about toys being worn but toddlers don't care about that and a lot of them are wooden which I prefer! My daughter loved every minute!
N/A
Friendly Staff -  lots of Space- plenty of Tables and chairs - many activities for guests- Ample Parking - characters welcome 😁 …}

reviews.content: Clean, easy to get to, great parking lot, fun toys.
We had our daughter’s party here and it was outstanding, from the staff, to decorations, to space, to the transition between each activity it was the best. 10/10 highly recommend!!

We've always had wonderful experiences coming here! Staff is great, environment is clean, and perhaps most importantly the kids love it!

Thanks for all the hard work :)
My daughter had a blast. I like that it was not an over stimulating place. A few simple fun play areas

We just had our daughter’s sixth birthday party at Sunny Day Play Cafe and I couldn’t be happier with everything! The entire process is so simple, the staff is beyond accommodating and they do all of the hard work. I loved showing up with some extra snacks for the party goers and not worrying about all of the set up, clean up, etc. They keep the flow of the party moving so I could enjoy the party with my kids and her guests.

On top of everything else, it is so CLEAN. We love visiting Sunny Day to play and for special events and highly recommend the venue for birthdays. Thank you Caitlin and her crew!

My 6 year old said it was the best birthday ever at Sunny Day! The staff were so helpful in setting up, serving food/cake and cleaning up. We surprised my kid with the face painter add on and she was awesome!! Highly recommend
This is the cutest place for littles to explore! We purchased to monthly membership and it’s extremely affordable with unlimited visits. Our daughter absolutely loves coming here!
We had my son’s birthday party here. It was clean, the kids had a blast, and everyone enjoyed themselves!

We love sunny day play cafe! We had our son’s 3rd birthday party here and the process was extremely easy. Caitlin answered all of our questions quickly and made the entire process stress free. We just told her our theme and she took care of the rest. Upon arrival everything was set up for us, the hosts were extremely kind and helpful, and the place was spotless for the party. Our son had the time of his life. I couldn’t recommend sunny day play cafe more

I took my granddaughter there this morning, and for almost 2 hours she had non-stop fun!! As a Nana, I was impressed with the high quality equipment and great variety of activities. As an early childhood educator, I can see the developmentally appropriate activities and creative and engaging areas making a positive impact on the physical and cognitive growth of the children. It’s clean and bright and well organized! The owners and staff are doing a great job! We will definitely be back!!
This is going to sound crazy, but The Sunny Day Play Cafe is peaceful. None of the toys make sound, it’s clean, and it has just the right amount of activities. Great place to spend the morning.

Such a fun place for kids!! They have a lot of things for kids to do. My daughter loves it! And the owners are so nice, I'm so happy to have met them. Seriously, rainy day or not, take your kids. It's so worth it.

The place was great. Snack bar, tables for adults to sit at, lots of space, great playset for bigger kids. Reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is because although the rules say you MUST wear socks, some kids/adults were wearing shoes, some people were barefoot, which I think just makes the place get dirty faster. There were also kids climbing up the slides because they didn't have socks on, which is also a rule.  Overall was a great experience.
This was a great experience for our daughter. What a fantastic idea to create a fun place for kids to play and a comfortable place for adults to socialize. Thanks!
N/A
Sunny Days did an amazinnnggg job with my 2 year old twins birthday. They did all the decoration setup. Everyone had such a great time!

Sunny day play cafe is such a great addition to Kennett square! Not only is it my kiddo’s favorite place to play but the owners/workers go above and beyond for all of the families that walk into their space. The coffee and snack bar is a must for parents (tired ones at that) on the go! We even had our kiddos birthday party there and we are still talking about how much fun it was! Go check out Sunny day!!

After visiting Sunny Day over the past few months we decided to schedule my son's 4th birthday here. Caitlin was super responsive, thorough, and detail oriented. It made the party planning process seamless being that she handled basically everything (even set up and clean up) except getting us dressed and ready! We supplied our dessert of choice while everything else was handled from the playlist to decorations to food and beverage for the children down to the goody bags (which were awesome). We were also welcomed to bring anything additional including food and beverage for the adults. With the package we selected we got to choose our own unique theme and she went above and beyond to supply the decor to go with it. I also loved how we could add on several additional things from a menu had we wanted to. Everyone had a great time and we are so happy we chose to hold our party here!

We hosted my son’s 3rd birthday here this past weekend and honestly couldn’t have asked for a better experience! The facility itself is bright, spacious, clean, and has so many fun areas for the kids to play. We had kids from ages 8 months to 5 years and everyone had a blast. There was also plenty of space for the adults to mingle and still be able to keep an eye on the kids, which can be hard to find in other play places we’ve been to. The owner, Caitlin, and her staff were so welcoming and helpful. They ordered and set up all the decorations based on our party theme which made everything so easy. The birthday boy and all our guests had so much fun and have been talking about the party all weekend. Sunny Day is exactly what we needed in this area and we can’t wait to come back soon!

This was a wonderful and EASY party experience. Other parents at the party loved it and thought this was the “way to go!” Much less stressful than a party at the house- no clean up. And the kids loved it. At the end, we went home and relaxed.
Had my son’s birthday here. Was a great space and held lots of kids! Great communication and help from the staff. Clean and fun environment that both the kids and parents loved!

Sunny Day Play Cafe recently hosted a birthday party for my 3 year old son.  We were able to bring our own decorations, food, and drinks to match the party theme (safari).  The hosts helped us set up and take down.  Planning was seamless and easy.  All the kids had a great time and the parents were able to enjoy the afternoon as well with friends/family.  Great venue for toddlers!  Would highly recommend!

From booking our child's party to leaving at the end of the event -  the whole experience was excellent.  Very helpful and friendly staff to help answer any and all questions.  The facility is super clean, bright, and fun for so many ages.  We will definitely be back!
From start to finish, my daughter’s second birthday party was simply perfect. I couldn’t recommend Caitlin and her team more.❤️
Love the Play Cafe on a regular play day but our 4 year old's birthday party was amazing! Super stress-free party!

BEST PARTY PLACE FOR LITTLE PEANUTS!!!!!

We had our granddaughter's 4th birthday party at Sunny Day Play Cafe yesterday!  I can't say enough WONDERFUL things about the event.  The owners, Jesse and Caitlin, couldn't have been more accommodating.  Communication prior to the party was efficient and prompt.  They were great when I asked to bring in "adult" food for the mommies and daddies (instead of serving them the kid's pizza and chicken tenders) -- no problem was the response.  When I asked to bring in my own face painter and balloon artist -- no problem was the answer (they even set up a "station" for this!!).  When we got there, Jesse was cleaning and sanitizing the venue from a previous party -- the place was spotless when he was done!  Throughout the entire event, Jesse kept things running smoothly -- a feat when he had 25 four year old littles and approximately 35 adults partying on to celebrate our little peanut!  Sunny Day had loot bags prepared for all of our little guests so everybody left with some treats in addition to the smiles on their faces!!  Thank you Jesse and Caitlin --  this party was a huge success because of your amazing play cafe and your caring and creative hosting skills!!
We'll be back to visit and play soon!!  Thanks again!!!

We had my daughters 3rd birthday party at Sunny Day and it was amazing! The booking was seamless and Caitlin kept in communication regarding theme, guest list, etc. The space is huge and I love how the adults have a space of their own for coffee/eating/talking while the kids play. There are comfy couches for parents to sit positioned perfectly throughout the play area, as well. I especially loved the section catered to the "little" littles! We had some guests who were not yet a year of age and they had plenty of space to crawl, sit, and play away from the big kids and the big toys. The variety of pretend play is amazing, and the equipment is top notch. My favorite part was how CLEAN Sunny Day Play Cafe is. We had previous experience at a play place in West Chester and the lack of cleanliness, itself, kept us from going back. But Sunny Day Play Cafe was so clean, even the bathrooms! Caitlin was an amazing host and literally took care of everything down to party favor bags. We will 100% be back for more fun at Sunny Day Play Cafe!

Sunny Day Play Cafe is warm, inviting, clean and fun! We always have so much fun playing there. Memberships are extremely reasonable. We just hosted a party here and had a wonderful time. Caitlin does it all and truly makes the experience magical! Easiest and most fun birthday party!

Sunny Day Play Cafe was an ideal venue for my daughter’s 4th birthday! Clean, bright and lots of fun play and party space for the kids! I particularly love that adults can socialize while kids play; as the space is small enough to see your child from just about anywhere, but large enough for kids to have plenty of room to run around! The owner (Caitlin) was attentive and helpful from start to finish with the planning, setup and cleanup of the party!

The absolute best place to have a birthday party ! And the owner helped me set up, an helped me a ton through out the entire party. Very happy we had my son’s birthday here ! The kids had a blast ! Can’t rave enough 🤗 …
Great spot for young kids!

We had an amazing experience at Sunny Day Play Cafe for our two year olds birthday party. The space was perfect for the kiddos we had (aged 13 mo to 5 years) with more than enough toys to go around. The adults were very happy too :) will definitely be back!
Clean
This place is so cute! My 2 year old left saying that place is fun! Very clean and new. Has a nursing room. And the owner is so friendly
Thank you for your great review!

We had my daughters 5th birthday party here and it was a big hit! All of the kids had such a blast and the owner is just so sweet and kind! She helped so much with the party and answered all of my questions no problem! Definitely will be coming back here again for play time and highly recommend having your child’s birthday party here!

We booked our son’s 5th birthday party here and it was a hit! This is a clean space with quality play areas for the kids. Katelyn worked hard to make a large party go well, and Sunny Day uses local food/coffee suppliers. They have my vote.

My almost 11 month old had a great time at the play cafe today. She squealed and ran around loving all the rooms and toys. She’s in daycare during the week so it’s nice to have the play cafe on the weekends so she can get some play time and interaction with other littles. We will definitely be back!}

Skeddadle is great place for kids to have fun. My 4 years old daughter enjoyed so much with her school friends on a playdate. The staff is really accomodative and friendly.

Half the items on the floor are broken or don’t work properly.  It’s been like that for a few years. Also watch out as they may double book your reservation plans.  We booked a party for our daughter, sent out invitations, by the time we came to pay for it 3 days later, they had rebooked another group. Their excuse was that “they didn’t want to bother us to let us know”. So you book people, and don’t call to confirm your current guests before you change or cancel? How unethical & unprofessional of an organization, the quality of management is truly shown.  Before they reply saying “you didn’t pay the deposit”, the date & package  was confirmed, and we were told to come pay the deposit within the week.  3 days later. Reservation gone to someone else. What a joke lol. Save your time and just do a walk-in visit to this place, but just be aware everything in this facility is subpar, dirty or broken.  Skedaddles finer years have passed sadly.
Amazing place for kids , great service as well , reasonable pricing .

We just had our daughters birthday party here and it was amazing! The birthday party room was nice, spacious, freshly painted and very clean. The kids all had a blast and some even said they want their party their next time! Thank you for a great party!
We did our daughters birthday party , it was so amazing and so kind ppl who organised the party and the price so firm , all games was fun for kids , thank you for Skedaddle Kids ..

I love this place. I love that there is no time limit for playtime and the pricing is fair. But my favourite thing about Skedaddle is how baby/toddler friendly it is. I also like that their music is not too loud because in other playgrounds that can really take away the focus from the kids as they play. Sometimes those playgrounds are so loud you can’t even hear your child calling for you. Not Skedaddle!
Last but not least, the staff is super welcoming and sweet, which is one of the reasons I keep coming back.

I highly recommend!!

I had the pleasure of visiting Skedaddle Kids in Milton for a face painting event, and I was very impressed! The place is clean, spacious, and filled with fun activities for kids of all ages. The staff is friendly and accommodating, making it a perfect indoor play area for kids to burn off energy. If you’re a parent looking for a safe, entertaining spot for your kids, I highly recommend Skedaddle Kids!

Thank you so much for booking me for face painting at Skedaddle Kids! I had an amazing time, and it was such a joy to see all the happy faces.
Skeddale is very clean indoor playground and also the management is very friendly and nice. I highly recommend this place for kids and birthday events

I recently visited Skedaddle in Milton, Ontario, and was pretty disappointed with the experience. There were two ladies working there, but they seemed more interested in chatting and gossiping with each other rather than paying attention to customers. One of their children appeared to be asleep on the couch, which added to the lack of a professional atmosphere.

The facility itself is very outdated. Most of the machines and activities are in poor condition, some were broken, others didn’t even turn on. The whole place felt quite dull, dark, and far from inviting. Cleanliness is also an issue, as everything seemed a bit worn out and not well-maintained.

While it's not as pricey as some other places, it definitely shows in the quality. If you’re looking for a better experience, especially with a toddler, I’d recommend going across the street to Funvilla instead. You'll have a much better time there.
Clean, nice place for kids birthday party and the manager Mrs.Nagwan is so helpful and friendly.
Great spot for a very active toddler! Spent an hour and a half here, and he loved the slides, trampoline and the riding toys.
My daughter enjoyed her time so much , a very happy place😊😊😊😊 …

This place deserves ZERO stars.

The place is absolutely disgusting. The floors are black because they've probably never been cleaned. My white socks were black on the bottom after 10 minutes being there. The ball pit area had food crumbs all over place and the balls looked moldy. There were wet spots all over the floor. Half the toys are broken or don't work. The arcade games are always turned off or broken. There was a child from their camp that had pee soaked pants because he needed a new diaper. And he was sitting on toys and going down the slides with pee all over his pants. I even told the owner , and they did not seem to care. The place is just gross and unsanitary.  I will never be returning. And I will also be looking for a phone number to call to report them for health and safety precautions.

DONT GO HERE! ITS FREAKING DISGUSTING. TRY ANY OTHER PLAY PLACE IN TOWN.

I did my daughter’s birthday here twice as it’s so easy and the staff is very helpful. They decorate the room perfectly and is always super clean. Anything you need the staff is more than happy to assist. Thank you skedaddle for making my daughters birthdays so amazing.
We had an amazing time at Skedaddle! Lots of activities for the kids, they could spend the whole day playing. Nice area for me to work or relax as well. Definitely recommend for a fun time!

Absolutely loved the experience! The play area was fantastic for my 8-year-old and 5-year-old. From the engaging activities including easter eggs hunt to the safe environment, every aspect was top-notch. The staff was incredibly attentive and friendly, ensuring the kids had a blast while maintaining safety protocols. Their genuine care for the children and attention to detail truly made our visit memorable. We can't wait to visit again!

My son was crying as we were leaving because he didn't want to leave. I highly suggest you to take your kids there :)}

reviews.content: This place is very nice! Alex helped us get checked in and was super patient with my kiddo who didn't have the patience for the waiver. We stopped in on a whim, bought the socks which are pretty nice. The prices are fair. The place is clean. I saw people get the pizza and it's pretty big. I went with a 15 year old and 6 year old. They both had a blast. I love that they have lockers that are free, it really encourages the adults to play instead of watching their things. Also, the bathrooms have Crocs that you can slide on over the socks to run into the bathroom. It seems like a lot of well thought ideas. We will definitely come back!
N/A
My kid have so fun
Neat place and very clean (so far as the facility seems very new at the time of writing) but because of the size and complexity of the facility, I would not reccomend it for kids under 4-years-old.

So we just went here Wednesday.....my son's gonna be 2 Friday and he had a blast!  BUT he started not feeling well Sunday and I just took him to his Drs and he has HAND FOOT MOUTH disease with 4 huge sores in his mouth.  Dr said it was definitely from taking him to this place.  And no.... he's not in daycare he stays home with me 24/7!  Pls try to keep your place clean so this doesn't happen again!!!  Also. ..it was extremely Hot In there when we went....the AC needs to go up a little

Update: DONT GO ON FRIDAYS- PRICE IS RIDICULOUS GOUGING $24
Great place, we trade of between here and kids jungle land in white Marsh. Because the entire ceiling and walls of KidzVille is black and I find it dark and claustrophobic, and there is no where for normal adults to sit comfortably, I  personally prefer kids jungle land which is much more spacious and bright  and has better running and climbing opportunities. They both have great things to do .

Kidzville with the boys last night in Perry Hall!  I was pleasantly surprised how cool the place is and they didn’t try to upcharge everything.  There weren’t any arcade games which I loved.  No tickets to win and cash in for some unnecessary junk. I think admission was 13.99 and you need slipper socks.  They were $2.95 so very reasonable.  It was a big indoor playground with lots of stuff for the kids to do. Perfrct for a rainy night.

The only food they sold was cheese or pepperoni pizza.  You had to buy a whole pizza.  $18 for a 16 inch cheese which was reasonable.  The pizza was also really good.

In addition to the pizzas they had a freezer of ice creams.  They also had water, juice, sodas and coffee pods.  Waters were $2 and juice was $2.50.  Thats all they had which was perfect.  They didn’t even sell candy. Prices were very reasonable!

The boys were exhausted when we left there.

I will definitely go back.
My little boy loves climbing 💙 all around he had fun …

Love Taking my Son here

The place is clean and has many playing options. My grandchildren had lots of fun. The only improvement needed is to allow customers bring their own healthy foods. Unfortunately they do not allow you to bring your own food and the food they sell is full of sugar , food coloring, salt and unhealthy options. This is a problem if your child is not used to unhealthy food.
Had a party here the host ronixon was the best host we have ever had for a party, room was clean he was super helpful and attentive. Party experience beats skyline, urban air ect. By a large margin.

Kidzville in Nottingham is an amazing place for kids! There were so many activities to keep them entertained, from climbing structures to slides and interactive play areas. The atmosphere was lively, and the place was packed with families enjoying their time. It was great to see the kids having so much fun and staying active. Took my daughter for the first time over the weekend and she had a blast! She already likes it better than Kidz Jungle Land as there is more variety. Clean environment, was a bit crowded but that's a given on the weekends. Will definitely be back!

This is the first kids play place we left and haven’t gotten sick. There was actually a lady cleaning while we were there. The cleanliness alone is enough of a reason to come back. I hope it stays this way!

Best place around. I’m so happy they brought one closer to me. I’ve never been to a more clean establishment for kids. You can bring any brand of  grippy socks and don’t have to buy them every time you go! The price is very reasonable and there is no time limit!
Great time! Pleasant staff and the equipment was clean and well maintained. The price is worth it since there is a ton of stuff to do and no time limit!

It is slightly pricey though- it should be cheaper for kids <3 years old as they cannot take advantage of many areas
Love this place for my babygirl

For kids, they've got tons of fun things to play on and with. For parents, they have free wifi and lots of places to sit. The place was clean and the staff were friendly and helpful.

Note: When going for the first time, keep in mind that there is also a place called "Kids Zone" in the same building with a big colorful sign, which is apparently a daycare center not connected with KidzVille, so make sure you go to the correct door.

We took the kids to play in kidzville perry hall to play My daughter wasn't wearing one foot for the socks because her feet was twisted and had to put brackets we didn't go out for a long day and she barely started walking After a while about 30-40 min playing with one socks on and the injuries one wasn't A mom having a kid came to me and telling me that this is disinfectant for others and i am asking you either to let your daughter put it on or leave. I explained nicely about her and she said I don't care. so i replied please watch your kid and mind your business, the kids have been playing and the staff saw her and no one told us anything i told here the kids is sneezing coughing and most of them are sick with no mask and were eating and then play without even washing hands. Here is the problem she didn't like that we are muslims and because one of the staff was the same race and from the same country and they talked their language, the staff member came to me and asked me to leave in a very rude way. I was shocked about her attitude and being in her side because of the same race and country and i asked her for a manager or customer service number she said oh here is the number do what you want. I paid 97 $ for 4 kids for 45 min I tried reaching the corporate number but i didn't get it Please share as much as you can and try to let whoever is the manager or the owner is to know
I love it
Large, full of activities, clean, well kept, very engaging
I can’t say enough good things about Kidzville 2 location. We had a blast. Very clean and friendly workers and people here. We will host my step daughters 6th birthday here in April and can’t wait!
Love this place!! My daughter had so much fun!! Highly recommended!!!

My kids had a blast. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because the music was too loud and noisy and ended up giving me a headache. We left sooner than we had planned because of that. We've been to similar places in the past that had softer/quieter music or no music at all and the kids still had an amazing time. If you want to improve parent's experience, please consider lowering the music. Also, better food/coffee options would be great.
Thank you!

reviews.content: This is the best and largest play ground! My kids had a great time.
Very clean, well-maintained, and children could stay cool during this hot weather.
Very clean and lots of fun for my kids ages 3 and 5. Several different play sections and lots for them to discover and kept them entertained for hours
We love bringing our two year old here!
N/A
LOVE THIS PLACE 🥳 …

This is the cleanest and most well-run indoor play space we’ve ever seen. The staff was present, attentive, and welcoming. People were walking around cleaning the entire time we were there. The obstacle course offered a wide variety of activities for my 7 and 9 year old kids. This is a great spot to burn off some energy on a hot summer day!

Here right now for the first time with three kids. We came from Fairfax because we got summer reading coupons from our public library for this place. We’re having a wonderful time. Large, clean, spacious, and something for children of all ages. Everything is winter themed. Nice temp controlled place to play during very hot/cold weather  There are separated areas for 0-2s and 2-7s, birthday party rooms, bathrooms, and a lot more. There are bar chairs, high table tops, and soft benches for adults. The staff was very kind and professional. The price includes unlimited play time.  You need to wear socks to enter (they sell them too). Looking forward to coming back!
Best place for kids to play and have fun 😊. The staff is very professional and friendly. I recommend all friends and families to bring their kids here …

A great indoor place for kids to cool down and beat the summer heat. Staff was friendly, attentive, and facility was clean and kept up with. There’s plenty of things to do for all age groups and we love the all day play for the price. Can’t beat it. Will definitely come again!!
Love that you can play all until close! Everyone is also really friendly.

Odalis was a phenomenal staff! She made sure if our experience was going well and was very attentive and professional with her job. Enjoy the cleanliness and functioning AC. But, where the free food at??
Fun place for toddlers!
Very fun place for the kids to play!
Awesome for kids. I'd get there earlier in the day to avoid crowds. Also, try to find Ana. She is very helpful.
Great place for kids to have fun, and interact with other kids their age.  Very clean 😄 …
Love this place for the kidz to run off some energy. Bonus tip: during peak times (summer/weekends) come as soon as they open- it can get paaaaacked!
